Name: Character EXP
Description: Character EXP, used to level up characters.

Name: Adventure EXP
Description: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

Name: Stardust
Description: Small talent points (Including the main character)

Name: Starglitter
Description: Large talent points (Including the main character)

Name: Companionship EXP
Description: Companionship EXP. Used to increase Friendship levels.

Name: Original Resin
Description:
Used to vitalize Petrified Trees and Ley Line Blossoms, allowing access to the treasures they hold. Energy regenerates over time.
It is said that the roots of all the Irminsul trees and blossoms in the world are intertwined at the deepest, most hidden place in the earth, and that the pattern the root system makes defines the Ley Lines of the world.

Name: Story Key
Description:
A key used to unlock Story Quests.
Obtained by completing the required number of Daily Commissions.

Name: Primogem
Description: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

Name: Mora
Description: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

Name: Genesis Crystal
Description: An energy crystal from the very origin of the universe. Formed from within nothingness out of pure potential and hope, it contains enough energy to create a newborn star.

Name: Realm Currency
Description: Currency of the realm. Used within the Serenitea Pot to exchange for various items.

Name: Original Essence (Invalidated)
Description: A crystal that temporarily revitalizes Irminsul to grant you ancient treasures. The energy within regenerates over time.

Name: Original Resin (Invalidated)
Description: A crystal that temporarily revitalizes Irminsul to grant you great treasures. The energy within regenerates over time.

Name: Masterless Starglitter
Description:
Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.
Surplus Starglitter of destiny. Perhaps it can light up other corners of the universe.

Name: Masterless Stardust
Description:
Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.
Surplus Stardust of destiny. Perhaps it can create new destinies when in large enough quantities.

Name: Intertwined Fate
Description:
A fateful stone that connects dreams.
Its glimmers can entwine fates and connect dreams, just as how its glimmers links stars into the shapes of a heart's desires.

Name: Acquaint Fate
Description:
A seed that lights up the night.
No matter the distance apart, guided by the stone's glimmer, the fated will meet under the stars.

Name: Pyro Sigil
Description: A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.

Name: Hydro Sigil
Description:
A sigil that serves as a sign of recognition from the waters in Fontaine.
Offer it to the Fountain of Lucine to receive the rewards from the springs.

Name: Dendro Sigil
Description:
A sigil that serves as a sign of recognition from the trees, grass, and flowers in Sumeru.
Offer it to the Tree of Dreams deep in the woods to receive the rewards from the forest.

Name: Electro Sigil
Description:
A sigil that serves as a sign of the acknowledgment given by the thundering islands of Inazuma.
Offer them to the Sacred Sakura of the Grand Narukami Shrine to raise your Sacred Sakura's Favor level.

Name: Anemo Sigil
Description:
An insignia that shows the recognition of the winds of Mondstadt.
Can be exchanged for special items in Mondstadt.

Name: Cryo Sigil
Description: A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.

Name: Geo Sigil
Description:
An insignia that shows the recognition of the cliffs of Liyue.
Can be exchanged for special items in Liyue.

Name: Memory of Eternal Flames
Description: The missing star from the Talents of a Pyro-aligned Traveler.

Name: Memory of Running Stream
Description: The missing star from the Talents of a Hydro-aligned Traveler.

Name: Memory of Flourishing Green
Description: The missing star from the Talents of a Dendro-aligned Traveler.

Name: Memory of Violet Flash
Description: The missing star from the Talents of an Electro-aligned Traveler.

Name: Memory of Roving Gales
Description: The missing star from the Talents of an Anemo-aligned Traveler.

Name: Memory of Piercing Frost
Description: The missing star from the Talents of a Cryo-aligned Traveler.

Name: Memory of Immovable Crystals
Description: The missing star from the Talents of a Geo-aligned Traveler.

Name: Gnostic Hymn - Old Notes
Description:
An early draft of a traveler's tale, recording the many things they saw on their journey across the lands. But why does it exist? It is almost as if you have been here before...

Use this item to unlock Gnostic Hymn for a single period.

Name: Blessing of the Welkin Moon - New Moon
Description:
A ritual prayer, recited on the rising of the first new moon, to ask for the moon's blessing in the form of wealth and good fortune. For your purposes, the new moon you shall pray to is the first-ever new moon in Teyvat, since it's the first one you've seen here.

Use this item to receive 30 days of Blessing of the Welkin Moon rewards.

Name: An Appellative Stroke
Description:
The brush with which you may bestow a new name upon a certain person.
Once the new name has been given, it cannot be changed.

Name: Test Random Treasure Chest
Description: 111Test Random Treasure Chest. Nice.

Name: Test Set Treasure Chest
Description: Test Random Treasure Chest. Nice!

Description: Receive one random Character Card

Name: Kaeya
Description: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

Name: Lisa
Description: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Akademiya to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

EffectDescription: Restores 300 HP for the selected character.
Name: Apple
Description: Crisp and fragrant. Delicious raw or made into wine.

EffectDescription: Restores 300 HP for the selected character.
Name: Sunsettia
Description: A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.

Name: Mushroom
Description: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

Name: Sweet Flower
Description: Particularly fragrant flowers. They can be found easily, even in the dark. Just follow the scent.

Name: Carrot
Description: A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.

Name: Radish
Description: Rich in fiber and nutrients. Easy to grow and harvest.

Name: Snapdragon
Description: Can be eaten once cooked. As a spice, it can bring wonderful flavor to dishes.

Name: Mint
Description: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

Name: Wheat
Description: Golden, sun-kissed tassels. Needs to be ground down to flour for further use.

Name: Cabbage
Description: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

Name: Silver Lotus
Description: A rare plant that grows on steep cliffs with nobility. Shines magnificently in the night.

Name: Pinecone
Description: Filled with oil-rich seeds. Certainly won't be growing into a tree from inside a squirrel's stomach.

Name: Wolfhook
Description: A berry with thorns that often gets attached to a wolf's pelt. When you look at it, you can almost hear the echoing cries of the wolves in the woods.

Name: Valberry
Description: A plump and translucent berry that has a fragrant smell and a sweet, refreshing taste. In the past, the storm watchers' only solace was the sweetness of this fruit and hope for the city's peace.

Name: Cecilia
Description: A beautiful flower with a name that suits its appearance. It only grows where harsh winds blow, and is just as intangible as the true heart of an unbound soul.

Name: Windwheel Aster
Description: A plant that adores the wind. To the proud children of the wind, or the citizens of Mondstadt, the Windwheel Asters are "the visible winds."

Name: Philanemo Mushroom
Description: A fungus that grows in the warm caress of the wind. It is as everlasting as the wind, nourishing life.

Name: Lotus Head
Description: An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.

Name: Jueyun Chili
Description: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

Name: Noctilucous Jade
Description: A rare mineral that glimmers in the dark. It's said to be a mutated gemstone condensed from the flourishing elements of the world.

Name: Silk Flower
Description: A crimson flower that blooms like the rainbow clouds in Liyue. It can be made into silky-smooth fabric.

Name: Glaze Lily
Description: An extremely ancient flower that was said to be commonly seen in Liyue. It transforms the memories of the land into its fragrance during florescence.

Name: Qingxin
Description: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.

Name: Horsetail
Description: A purple plant that sometimes grows amidst Silvergrass but grows taller, straighter, and plumper — like an aristocrat among the paupers.

Name: Starconch
Description: Empty seashells brought ashore by the tides. Hold it close to your ear, and hear the longing calls of the sea.

Name: Violetgrass
Description: A small flower with strong vitality. It is said that its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

Name: Berry
Description: Small, brightly-colored fruit. They can be found everywhere, and the taste of them wipes the fatigue of a long journey away.

Name: Mist Flower Corolla
Description: A flower bud encased in solid ice. Even after being picked, the flower continues to emit cold.

Name: Flaming Flower Stamen
Description: The stamen of a fiercely burning flower. Even after being extinguished, it still emits heat.

Name: Electro Crystal
Description: A power-rich crystal that draws electricity from the air around it. Holding it makes your hand a little numb.

Name: Small Lamp Grass
Description: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.

Name: Calla Lily
Description: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked, the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

Name: Dandelion Seed
Description: A tiny seed that rides on the wind. Even without its feathered wings, it still holds the hope from afar within.

Name: Cor Lapis
Description: A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae."

Name: Raw Meat
Description: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

Name: Bird Egg
Description: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

Name: Matsutake
Description: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

Name: Fowl
Description: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

Name: Butterfly Wings
Description: Brightly colored wings. The powder that falls from them shimmers a little. Perhaps this is what allows them to fly?

Name: Crab
Description: A shelled creature that lives near the ocean. Its flaky, delicious meat can easily be made into tasty dishes.

Name: Crab Roe
Description: A delicacy specific to female crabs. A rare and prized ingredient that isn't quite to everyone's taste.

Name: Salt
Description: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

Name: Onion
Description: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

Name: Pepper
Description: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

Name: Milk
Description: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

Name: Tomato
Description: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

Name: Potato
Description: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

Name: Frog
Description: Common frog found in moist environments. Full of energy, they secrete a substance that will keep you full of vitality.

Name: Luminescent Spine
Description: The light-emitting part of a firefly. Used for courtship, and in medicine to help recover strength.

Name: Lizard Tail
Description: A lizard tail that curled up after losing its owner. Very bitter, but has skin hardening properties.

Name: Fish
Description: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

Name: Crystal Core
Description: The core of a crystal butterfly. It absorbs elemental energy that has escaped into the atmosphere.

Name: Raw Meat (S)
Description: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

Name: Fowl (S)
Description: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

Name: Tofu
Description: Freshly made bean product that has a silky-smooth tender texture.

Name: Almond
Description: A seed with a peculiar fragrance that gives food a refreshing taste.

Name: Loach Pearl
Description:
A shiny pearl spat out by a loach that has mystical medicinal properties.
Minerals and elemental particles ingested by the loach condense into these mildly magical beads. When threatened, the loach spits them out to confuse predators and escape with its life.

Name: Bamboo Shoot
Description: A fresh young bamboo shoot, straight out of the ground. It is a delicious cooking ingredient with an exotic aroma, found exclusively in bamboo-growing regions.

Name: Rice
Description: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

Name: Shrimp Meat
Description: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

Name: Chilled Meat
Description:
Rare, fresh meat.
This species of boar is recorded to have gone extinct several hundred years ago and has been preserved by the extreme temperatures on Dragonspine. For the gourmets of Teyvat, this is an ingredient of unspeakable sacrosanctness.

Name: Eel Meat
Description: The fresh meat of an Unagi/Eel. If handled properly, it can be used to make fresh, lovely food.

Name: Glabrous Beans
Description: A common legume in Teyvat with a light aroma. It can be prepared in a variety of ways, and is thus widely accepted by people all over the world.

Name: Mysterious Meat
Description: A fresh chunk of meat that seems to be radiating an enigmatic aura. Wonder what it'll taste like?

Name: Coffee Beans
Description: A common fruit in Teyvat with a special aroma. It can be used to make beverages after being ground.

Name: Fermented Juice
Description: A fermented juice with a unique fruity scent. It is often used as a marinade.

Name: Iron Chunk
Description: This iron chunk can be turned into a multitude of handy items in the hands of a skilled craftsman.

Name: White Iron Chunk
Description: Skilled hands can make this into something brilliant.

Name: Crystal Chunk
Description: An uncut crystal. Only professional craftsmanship can bring out its true value.

Name: Magical Crystal Chunk
Description:
These crystal chunks can be refined into Weapon EXP materials by using Original Resin.
Crystals from mines that were eroded by the energy of the Ley Lines cannot be processed by ordinary means.

EffectDescription: Increases the Dragon Blood Buff
Name: Scarlet Quartz
Description: Scarlet Quartz

Name: Starsilver
Description: A rare and precious ore formed by the unique geographical conditions and Ley Lines of Dragonspine.

EffectDescription: Increases the Dragon Blood Buff
Name: Scarlet Quartz
Description: Scarlet Quartz (Dragonspine Event)

Name: Amethyst Lump
Description: An uncut crystal that can only be found in Inazuma. Some professional craftsmanship will bring out its true value.

Name: Condessence Crystal
Description: A bright and clear crystal with a core that is both tough and malleable.

Name: Northlander Sword Billet
Description:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords. 
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

Name: Northlander Bow Billet
Description:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows. 
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

Name: Northlander Claymore Billet
Description:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star claymores. 
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

Name: Northlander Catalyst Billet
Description:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star catalysts. 
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

Name: Northlander Polearm Billet
Description:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star polearms. 
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

Name: Northlander Sword
Description: An unknown sword from the Northlands

Name: Northlander Bow
Description: An unknown bow from the Northlands

Name: Northlander Claymore
Description: An unknown claymore from the Northlands

Name: Northlander Catalyst
Description: An unknown catalyst from the Northlands

Name: Northlander Polearm
Description: Unknown Northlander Polearm

Name: Midlander Sword Billet
Description:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords.
Philosophers believe that there are four purposes behind earthly things. The purpose of these billets is to become a weapon worthy of accompanying a hero.

Name: Midlander Bow Billet
Description:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows.
Philosophers believe that there are four purposes behind earthly things. The purpose of these billets is to become a weapon worthy of accompanying a hero.

Name: Midlander Claymore Billet
Description:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star claymores.
Philosophers believe that there are four purposes behind earthly things. The purpose of these billets is to become a weapon worthy of accompanying a hero.

Name: Midlander Catalyst Billet
Description:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star catalysts.
Philosophers believe that there are four purposes behind earthly things. The purpose of these billets is to become a weapon worthy of accompanying a hero.

Name: Midlander Polearm Billet
Description:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star polearms.
Philosophers believe that there are four purposes behind earthly things. The purpose of these billets is to become a weapon worthy of accompanying a hero.

Name: Onikabuto
Description: A strange beetle that inhabits areas rich with Electro energy. Its docile and sedentary temperament could not be more different from the fierce, demonic visage displayed on its armored shell.

Name: Sakura Bloom
Description: Blossoms from the Sacred Sakura at the Grand Narukami Shrine, filled with a fondness for Inazuma.

Name: Crystal Marrow
Description: A crystal that contains a sliver of Tatarigami power. Adding this material during smelting will greatly increase the strength and toughness of metals.

Name: Dendrobium
Description: A vibrant plant that has also been named the "lycoris" by the poets. It was once thought extinct in the Inazuman archipelago, only to re-emerge now upon the battlefields. It is said that it blooms most enchantingly where much blood was spilled.

Name: Naku Weed
Description: Even on windless days, this plant will tremble lightly amid the cries of thunder. The parts of it that resemble petals are in fact extensions of the leaves meant to protect the fragile flower.

Name: Sea Ganoderma
Description: A plant species that only grows in certain regions and islands of the ocean. Though it looks like a fungus of some sort, it actually comes from a substance secreted by certain soft-bodied organisms.

Name: Sango Pearl
Description: A precious pearl that grows in the coral of Watatsumi. Gives off a cool sheen like that of the moonlight.

Name: Amakumo Fruit
Description: The fruit of the Amakumo Grass, which grows on Seirai Island. You can hear it crackling with a tiny current if you hold it up to your ear.

Name: Fluorescent Fungus
Description: A mushroom that glows like a night-light. Some curious power lies hidden within it.

Name: Seagrass
Description: A plant that grows in shallow seas. It adds a unique flavor to dishes.

Name: Lavender Melon
Description: A brightly-colored fruit. The flesh within transforms into food with a unique mouthfeel when cooked.

EffectDescription: Restores 300 HP for the selected character.
Name: Starshroom
Description: A fungus with a cap that resembles a five-pointed star. It is quite hardy indeed. Once it matures, the center of the cap will split open.

Name: Rukkhashava Mushrooms
Description: A fungus that grows in layers upon layers, like a sea of clouds, and which mostly grows on trees deep in the rainforest.

Name: Padisarah
Description: A holy and noble plant. The conditions for growth in its environment are very demanding. The flower buds can be processed to make valuable spices.

Name: Nilotpala Lotus
Description: Growing in the forest wetlands, these plants only bloom at night with flowers as bright as the moon.

Name: Harra Fruit
Description: Growing in the hot humid rainforest, it is a fruit with a special spicy aroma. When ground to powder, spices can be made from it. It is the most valued spice plant in Sumeru.

Name: Kalpalata Lotus
Description: Flowers from vines that grow on cliff sides. It is called a lotus only because it has a similar appearance to one. Aside from that, it bears no other similar properties to the lotus.

Name: Zaytun Peach
Description: The fruit of a forest shrub. Its flesh is firm and sweet. It is said to have a calming effect on the mind.

Name: Sumeru Rose
Description: Bright and beautiful, these pure purple flowers give off a pleasant fragrance that will give any passerby pause. While some like to call this a type of "rambler rose," its relative lack of multiple flowers means that it falls under a different floral classification.

Name: Henna Berry
Description: A fruit that grows even in the most hostile of desert environments. Its vibrant crimson fruits are made even more lovely against a backdrop of yellow sand.

Name: Ajilenakh Nut
Description: A fruit that grows on evergreen trees within desert oases. The flesh under the tough skin is thick, sweet, and delicious, making it an important food source amongst the desert peoples.

Name: Sand Grease Pupa
Description: You can only find such husks deep in the desert where the Quicksand Eels breed. The hardened shell is meant to protect the Quicksand Eels' larval bodies until they finally acclimate to the conditions of the dry desert.

Name: Mourning Flower
Description: Crimson flowers that bloom on ancient battlefields. They can even flourish in the depths of the desert. Their drooping flowers seem to be in mourning for heroes long past.

Name: Trishiraite
Description: A splendorous stone that can be found in the depths of desolate mountains, seemingly formed from congealed elemental energy.

Name: Scarab
Description: A tenacious beetle that finds repose within the vast ocean of desert sand. The golden pattern on such beetles' shells hints at some deep relationship between them and the ancient ruins that dot the desert.

EffectDescription: Restores 800 HP to the selected character.
Name: Activated Starshroom
Description: A fungus with a cap that resembles a five-pointed star. It seems to be bursting with vitality.

EffectDescription: Restores 1 HP for the selected character.
Name: Scorched Starshroom
Description: A fungus with a cap that resembles a five-pointed star. It seems to be a little singed.

Name: Viparyas
Description:
A flower without seeds. 
Once the earth remembers, the Viparyas will bloom.

Name: Pluie Lotus
Description: A plant that grows in environments rich with Hydro. This plant can be found everywhere in Fontaine after its long rainy seasons. The plant is named "Pluie" — which means "rain" in the local tongue — for that reason.

EffectDescription: Restores 300 HP for the selected character.
Name: Bulle Fruit
Description: A fruit that grows in warm and damp environments with ample sunlight. Inside this round and rotund fruit hides a sweet and refreshing surprise.

Name: Marcotte
Description: A pink flower with a pearl-like luster and rich scent profile. It is one of the most important ingredients in a perfumer's arsenal.

Name: Beryl Conch
Description: A conch-like structure that gives off a faint glow. Despite the name, it is not a shell but something condensed from pure elemental energy.

Name: Romaritime Flower
Description: An ethereal and elegant blue flower. Its tender petals are elastic and water-absorbent, making it the ideal raw material for various daily necessities.

Name: Tidalga
Description: An algae floating with the tides that sustains itself by feeding on substances produced by other plants. Though often mistaken for zooplankton, based on its nature, Tidalga is actually a type of phytoplankton.

Name: Lumidouce Bell
Description: A serene and tranquil violet flower. It has a light, soft, and lasting scent and is often used for making luxurious perfumes.

Name: Rainbow Rose
Description: A delicate and tender pink flower. Despite their name, Rainbow Roses are essentially more akin to Lilies.

Name: Lumitoile
Description: A soft-bodied animal that emits a gentle light. Often found climbing the walls of buildings near the water or underwater.

Name: Subdetection Unit
Description: Detection units produced by Fontaine Research Institute using new models of artificed components. Its original purpose was monitoring all kinds of environmental data.

Name: Birch Wood
Description:
Timber obtained from birches. It is easy to work with and produces smooth cuts. Furniture made using such wood is both beautiful and durable.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Cuihua Wood
Description:
Timber obtained from Cuihua Trees. With its lovely color and unique make, it will surely be able to take on myriad uses upon undergoing suitable workmanship.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Pine Wood
Description:
Timber obtained from pines. Its color and grain are nothing to write home about, but its unpretentious nature is elegant in its own right. The wood is very sturdy as well. In able hands, its products should be able to resist moth and rot alike.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Sandbearer Wood
Description:
Timber from the Sandbearer Tree. Said to be an exceptionally hardy plant resistant to wind and rain with a long lifespan.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Bamboo Segment
Description:
Segments of bamboo that are light and far stronger than their humble appearance might suggest. It lets off a light fragrance.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Fragrant Cedar Wood
Description:
Wood from the Cedar tree. Also known as the "Fragrant Cedar" for the aromatic oils it contains.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Fir Wood
Description:
Wood from the tree known as "Faber's Fir." Widely used for its fine quality and attractive grain.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Yumemiru Wood
Description:
Timber obtained from Sakura Trees. Exquisite in quality and full of moisture, people say that it can lull people into dreams as sweet as the warm spring.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Maple Wood
Description:
Timber from the Amur Maple. Excellent quality wood with a fine color and texture.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Aralia Wood
Description:
Wood from the Inazuman Cedar. It is soft, has straight veins, and gives off a light fragrance.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Otogi Wood
Description:
Wood from the Otogi Tree. It has just the right amount of moisture and oil, and as such has a great many uses.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Brightwood
Description:
Timber from the Brightwood Tree. It seems to have different properties from ordinary wood — soft but extremely resilient, easy to dye, and can be used for special purposes. 
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Karmaphala Wood
Description:
The wood of the Karmaphala Tree. One can easily get a nice, smooth surface while working on this material and obtain a rather eye-pleasing result without going through any sophisticated processes.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Adhigama Wood
Description:
The wood of the Adhigama Tree. Can be found everywhere and therefore appears rather ordinary, but the wood is durable and easy to handle.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Mountain Date Wood
Description:
Wood of the Mountain Date Tree. Although it neither feels special to touch nor possesses a special texture, it retains water exceedingly well and is thus easy to grow.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Athel Wood
Description:
Wood of the Athel Tree. It has a special texture and is resilient to both drought and humidity, making it very durable.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Mallow Wood
Description:
Wood from the Mallow Tree. With a tough core, it is suitable for building the foundations and frames of houses. It is easy to craft and process, so it takes relatively less manual labor to produce beautiful furniture.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Linden Wood
Description:
Wood from the Linden Tree. With a smooth texture and light color, few wood chips are produced even during fine processing. Often carved into delicate handicrafts or used to make compact parts for wooden mechanisms.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Ash Wood
Description:
Wood from the Ash Tree. With its extremely high strength, it is not only used for making strong load-bearing components, but also for making sheets to be used as wall reinforcements, and for transportation crates subject to frequent shocks.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Cypress Wood
Description:
Wood from the Cypress Tree. The core has a relatively large radius, with thinner sapwood. Though not solid or reliable as metal, the wood possesses unique advantages for buildings components with a large surface area.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Torch Wood
Description:
Wood from the Torch Tree. It has a soft texture, can be easily cut, stays dry easily, and the color is compatible with many bright paints. This makes it a common choice for artisans making delicate decorations.
Can be used to create furnishings.

Name: Fabric
Description: Some fabric of fine make. It will surely be of use in making furnishings.

Name: Red Dye
Description: Red dye. It will surely be of use in making furnishings.

Name: Yellow Dye
Description: Yellow dye. It will surely be of use in making furnishings.

Name: Blue Dye
Description: Blue dye. It will surely be of use in making furnishings.

Name: A Piece of Paper
Description: You have no idea who slipped it to you.

Name: Stolen Items
Description: Items belonging to the people of Mondstadt that were previously stolen by hilichurls in Drunkard Gorge.

Name: Hilichurl Antidote
Description: Made by hilichurl witch doctors. Cures hilichurl poison.

Name: Climbing Finish Line Garland
Description: Marker indicating the finish line of the Climbing Competition.

Name: Gliding Finish Line Garland
Description: Marker indicating the finish line of the Gliding Competition.

Name: Gliding Finish Line Garland
Description: Marker indicating the finish line of the Gliding Competition finals.

Name: Gliding Champion Cup
Description: Awarded to the Mondstadt Gliding Competition Champion.

Name: Jean's Document Package
Description: A few normal documents and a copy of Vera's Troubles.

Name: Extreme Escape
Description: Musk's Travel Journal. In the notes regarding Musk Reef is a line that reads: "Only on a morning sea breeze can one glide here from Lover's Cape..."

Name: Incomplete Score (Part 1)
Description: The first half of the sheet music for "Yellow." "S to J" is written in the bottom right corner.

Name: Incomplete Score (Part 2)
Description: The second half of the sheet music for "Yellow."

Name: Private Letter from Lisa to Jean
Description: Lisa has asked you to give this to Jean to deliver the news that Vera's Secret is receiving a sequel soon.

Name: Autumn Night
Description: Tells a story in which a court mage and her King get married in the end.

Name: Tasty-Looking Potion
Description: Looks tasty, but is actually a weakening potion.

Name: Potion
Description: Lisa has asked you to give this to Barbara.

Name: Barbara's Treatment
Description: Lisa has asked you to give this to Barbara.

Name: Incomplete Poem (Part 1)
Description: The poem Venti asked you to look for, though only the first part of it.

Name: Incomplete Poem (Part 2)
Description: The poem Venti asked you to look for, though it would seem there is more.

Name: Incomplete Poem (Part 3)
Description: The poem Venti asked you to look for, piece the three pages together to reveal a love verselet.

Name: Inscription Rubbing
Description: Ancient text engraved on the building.

Name: Form Restoration Potion
Description: Can restore those that have been transformed into hilichurls by Abyss Mages back to their human form.

Name: Holy Lyre der Himmel
Description: Can be used for taking down Stormterror.

Name: Cricket Hair
Description: You didn't catch a cricket, just a hair off its leg.

Name: Cricket (White)
Description: Common cricket. Can be seen everywhere, nothing rare about it at all.

Name: Cricket (Blue)
Description: A big blue cricket. Seems to have a powerful bite force. Should be good at battle.

Name: Cricket (Purple)
Description: A rare cricket with seven different red and purple layers to its wings.

Name: Cricket (Gold)
Description: Oh, wow! The Legendary Golden Cricket!

Name: Hydro Amber
Description: Hydro Amber given to you by Venti. Can be smashed to create rainfall. (Test)

Name: Anemo Amber
Description: Anemo Amber given to you by Venti. Can be smashed to create air currents. (Test)

Name: Random Loot (A)
Description: Items worth little value stolen from some random passer-by. Better return them quickly.

Name: Random Loot (B)
Description: Items worth little value stolen from some random passer-by. Better return them quickly.

Name: Random Loot (A)
Description: Items worth little value stolen from some random passer-by. Better return them quickly.

Name: Random Loot (B)
Description: Items worth little value stolen from some random passer-by. Better return them quickly.

Name: Crimson Crystal
Description: A teardrop crystal in which gloomy red gleams flow. Seems to have been left by the dragon. Perhaps the person that was talking with the dragon knows more about it, but where did he go?

Name: Seal Clue 101
Description: Seal Clue

Name: Seal Clue 102
Description: Seal Clue

Name: Seal Clue 103
Description: Seal Clue

Name: Seal Clue 201
Description: Seal Clue

Name: Seal Clue 202
Description: Seal Clue

Name: Seal Clue 203
Description: Seal Clue

Name: Seal Clue 301
Description: Seal Clue

Name: Seal Clue 302
Description: Seal Clue

Name: Seal Clue 303
Description: Seal Clue

Name: Break Seal 1
Description: Break Seal

Name: Break Seal 2
Description: Break Seal

Name: Break Seal 3
Description: Break Seal

Name: Investigate the Seal of Stormterror's Lair
Description: Seal of Stormterror's Lair

Name: Break the seal of Stormterror's Lair
Description: Seal of Stormterror's Lair

Name: Fragmented Memory (Wind)
Description: Bring it close to your ear and it seems you can hear faint whispers, but can't make out what's being said. (Not available)

Name: Sword Cemetery Seal 1
Description: Break Seal

Name: Sword Cemetery Seal 2
Description: Break Seal

Name: Sword Cemetery Seal 3
Description: Break Seal

Name: Teardrop Crystal
Description: A curious teardrop left in the ancient arena that attracted hordes of monsters to fight for it.

Name: Teardrop Crystal
Description: A teardrop looted and treasured by some members of the Eclipse hilichurl tribe. Had some trouble "convincing" them to part with it.

Name: Teardrop Crystal
Description: A tear hidden in the forest ruins. Thankfully it hadn't been eaten by the insects.

Name: Holy Lyre der Himmel
Description: A treasure that once belonged to Barbatos, the Anemo Archon, but its Anemo power has all dried up.

Name: Partially Repaired Holy Lyre der Himmel
Description: A treasure that once belonged to Barbatos, the Anemo Archon, with some power restored by a Teardrop Crystal.

Name: Completely Repaired Holy Lyre der Himmel
Description: A treasure that once belonged to Barbatos, the Anemo Archon, that has been restored to full power. Even Dvalin may heed its call.

Name: Clear Dvalin Tear
Description: A teardrop left behind by Dvalin. The pure power of Anemo resonates within it.

Name: Damaged Holy Lyre der Himmel
Description: A prized treasure of Barbatos, the Anemo Archon. Its clear sound that once echoed through the heavens and was beloved by the unruly Dvalin has now been reduced to naught but dull, ear-piercing noise.

Name: Treasure Clue (I)
Description: A piece of paper with clues to a treasure. On it, is an unclear map with an unclear message.

Name: Treasure Clue (II)
Description: A piece of paper with clues to a treasure. On it, is an unclear map with an unclear message.

Name: Treasure Map
Description: A scribbled map with a simple marking in a particular area.

Name: Hidden Key
Description: A key that once belonged to the Fatui. Just like all other keys, each respond to a door.

Name: Black Key
Description: Opens the black door.

Name: Vera's Melancholy (I)
Description:
I don't ever think the world is monotonous. It's just that interesting things happen in far away galaxies.
The great adventure of Vera, an ordinary girl always fascinated by distant lands, secretly begins.

Name: Vera's Melancholy (II)
Description:
Everything's just boring. Everything, all the time. It's not depression. It's just reaching the age of 14.
So begins Vera's adventure.

Name: Vera's Melancholy (III)
Description:
The Andromeda Empire stretches across half the galaxy group. Every planet within the Empire has its own demons and deities, dragons and monsters.
"I've come up with a story for every star from your home." "That's not possible. Looking from here, the Andromeda Galaxy is only one fifth the size of your moon."
So continues Vera's adventure.

Name: Along with Divinity: Prologue
Description:
"Have you ever thought about what our lives would've been like without the archons?"
Come and join the author in an exploration of "divinity" with humor and logic.

Name: The Legend of Vennessa (I)
Description: A popular song since the reconstruction of Mondstadt. It tells the story of Vennessa, the founder of the Knights of Favonius, in her early years as a slave in Mondstadt.

Name: The Legend of Vennessa (II)
Description: A popular song since the reconstruction of Mondstadt. It tells the story of Vennessa, the founder of the Knights of Favonius, in her early years when she met Barbatos, the Anemo Archon, as well as how she defeated the drake and overthrew the Aristocrats.

Name: Mondstadt General Goods Order Board
Description: Mondstadt General Goods Order Board

Name: Cat's Tail Tavern Message Board
Description: Cat's Tail Tavern Message Board

Name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (I)
Description:
"Dandelion, Dandelion, ride the wind to a faraway land," the Fox chants.
An unforgettable Mondstadt fairytale about a hunter and a fox. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, an 11-part story, begins here.

Name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (II)
Description:
"Be good and stay put." Trapped by a Mist Flower, what does fate have in store by the fox who met a hunter?
The story of the Hunter and the Fox continues in Part 2.

Name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (III)
Description:
The Hunter of fruitless hunts was awoken by a commotion outside. Who is at his door?
The story of the Hunter and the Fox continues. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 3.

Name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (V)
Description:
Upon accepting the Fox's conditions, he came to the place where all the prey who disappeared had eventually gone to — an endless field of dandelions.
The story of the Hunter and the Fox in the sea of dandelions. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 5.

Name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (VI)
Description:
"Why do you want to learn the language of human?" "So I can befriend humans when I become one."
The child-like voice says, in the sea of dandelions. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 6.

Name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (VII)
Description:
"Dandelion, Dandelion, ride the wind to a faraway land," the Fox chants.
Can the Hunter also learn magic to make his wish come true? The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 7.

Name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (X)
Description:
The somber parting has finally arrived... The Fox bids farewell to its mother, teacher, and the dandelion sea.
It's time to live up to the promise. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 10.

Name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (XI)
Description:
"Dandelion, Dandelion, ride the wind to a faraway land," the Fox chants.
An unforgettable Mondstadt fairytale about a hunter and a fox. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, the final installment.

Name: Hilichurl Ballad Selection (I)
Description: The masterpiece of the Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian! Scholar Jacob Musk will show you the mysterious spiritual world of the hilichurls through this poetry collection!

Name: Hilichurl Ballad Selection (II)
Description: Are wine and poetry a part of the hilichurl lifestyle? Do they have pure and devout desires? Expert on the hilichurls, Jacob Musk, is here to answer!

Name: Vera's Melancholy (V)
Description:
You can't have picnics on the sides of a galactic highway! Even the deities will be held fully responsible for road accidents that might occur!
The doorway to a study in a simple village connects to anywhere in space and time! Having tea with the deities, playing hide-and-seek across time... Vera's great adventure continues!

Name: Vera's Melancholy (IX)
Description:
"Vera's so beautiful, like a shining star in the universe, but I..." "Boys at this age are always more petite than girls of a similar age."
Childhood must be let go of to welcome the coming of the adolescent years. It's not too late to think about it now... Real melancholy finally hits Vera.

Name: Vera's Melancholy (X)
Description:
"It's enough. Let's go home... The furthest place I've dreamt of, is the Delphi where you are."
Though the explanation is delayed, you should know that Delphi is the center of Greek mythology. Vera's Melancholy - the perfect ending... or is it?

Name: Breeze Amidst the Forest - Ballad Selection Excerpt
Description: A collection of Mondstadt ballads, recorded, compiled and arranged by scholars centuries ago.

Name: The Boar Princess (I)
Description:
A long, long time ago, in the forest kingdom... What legends occurred there?
The Boar Princess, Part 1. A story about friendship, love, and death.

Name: The Boar Princess (II)
Description:
A lifeless ice field, a land even the gentle Anemo Archon has never visited. How is it that it still has its lonely inhabitants?
The Boar Princess, Part 2. The story continues on the glacier.

Name: The Boar Princess (III)
Description:
"Now and evermore shall you be bereft of hope." What fate awaits the wolf pup who bears such a cruel curse?
The Boar Princess, Part 3.

Name: The Boar Princess (IV)
Description:
The wolf pup grew up in the cold loneliness. The secret past of the lone wolf is now revealed.
The Boar Princess, Part 4.

Name: The Boar Princess (V)
Description:
"No one deserves this fate." The good princess sheds a tear of compassion. For those who persevere as true companions, even the ice shall melt before their determination.
The Boar Princess, Part 5.

Name: The Boar Princess (VII)
Description:
All the sacrifices made out in the frozen plains were not in vain. The perfect ending of friendship, love, life and death!
This is the end to the famous and touching story, The Boar Princess.

Name: The Mondstadt Tower (I)
Description:
In the age of depression and tyranny, the outlander girl met the ominous orphan. Does this fateful encounter foretell a tragic ending?
The historic romance novel, The Mondstadt Tower, begins!

Name: Gliding Instruction Manual
Description: A guidebook for the ones new to using wind gliders. It also serves as a mandatory reading material to get a gliding license in Mondstadt. It contains all the necessary info any user must know.

Name: Elemental Mark
Description: Overly Clean Cut

Name: Broken-off Branch
Description: Seems it's been rotten for a long time.

Name: Fabric Piece
Description: Wonder who left it behind?

Name: Breeze Amidst the Forest Supplement: The Dragon Tome
Description:
A supplement to the "Breeze Amidst the Forest" ballad selection with excerpts from various sources.
It tells the story of the Dragon of Mondstadt.

Name: Letter from the Abyss Order
Description: Seems to be a declaration of war from the Abyss Order to the "Darknight Hero." Many key phrases have been redacted.

Name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (I)
Description: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. This is part one, which tells the story of the Land of Night and the Moonlight Forest.

Name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (II)
Description: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. This installment tells of the meeting of the Pale Princess and the Light Prince.

Name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (III)
Description: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. This installment tells of the Pale Princess and the Light Prince's decision to save the Moonlight Forest.

Name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (IV)
Description: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. Installment four describes the meeting between the Pale Princess, the Light Prince, and the Six Pygmies.

Name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (V)
Description: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. In this installment, the Six Pygmies' sinister scheme starts to unfold.

Name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (VI)
Description: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. This installment tells of how the Six Pygmies managed to implement their nefarious plot.

Name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (VII)
Description: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. The final installment brings everything to a conclusion, and includes the Night Mother's prophecy.

Name: 1000 Years of Loneliness
Description: The beginning of the Springvale Hunter's tragic fantasy journey. Where did misfortune first befall him? What marks the start and finish of the 1000-year journey of loneliness? Let this first volume of 1000 Years of Loneliness be your guide through the fantastical fog that is the life of Gothson.

Name: Teyvat Travel Guide - Mondstadt
Description: A magazine by the Adventurers' Guild. Each issue introduces great sceneries across Teyvat. This issue includes a short traveling diary of Alice the Traveler on her experiences in Mondstadt.

Name: Wind, Courage, and Wings
Description: A book mistakenly taken by Amber... about fables?

Name: Hunting Trap
Description: Used to trap beasts of a certain size. If you pay attention in the wilds to collect them, you can make one like this. Set one down, and then conceal it carefully.

Name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Qingce Village
Description: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald, at a makeshift camp. It stills looks new, and smells like the fragrant herbs of Mt. Qingce.

Name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Luhua Pool
Description: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald, at a makeshift camp. It seems to have been dipped in water, with the watermark of a fox's footprint.

Name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Yaoguang Shoal
Description: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald. The pages smell like the sea breeze.

Name: Letter for Dongdong
Description: A letter treasured by Dongdong from Qingce Village. It seems to be a letter from his father.

Name: Someone's Diary I: Yaoguang Shoal
Description: A diary left behind by someone in the wilderness that tells of the owner's unfortunate encounters at Yaoguang Shoal.

Name: Someone's Diary II: Guili Plains
Description: A diary left behind by someone in the wilderness that tells of the owner's unfortunate encounters at Guili Plains.

Name: Someone's Diary III: Jueyun Karst
Description: A diary left behind by someone in the wilderness that tells of the owner's adventures at Jueyun Karst.

Name: Someone's Diary IV: Liyue Harbor
Description: A diary left behind by someone in Liyue that tells of the owner's adventures there.

Name: Scattered Page
Description: (TEST) Adventure Journal Page

Name: Intact Tome
Description: (TEST) Adventure Journal

Name: "Of Mountains and Seas"
Description: Notes penned by Leonard, an adventurer from the distant past. Clearly an ancient text, it has suffered much wear and tear. Most of the content has been lost to the ravages of time, with just a few fragments remaining.

Name: Hearty Mushrooms
Description: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

Name: Crunchy Carrots
Description: A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.

Name: A Plump Cabbage
Description: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

Name: Azurite
Description: A piece of plaustrite dug up from the roots of a Bloatty Floatty. It has a rather unique color and is, perhaps, the Azurite that Wang'ya spoke of...

Name: Vermillionite
Description: A piece of plaustrite plucked from a Ruin Hunter. It has a rather unique color and is, perchance, the Vermillionite that Wang'ya mentioned...

Name: Letter to the Treasure Hoarders
Description: A letter written by someone to the Treasure Hoarders about some plans for the Lantern Rite...

Name: Nephrite Ring
Description: A Nephrite Ring obtained from a slime. Gorgeous color and clearly a top-quality item. This must be Mr. Zhu's lost property.

Name: Delicious Golden Crab
Description: Crab meat that's been rolled in flour, deep fried, and then pan fried together with ginger and garlic. When you finally plate up, the crab appears to be lying on gold.

Name: Wyatt's Red Key
Description: A key to the warehouse's gates kept by Wyatt. The likeliness of him losing it is next to him losing his slim wallet.

Name: Wyatt's Black Key
Description: A key to the warehouse's gates kept by Wyatt. The likeliness of him losing it is next to him losing his slim wallet.

Name: Coin Pouch
Description: A small coin pouch of Mora that doesn't weigh much; you'd sometimes forget it's even there.

Name: Meal Fee Pouch
Description: A small coin pouch of Mora that contains payment for a meal ordered at the Good Hunter. Do not take your cut out of this bag.

EffectDescription: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
Name: Delicious Sticky Honey Roast
Description: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The warm honey draws out the flavor of the meat, creating a flavor explosion akin to bathing in the warm summer sun.

Name: Sturdy Plank
Description: A sturdy plank. It feels heavy and reliable, and easy to apply to all sorts of scenarios.

Name: Fragile Wooden Plank
Description: A fragile wooden plank that is easily breakable. It doesn't serve much of a purpose aside from pretending that you're strong.

Name: A Bundle of Ropes
Description: A bundle of sturdy ropes long enough to temporarily hold certain things together for a time, however short it may be.

Name: Meal Fee Pouch
Description: A small coin pouch of Mora that contains payment for a meal ordered at the Good Hunter. Do not take your cut out of this bag.

Name: Lost Coin Pouch
Description: A small coin pouch of Mora that doesn't weigh much; you'd sometimes forget it's even there.

Name: Meal Fee Pouch
Description: A small coin pouch of Mora that contains payment for a meal ordered at the Good Hunter. Do not take your cut out of this bag.

EffectDescription: Increases all party members' ATK by 95 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
Name: Delicious Fried Radish Balls
Description: Fried Radish Balls. It's insane that something so delicious comes from plain old radishes! All who eat them will truly understand Liyue's culinary reputation.

EffectDescription: Increases all party members' DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
Name: Delicious Calla Lily Seafood Soup
Description: A balanced combination of seafood. The crab, mint, and Calla Lily come together perfectly to dance on your tongue. It reminds you of playing barefoot by the lake in summer.

Name: Bag of Goods
Description: A bag that is quite heavy. Once picked up, you can't help but think of asking someone else for a hand.

Name: Processed Noctilucous Jade
Description: TEST Processed Noctilucous Jade

Name: "Mondstadt Sunset"
Description: A pretty and sweet cocktail. The juice slowly sinks in the clear liquor like the sunset. A favorite among couples.

Name: "Margaret"
Description: Margaret's refreshing signature cocktail, popular among those who only want one drink. It also uses dandelions, but the greatest difference between this and dandelion wine is the price.

Name: "Charged Attack"
Description: A straight liquor shot, giving you the original taste of the distilled liquor itself. One shot is enough to make your body burn.

Name: "Pearl"
Description: A mellow beer with thick layer of foam on top. The flying bubbles from making toasts gave it its name.

Name: Messy "Mondstadt Sunset"
Description: Though the taste is acceptable, but it has lost its aesthetic value due to a mistake in the making.

Name: Unusual "Margaret"
Description: It looks alright, but a mistake in the making cost it its refreshing taste.

Name: Bizarre "Charged Attack"
Description: A shot without the taste of the distilled liquor and pretty much anything else... Something must have gone wrong.

Name: Unusual "Pearl"
Description: Though the taste is acceptable, but a mistake in the making cost it its texture.

Name: Odd Cocktail
Description: A fruity cocktail, but it somehow tastes different from what Quinn described.

Name: Messy Cocktail
Description: A drink with a messy taste, definitely not what Margaret promised.

Name: Bizarre Cocktail
Description: There are tastes of different liquors aside from the distilled liquor... This is not what Draff wanted.

Name: Unusual Beer
Description: There are bubbles and foams, sure, but it somehow tastes different from what Jack described.

Name: Barely Drinkable Cocktail
Description: Due to mistakes made while adding ingredients, this wine has undergone some unpleasant changes...

Name: Unknown Cocktail
Description: A cocktail never before seen. Kinda makes one wanna try.

Name: Plain Liquor
Description: A common alcoholic drink available anywhere.

Name: (TEST) Cocktail 16
Description: (TEST) The latest creation of the new bartender in Mondstadt

Name: (TEST) Cocktail 17
Description: (TEST) The latest creation of the new bartender in Mondstadt

Name: (TEST) Cocktail 18
Description: (TEST) The latest creation of the new bartender in Mondstadt

Description: (TEST) The latest creation of the new bartender in Mondstadt

Description: (TEST) The latest creation of the new bartender in Mondstadt

Description: (TEST) The latest creation of the new bartender in Mondstadt

Description: (TEST) The latest creation of the new bartender in Mondstadt

Description: (TEST) The latest creation of the new bartender in Mondstadt

Name: Godwin's Letter
Description: A love letter from Godwin to Glory detailing their love and the intimate things they did, which would make any reader blush. However, only the last part is somewhat memorable.

Name: Someone's Drifting Bottle
Description: A hefty bottle that came drifting with the waves, carrying tokens of an old friendship and the hopes of being reunited.

Name: Tunner's Cough Syrup
Description: Cough Syrup made from Sweet Flower that can moderately suppress cough. Due to its sweet and refreshing taste, the syrup is very popular among kids in Mondstadt. Some kids even wish they had a cough so they can get the syrup.

Name: Draff's Letter
Description: A letter from Draff to Sister Grace. It was tightly sealed, but it wasn't enough to withstand the brute force of the hilichurls.

Name: Materials for Training Dummy
Description: All sorts of materials. These should be just enough to make a training dummy.

Name: Sara's Letter
Description: A thick-set letter sent back from Liyue Harbor to Sara. Several feathers are still stuck in the envelope, signifying the effort that carrier pigeon put in and the sort of treatment it received.

Name: Clean Radish
Description: Rich in fiber and nutrients. Easy to grow and harvest.

Name: (TEST) Klee's Notebook
Description: (TEST) Klee's Notebook

Name: Guy's Letter
Description: A letter from Guy to his father sealed as per regulation of the Knights of Favonius. It is tightly sealed to deter influence of rain and perplexity.

Name: Quinn's Special
Description: A list of ingredients Quinn needs for his cocktail. If other ingredients are used, what kind of result could one expect?

Name: Margaret's Special
Description: A list of ingredients Margaret needs for her cocktail. If other ingredients are used, what kind of result could one expect?

Name: Jack's Special
Description: A list of ingredients Jack needs for his cocktail. If other ingredients are used, what kind of result could one expect?

Name: Draff's Special
Description: A list of ingredients Draff needs for his cocktail. If other ingredients are used, what kind of result could one expect?

Name: Teyvat Travel Guide - Liyue
Description: A magazine by the Adventurers' Guild. Each issue introduces great sceneries across Teyvat. This issue includes a short traveling diary of Alice the Traveler in Liyue.

Name: Letter
Description: A letter written by Xingqiu to the Feiyun Commerce Guild. The handwriting is so messy its barely recognizable.

Name: A Huge Bag of Mora
Description: A heavy bag full of Mora provided by the Feiyun Commerce Guild. Enough to purchase every Cor Lapis available in Liyue.

Name: Legend of the Shattered Halberd (VI)
Description:
Mir once again chanted the forgotten spell. The maiden was reunited with him again. "So, this is what you truly look like."
"The world is beyond repair. It shall be born anew from the ashes of the last." The mad Celestial Emperor sentenced all living things of the world to a harsh punishment.
"But you, you would understand me, wouldn't you?" The nameless thief who stole the national treasure said to his lord.
"No. No apologies necessary, for you are benevolent."

Name: Intact Training Dummy
Description: An intact training dummy. Very sturdy, perfect for training.

Name: Legend of the Geo Archon: God of the Stove
Description: Stories about the Geo Archon as the God of the Stove.

Name: Legend of the Geo Archon: The Groundbreaker
Description: Stories about the Geo Archon and his divine duties as The Groundbreaker.

Name: Legend of the Geo Archon: God of Wealth
Description: Stories about the Geo Archon and his divine duties as the God of Wealth.

Name: Legend of the Geo Archon: God of History
Description: Stories about the Geo Archon and his divine duties as the God of History.

Name: The Wrath of Haishan
Description: Segments from "The Wrath of Haishan," mentioned by Liu Su, that features the story of The Crux...

Name: Ring of Raining Blades (I)
Description: Segments from "Ring of Raining Blades (I)," mentioned by Liu Su, that features the story of the Guhua Clan...

Name: Ring of Raining Blades (II)
Description: Segments from "Ring of Raining Blades (II)," mentioned by Liu Su, that features the story of the Guhua Clan...

Name: Meal Box by Smiley Yanxiao for Jiangxue
Description: A tightly sealed meal box. It's quite heavy, it must contain quite a big portion.

Name: A log of ships coming in and out by Little Lulu
Description: An elegantly-written note by Little Lulu. It reads, "1 ship came into Liyue Harbor yesterday morning."

Name: A log of ships coming in and out by Little Lulu
Description: An elegantly-written note by Little Lulu. It reads, "2 ships came into Liyue Harbor yesterday morning."

Name: A log of ships coming in and out by Little Lulu
Description: An elegantly-written note by Little Lulu. It reads, "No ships came in or out of Liyue Harbor yesterday morning."

Name: A log of ships coming in and out by Little Fei
Description: A scribbled note by Little Fei. It reads, "1 ship sailed out of Liyue Harbor yesterday at noon."

Name: A log of ships coming in and out by Little Fei
Description: A scribbled note by Little Fei. It reads "2 ships sailed into Liyue Harbor yesterday at noon."

Name: A log of ships coming in and out by Little Fei
Description: A scribbled note by Little Fei. It reads "3 ships sailed into Liyue Harbor yesterday at noon."

Name: A log of ships coming in and out by Little Meng
Description: A neatly-written note by Little Meng. It reads, "No ships sailed in or out of Liyue Harbor last night."

Name: A log of ships coming in and out by Little Meng
Description: A neatly-written note by Little Meng. It reads, "1 ship sailed out of Liyue Harbor last night."

Name: A log of ships coming in and out by Little Meng
Description: A neatly-written note by Little Meng. It reads, "3 ships sailed into Liyue Harbor last night."

Name: Sealed Package
Description: A heavy and tightly sealed packaged with a novel written by Chang the Ninth. It seems that he doesn't want people to read his works...

Name: First Apprentice of Guhua
Description: A novel by Chang the Ninth. Its thickness and weight say much about the effort he put in.

Name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Guyun Stone Forest
Description: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald, by chance. The pages are damp and seem to have been soaked in water.

Name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Sal Terrae
Description: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald. The pages are littered with a small amount of shiny but bitter salt crystals.

Name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Qingyun Peak, Jueyun Karst
Description: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald. The pages have the scent of flowers that grow on cliffs.

Name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Aocang Lake, Jueyun Karst
Description: A diary of the famed adventurer, Roald, left by the lake. It tells of his plans after his adventures on Mt. Aocang.

Name: Treasure Map of Lone Gorge
Description: A treasure map obtained from Bolai of a hidden treasure somewhere out there...

Name: Treasure Map of Lone Gorge
Description: A treasure map obtained from Bolai of a hidden treasure somewhere out there...

Name: Treasure Map of Lone Gorge
Description: A treasure map obtained from Bolai of a hidden treasure somewhere out there...

Name: Poorly-Sealed Box
Description: A box that's carelessly sealed. The content doesn't seem important.

Name: Tightly-Sealed Box
Description: A box that's tightly sealed. The content must be important...

Name: Katheryne's Letter
Description: A tightly-sealed letter packed with other supporting documents that prove the bearer of the letter to be a reliable and experienced adventurer.

Name: Records of Jueyun: Stone Beasts
Description: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on the legends of stone beasts.

Name: Records of Jueyun: Palace Beneath the Sea
Description: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on ancient fictional stories.

Name: Verses of Equilibrium
Description: Legend has that it contains ancient incantations used to pay respects to Rex Lapis and the yaksha adepti. It also serves as a historical record of the ancient belief in the Geo Archon.

Name: Records of the Gallant: The Hermit
Description: A compilation of stories and legends of various knights-errant in Liyue. Some of them have been told for a long time but are still popular among the people.

Name: Customs of Liyue: Flower Ball
Description: A book on the cultures and customs of Liyue originally compiled by Fadhlan, a scholar from Sumeru residing in Liyue. It was then edited by many local scholars and published. It is one of the bestsellers in Liyue.

Name: Stone Tablet Compilations: Vol. I
Description: A history book compiled and translated from ancient stone tablets of Liyue by the historian Zichang. It contains various fragmented historical events.

Name: Humor From Tianheng
Description: A poetry collection by Pingshan, The Mystic. The quality of the poems is all over the place, but it has long been a reference book for young poets or poet-wannabes in Liyue.

Name: Hilichurl Cultural Customs (I)
Description: It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume features the social structure and characteristics of the hilichurls.

Name: Hilichurl Cultural Customs (II)
Description: It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume features the beliefs and spiritual world of the hilichurls.

Name: Hilichurl Cultural Customs (IV)
Description: It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume explores the diverse cultural customs of the hilichurls in relation to Mondstadt's.

Name: History of Kings and Clans: Prologue
Description: A comprehensive history of Mondstadt edited and compiled by the Northland History Society.

Name: Biography of Gunnhildr
Description: A history book on the life of the apical ancestor of the Gunnhildr Clan compiled by Eckhart Gunnhildr, a modern historian of Mondstadt. It consists of fragmented stories and legends from the aristocratic period.

Name: Ballads of the Squire (I)
Description: Ballads that have been passed down since the aristocratic period and are said to come from Ragnvindr the Dawn Knight himself. They tell of Ragnvindr's days as a knight's squire.

Name: Ballads of the Squire (II)
Description: Ballads that have been passed down since the aristocratic period and are said to come from Ragnvindr the Dawn Knight himself. They tell of Ragnvindr's friendship with a sword-dancer.

Name: Teyvat Wilderness Survivalist's Recipes
Description: Field-cooking skills are paramount to surviving in the wilderness. Lynn, a 10-year Adventurers' Guild veteran, teaches you how to cook delicious and fulfilling food in times of emergency in the wilderness!

Name: Treasure Map of Giant's Steps
Description: A treasure map obtained from Bolai of a hidden treasure somewhere out there...

Name: Treasure Map of Giant's Steps
Description: A treasure map obtained from Bolai of a hidden treasure somewhere out there...

Name: Treasure Map of Giant's Steps
Description: A treasure map obtained from Bolai of a hidden treasure somewhere out there...

Name: Treasure Map of The Vast Blue
Description: A treasure map obtained from Bolai of a hidden treasure somewhere out there...

Name: Treasure Map of The Vast Blue
Description: A treasure map obtained from Bolai of a hidden treasure somewhere out there...

Name: Treasure Map of The Vast Blue
Description: A treasure map obtained from Bolai of a hidden treasure somewhere out there...

Name: Yakshas: The Guardian Adepti
Description: A volume out of the "Wonders and Folklore of Liyue" collection, which serves as Liyue's own version of "Tour of the Land of Liyue," an encyclopedia of folk beliefs and customs by Masudi, a scholar from Sumeru. Due to the archaic nature of the author's writing style, it was largely dismissed by the public and publishers alike. "Yakshas: The Guardian Adepti" introduces the readers to the various yakshas who fought side-by-side with the Geo Archon.

Name: Special Almond Tofu
Description: The signature dish of Smiley Yanxiao, the chef of Wangshu Inn. It has a sweet taste but also retains the bitterness of the almonds. Its refreshing taste and mild fragrance shall impress even the adepti.

Name: Dropped Package
Description: A package that has been left on the ground. It's not very heavy; the sound of something clattering inside can be heard when picking it up. It must contain many small objects.

Name: Sigil of Permission
Description: A token lent out from "Childe" of the Fatui. Normally, the people of Liyue only hold rituals to worship the adepti in the peripheral areas of Jueyun Karst; however, he who holds this token may safely enter the residence of the adepti.

Name: Legend of the Shattered Halberd (I)
Description:
In ancient times when Axis Mundi was unobstructed, there were nine realms, each a world of its own. The realm of humans was known as the Zhongzhou, while the gods reside in Shenxiao.
At the end of the last calamity, a war between the gods broke out. The God King fell, setting the nine realms ablaze, obliterating all living things. The realms have now been born anew, life again thrives, but the passageway between the nine realms by Axis Mundi has been sealed off.
An all-new graphic novel on the epic journey in search of the God-King's Halberd begins!

Name: Legend of the Shattered Halberd (II)
Description: Mir, having stumbled onto the journey to retrieve the swords by accident, encountered a huge crisis before the journey had even begun. Imperial Guard and Imperial Escort elites were slain by enemies holding the Ominous Swords. Amidst grave danger, Mir recalled a spell taught by his father. Legend has that, the Celestial Emperor has a young daughter whose name was not known to the world; she now possessed Weiyang's body and revealed herself. Who would prevail? The wielders of the Ominous Swords who had turned into ferocious demons? Or Mir who could somewhat hold his own in a fight?

Name: Legend of the Shattered Halberd (III)
Description:
"Just stay with the name 'Weiyang' for convenience's sake on the road. With the official documents from the government in hand, you should be free to go as you wish throughout the kingdom." Still worried about Weiyang, Mir decided to accompany her on her journey and kill any demons they may encounter.
Though they had already collected five Ominous Swords and all seemed to be well, they knew in their hearts that the way forward would only get more treacherous and perilous.

Name: Legend of the Shattered Halberd (IV)
Description:
"Calm down, my son. Listen, Mir. I am not your real father..."
"Noooooo!"
The once Minister of Imperial Banquets was, in truth, Khan the Asura from Jotunheim. Leaving the capital was but an act in collaboration with the Minister of Ceremonies and the Grand Secretary to protect the daughter of the Celestial Emperor.
"The late Celestial Emperor Shenxiao, the now Contra Mundi, was once a dear friend of mine. But now, knowing that you have successfully summoned her, all my wishes have been fulfilled."

Name: Legend of the Shattered Halberd (V)
Description:
"There are many among the military officials who wish to unseal Axis Mundi since the world in chaos would greatly elevate the position and importance of the Martial Artists."
"They want to wage another War of the Asuras?"
"He does."
The tug-of-war between the civil and military officials and the schemes of the past gods once again threatens all of the nine realms!

Name: Heart's Desire: Moonlight
Description: A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.

Name: Heart's Desire: Crystal Glaze
Description: A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.

Name: Heart's Desire: Sapphire
Description: A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.

Name: Heart's Desire: Stone Heart
Description: A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.

Name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Qingxu Pool
Description: Diary of a renowned adventurer, Roald. Spots of shiny green moss can be seen among the pages.

Name: Traveler's Notes
Description: A clue found in the northern Guili Plains ruins: "To unite in ambition is to be steadfast and immovable for all time."

Name: Traveler's Notes
Description: A clue found in the eastern Guili Plains ruins: "Wisdom is like water, it nourishes all those who receive it and in it is a reflection of the truth."

Name: Traveler's Notes
Description: A clue found in the southern Guili Plains ruins: "Fortify the bones, that movement be supple when the time comes."

Name: Traveler's Notes
Description: A clue found in the western Guili Plains ruins: "Virtue grows tall like a tree, though there be shade it will flourish forever."

Name: Censer
Description: A censer used for burning incense.

Name: Seven-Star Lamp
Description: Seven-Star Lamp

Name: Letter from Starsnatcher
Description: Letter left by Starsnatcher

Name: Special Mondstadt Hash Brown
Description:
A Mondstadt Hash Brown stuffed with chopped Philanemo Mushrooms. It's much tastier and more nutritious than the average hash brown.
They say a father who truly loved Mondstadt Hash Browns prepared these for his unborn son.

Name: Dendro-Processed Berry
Description: It's a berry that's been digested by a Dendro Slime. From the outside, it appears the same as any other ordinary berry. Will using it for herbal medicine really have any effect?

Name: Thick Hydro Slime Condensate
Description: A thick blob of Hydro Slime Condensate. You can't help but get a strange sense of satisfaction while sloshing it in your hands. As for its taste...

Name: Wind-Caressed Aster
Description: A Windwheel Aster that's been through the gentle caress of an Anemo Slime. Although its appearance hasn't changed, faint puffs of air seem to escape between your fingers as you hold it in your hand.

Name: Collected Fragment
Description: A delicate fragment of carved stone. It seems to have something inscribed on it, perhaps only locals could decipher its exact meaning...

Name: Collected Fragment
Description: A delicate fragment of carved stone. It seems to have something inscribed on it, perhaps only locals could decipher its exact meaning...

Name: Collected Fragment
Description: A delicate fragment of carved stone. It seems to have something inscribed on it, perhaps only locals could decipher its exact meaning...

Name: Transcription from a stone tablet
Description:
"...In the beginning, when the people assembled to farm the land..."
The transcript seems to be a record of some event...

Name: Transcription from a stone tablet
Description:
"...A god named Guizhong descended, whose dominion was over Dust, and whose reach shrouded the skies for thousands of miles around..."
The transcript seems to be a record of some event...

Name: Transcription from a stone tablet
Description:
"...The god laid down four commandments for the people..."
The transcript seems to be a record of some event...

Name: Transcription from a stone tablet
Description:
"...Then another god descended, whose dominion was over Geo, and who brought the people of Liyue to this place. Jointly they shepherded the people for their protection..."
The transcript seems to be a record of some event...

Name: Transcription from a stone tablet
Description:
"...And the assembly was named Guili after the names of the two gods..."
The transcript seems to be a record of some event...

Name: Transcription from a ruin
Description:
"...and there they fought upon the Guili Plains, where black dust choked the heavens and a thousand rocks splintered..."
The transcript seems to be a record of a terrible war...

Name: Transcription from a ruin
Description:
Guizhong's Four Commandments are: "Teach with wisdom, be bound by virtue, fortify the bones, unite in ambition — the convergence of these four shall be known as the 'Guili Assembly.'"
"...One can bear not to leave one's native land. A treasure lies in Guili, and Guizhong's Four Commandments shall guide those in generations to come who aspire to find it, if they would test themselves against the Four."
This transcript seems to be a letter that was left behind by someone...

Name: Hidden Treasure of Qingce
Description: The hidden treasure of Mt. Qingce contains enormous Energy.

Name: Draft Lines of Hilichurlian Poetry
Description: A list of lines from Ella Musk. On the front are many terms in Hilichurlian, and the back has some simple footnotes regarding the content...

Name: A Letter by Timmie
Description: An envelope that has been tightly sealed. Inside is a letter, inked characters, a Dandelion, love, and a wisp of hope. All these will be safely preserved inside until the seal is opened.

Name: Marjorie's Recommended Gift
Description: A gift that was recommended by Marjorie. It isn't very heavy; what kind of souvenirs could be packed inside?

Name: A Gift from Quinn
Description: A gift from Quinn. He mentioned that Beatrice helped him prepare it.

Name: Sara's Special Dish
Description: A special dish that Sara had specially made for Jilliana. What dish could it be? And what could be so special about it?

Name: Traveling Merchant's Package
Description: A package given from a traveling merchant to Huai'an, boss of the Wangshu Inn. There seems to be some gifts inside. It's heavy enough to pique your interest, but not so heavy as to make you worry.

Name: Box of Goods Invoices
Description: A box containing invoices of goods. Common sense says that to avoid raising any suspicion, it's usually best to not open to open the box and take a peek.

Name: Box of Goods Invoices
Description: Although it only contains papers, it's still pretty heavy. You can't help but to start sympathizing the merchants that deal with them daily.

Name: Box of Goods Invoices
Description: A box containing various invoices. It appears to have been opened once before and then tightly sealed back up. What nature of business could make even one who stumbles upon the box feel at nerve's end?

Name: Heart of Clear Springs (I)
Description: A legendary tale passed down by Springvale hunters that portrays an encounter between an unknown young boy and a spring fairy.
