Name: Heart of Clear Springs (II)
Description: A legendary tale passed down by Springvale hunters that recounts the acquaintance of a spring fairy and a young boy.

Name: Heart of Clear Springs (III)
Description: A legendary tale passed down by Springvale hunters that recounts a promise made between a spring fairy and a young boy.

Name: Heart of Clear Springs (IV)
Description: A legendary tale passed down by Springvale hunters that recounts a bitter ending finally faced by a boy who was no longer young and a spring fairy who had not grown old.

Name: Linling's Anthology of Selected Poetry
Description: A collection of poetry that Linling published at her own expense. It is her first publication, and she is very proud of it.

Name: Goods Invoice
Description: An invoice with information of goods recorded on it. With only a few simple goods listed on it, someone must have selected these items.

Name: Invoice of Goods Quantities
Description: Some manifests of goods that has only had their numbers checked out. This may seem like a very simple job, but one must still focus in order to ensure that no mistakes are made.

Name: Golden House Maiden
Description:
Silk Flowers from which perfume used in the Rite of Parting is made.
This species originally grew under complex hydrological conditions. Its foliage is abundant, its leaves are evergreen, and its stamen is as fair as a Golden House Maiden.

Name: Valley Weaver
Description:
Silk Flowers from which perfume used in the Rite of Parting is made.
This variety originally grew in dark, damp locations. It is known for its profusion of petals, densely packed stamens, and powerful scent.

Name: Fate's Yearning
Description:
Silk Flowers from which perfume used in the Rite of Parting is made.
In the past, this strain would grow among cloud-ringed peaks. It is a reclusive species, and has a subtle yet enduring scent.

Name: Golden House Maiden Essential Oil
Description: The essence of decocted Silk Flowers. It can be further refined into perfume. Gives off a sweet scent.

Name: Valley Weaver Essential Oil
Description: The essence of decocted Silk Flowers. It can be further refined into perfume. Gives off an intense scent.

Name: Fate's Yearning Essential Oil
Description: The essence of decocted Silk Flowers. It can be further refined into perfume. Gives off an elegant scent.

Name: Bao'er's Empty Box
Description: A light and empty box. It doesn't seem as though this fragile container has much protective ability...

Name: Heavy Box
Description: A box containing cultural relics. Its ponderous weight makes one feel like it could break at any time...

Name: Sopping Wet Page
Description: A page of a book that has been soaked through in water. It must have been in there for a long time, as the words have become so smudged as to be illegible.

Name: A Huge Bag of Mora
Description:
Funds provided by Childe. The sense of stability one gets from its weight also makes one unwilling to part with the money...
The face value of each of these gold coins is very large, but they can be redeemed for smaller change at the Northland Bank.

Name: Golden House Maiden Perfume
Description:
A perfume decocted from a special breed of Silk Flower.
It releases a scent that reminds one of sweet dreams. Perhaps it is the best fit for innocent young ladies.

Name: Valley Weaver Perfume
Description:
A perfume decocted from a special breed of Silk Flower.
It releases a thick, oppressive aroma. They say that it is very popular among the daughters of wealthy families.

Name: Fate's Yearning Perfume
Description:
A perfume decocted from a special breed of Silk Flower.
It releases a fragrance as elegant as the elusive, smoky mountain mist. One hears that it is a favorite of mature women.

Name: A Box of Gadgets
Description: A box that contains the gadgets Soraya gave to you. You can feel its weight in your hand. It should be able to satisfy the greed of certain people.

Name: Cleansing Bell
Description:
It is said that this magic bell was prepared specifically for adepti. Its sound rings through the air and does not fade quickly, and can be used to purify the mortal realm.
It seems to have a life of its own, even as you hold it in your hand...

Name: Guizhong Ballista Maintenance Material
Description:
Spare parts for the Guizhong Ballista that have been stored away since antiquity.
While they may seem like ordinary components, they have been made with special construction techniques, and to special design specifications.

Name: A Record of Qiming and Zhihua's Conversation
Description: A record of Qiming and Zhihua's conversation. It seems like banal passing of the buck, but it feels like there is some tacit understanding hidden within...

Name: A Record of Sisi and Chaoxi's Conversation
Description: A record of Sisi and Chaoxi's conversation. At first glance, the impression it makes is one of endless evasion, and of avoiding the brunt of work...

Name: A Record of Little Meng, Little Fei, and Little Lulu's Conversation
Description: A record of Little Meng, Little Fei and Little Lulu's conversation. It appears to only be the straightforward conversation of children. But one can dimly sense some unnameable emotion sprouting in the hearts of the children. Perhaps this sprout will continue to gradually grow until its branches stretch out across the skies, no longer able to be ignored by anyone...

Name: Norma's Order
Description: Norma's food order. You can feel its warmth in your hand.

Name: Hilichurl Ballad: Recital Draft
Description: A Hilichurlian poem created by Ella Musk. According to her, this Recital of Friendship is the work of many hands. Still, you can't help but feel that something sounds a bit off when you read it...

Name: Hilichurl Ballad: Narrative Draft
Description: A Hilichurlian poem created by Ella Musk. According to her, this Stirring Narrative is the work of many hands. Still, you can't help but feel that something sounds a bit off when you read it...

Name: Hilichurl Ballad: Lyrical Draft
Description: A Hilichurlian poem created by Ella Musk. According to her, this Elegant Lyric Poem is the work of many hands. Still, you can't help but feel that something sounds a bit off when you read it...

Name: Vile's Gift
Description: A gift acquired from Vile. Given how heavy it is to hold, there must be quite a lot of items inside.

Name: Stolen Relic
Description: Cultural relics dug up by the Treasure Hoarders, and packed willy-nilly into a box. When you lift the box, it feels like it could collapse at any moment.

Name: Madame Ping's Box
Description: A seemingly ordinary container that had been trapped in amber. Its weight, once held, is astounding, and no matter what you do, you can't seem to open it...

Name: A Torn Out Page
Description: A page that seems to have been forcibly torn out of a book. It has been soaked in water, and the words on it have become illegible.

Name: Page of Scribbled Writing
Description: A page with very messy handwriting. The words have been struck out with crude brushstrokes, and it has also been soaked in water to the point where nothing can be made out.

Name: Noctilucous Jade Sample
Description:
A small sample that has been sliced off in order to help you select the Noctilucous Jade you will be using to make implements for the Rite of Parting.
An ancient Liyue proverb goes: "Noctilucous Jade shines brightest in the flames," meaning that high-quality Noctilucous Jade will shine with a bright and pure azure light when exposed to high temperatures. It has also come to symbolize heroes showing their true mettle in times of crisis.

Name: A Bag of Mora
Description: Funds provided by Childe. The clinking of the coins within lifts a person's spirits.

Name: Mitachurl Loot
Description: A trophy taken from a Mitachurl. It seems to be capable of producing a very loud sound, but that probably won't be enough to shake a certain group of people free of their arrogance.

Name: Treasure Hoarder Loot
Description: A trophy taken from the Treasure Hoarders. This box is very small and isn't very heavy, and will not be able to contain the arrogance of certain people. But it should be more than enough to keep a lid on their tricks.

Name: Ruin Guard Loot
Description: A trophy seized from a Ruin Guard. It does not appear to have much value as a collector's item. But it is heavy enough that it would cause a great deal of pain, were it to be dropped onto a certain arrogant someone's foot.

Name: Noctilucous Jade Sample
Description:
A small sample that has been sliced off in order to help you select the Noctilucous Jade you will be using to make implements for the Rite of Parting.
An ancient Liyue proverb goes: "Noctilucous Jade shines brightest in the flames," meaning that high-quality Noctilucous Jade will shine with a bright and pure azure light when exposed to high temperatures. It has also come to symbolize heroes showing their true mettle in times of crisis.

Name: Noctilucous Jade Sample
Description:
A small sample that has been sliced off in order to help you select the Noctilucous Jade you will be using to make implements for the Rite of Parting.
An ancient Liyue proverb goes: "Noctilucous Jade shines brightest in the flames," meaning that high-quality Noctilucous Jade will shine with a bright and pure azure light when exposed to high temperatures. It has also come to symbolize heroes showing their true mettle in times of crisis.

Name: Everlasting Incense
Description:
A traditional incense fit for the Rite of Parting, worth 2,990,000 Mora.
There are some things in this world whose value can only be appreciated by those who understand them. Perhaps Everlasting Incense is one such thing...?

Name: Guizhong Ballista Maintenance Material
Description:
Spare parts for the Guizhong Ballista that have been stored away since antiquity.
While they may seem like ordinary components, they have been made with special construction techniques, and to special design specifications.

Name: Sturdy Wooden Plank
Description: A wooden plank well-suited to repair work. When people need repairs done, these things always come to mind.

Name: Box of Leaves
Description: A box with some leaves inside. Something feels unusual about it when you hold it in your hand, and you can't help but feel a little uneasy... can this box really contain these leaves?

Name: Treasure Hoarder's Key
Description: A key carried by a Treasure Hoarder.

Name: Alrani's Note
Description: The treasure is buried beneath the <color=#00E1FFFF>giant golden tree</color> in the middle of Lingju Pass.

Name: Nameless Treasure
Description: Anonymous treasure acquired at Qingxu Pool. There is a pattern of unknown significance on the outside. Perhaps you could get someone in Liyue Harbor with an interest in antiques to take a look at it.

Name: Nameless Treasure
Description: Anonymous treasure acquired at Lingju Pass. There is a pattern of unknown significance on the outside. Perhaps you could get someone in Liyue Harbor with an interest in antiques to take a look at it.

Name: Nameless Treasure
Description: Anonymous treasure acquired at Dunyu Ruins. There is a pattern of unknown significance on the outside. Perhaps you could get someone in Liyue Harbor with an interest in antiques to take a look at it.

Name: Stone of Remembrance
Description:
An unusual gemstone capable of removing a seal somewhere.
You can feel the turbulent thoughts racing relentlessly within when you hold it in your hand. Somewhere in this world are buried the memories of an ancient war.
"For a future without the pain of savage slaughter, for a future without lives lived in vain, for a future where every day is filled with peace..."

Name: Dull Ring
Description:
A ring that seems to have existed for a long time. Though it has become dull due to erosion over time, it is not dirty because it has been stored inside a box.
There are words engraved on the inside of the ring, still clearly legible:
"All beings suffer in war."

Name: Vermeer's Paintbrushes
Description: Around five paintbrushes of different lengths and widths, wrapped in a cloth and stored in a box. The artist clearly takes excellent care of them.

Name: Vermeer's Paints
Description: Half a box of paints of different colors. The bottle of white paint seems bigger than the others.

Name: Black and White Sketch
Description: An unfinished painting by Vermeer the artist. For some reason, black and white are the only colors that he used. Vermeer says that his lost paints and brushes are at the <color=#00E1FFFF>viewing spot</color> where he painted this work.

Name: Color Sketch
Description: An unfinished painting by Vermeer the artist. He says that his lost paints and brushes are at the <color=#00E1FFFF>viewing spot</color> where he painted this work.

Name: Nameless Sketch
Description: A painting that Vermeer completed with the Traveler's help. He says that it is his finest work to date, but still far from perfect. He is determined to keep painting.

Name: Strange Stone
Description: A circular stone with some text engraved on the side: "The house of stone envelops the timber hut." It seems like it should be fitted inside something...

Name: Fresh Qingxin
Description: The freshest Qingxin you ever saw. Just bursting with scent when you picked it. It probably needs some further processing before it's ready to brew, though.

Name: Good Hunter's Specialty Dish
Description: An extra-special item from the Good Hunter menu. A durable and travel-ready reinvention of their Satisfying Salad, intended as a gift product. Despite this, the original flavor and texture apparently doesn't quite survive long journeys.

Name: Flora's Bookmark
Description: A bookmark given to you by Flora. Made from a dried-out Windwheel Aster, even in its box you barely notice the weight of it.

Name: Special Beverage from Angel's Share
Description: An extra-special beverage obtained from the Angel's Share. Claimed to be the most cool and refreshing beverage ever, one can certainly feel the wind at the back of the throat more keenly after consuming it.

Name: Special Perfume
Description: A mint-scented perfume specially prepared for Little Lulu by Ying'er. It's the perfect scent for Lulu, Ying'er says.

Name: Mint Essential Oil
Description: Essential oil extracted from the Mint plant. Used for making perfume.

Name: Tasty Slime Condensate
Description:
Crystal-clear, thick and gooey, like gelatine... Could this be the stuff of haute-cuisine dreams?
Apparently, very few people are actually willing to try eating slime, so derivative products are typically passed off as agar-based delicacies. Only die-hard food fanatics can taste the subtle difference between the two.

Name: Extra-Sweet Sweet Flower
Description:
A plant with a rich, sweet fragrance that makes an excellent sweetener.
Some say plants have feelings too — show them enough care and attention, and they will strive to bloom all the more fragrantly. Sometimes, though, this will then make them the target of people who don't know how to mind their own business.

Name: Fresh Sweet Flower
Description: A Sweet Flower picked in the Whispering Woods. A decidedly healthy-looking specimen with a delightfully sweet aroma if you get close enough.

Name: Fresh Cecilia
Description: A Cecilia picked on Starsnatch Cliff. The whole plant still conveys a quiet sense of gentleness even outside of its natural habitat.

Name: Fresh Windwheel Aster
Description: A Windwheel Aster picked at Windrise. The petals are still spinning merrily around. It seems the wind has imbued this plant with a healthy dose of vitality.

Name: Fresh Small Lamp Grass
Description: A small lamp grass obtained from the Whispering Woods. It has been unearthed with the utmost care, and neither its stem nor leaf has been bruised.

Name: Strange Cocktail Ingredient
Description: A cocktail ingredient salvaged from a cart. When you hold it in your hand, you can't help but feel that there's something unusual about it.

Name: Teucer's Mora Pouch
Description:
A very hefty bag of cash that Teucer was all too eager to offload onto you... One wonders what sort of family this Snezhnayan kid comes from.
The face value of each of these gold coins is very large, but they can be redeemed for smaller change at the Northland Bank.

Name: Childe and Teucer's Mora Pouch
Description:
Funds for Teucer's entertainment, provided by Childe, now mixed in with the stash you received from Teucer earlier...
The face value of each of these gold coins is very large, but they can be redeemed for smaller change at the Northland Bank.

Name: Plump Sunsettia
Description: A Sunsettia, slightly plumper than most, possibly due to unique cultivation conditions. That aside, there doesn't seem to be anything particularly special about it.

Name: Merchant Poster
Description: "The Adventurers' Guild is now recruiting new members! To sign up, speak to Branch Master Cyrus in Mondstadt today."

Name: Merchant Poster
Description: "New drinks at the Cat's Tail. Your bartender today is: Diona."

Name: Merchant Poster
Description: "Try the all-new Good Hunter meal deal! Get 10% off when you purchase a Satisfying Salad and a Sticky Honey Roast in a single order."

Name: Jiayi's Gifts
Description: A huge, heavy bag of gifts bought by Jiayi for his daughter, Little Liu. Perhaps Jiayi would prefer to give it to his daughter himself?

Name: Treasure Hoarder's Map
Description: A map of Mondstadt carried by a Treasure Hoarder. Someone with terrible handwriting has made some notes on a location not too far away.

Name: Ragged Notebook
Description: Anonymously authored notes. They describe a place seemingly not far from here.

Name: Strange Stone
Description: A circular stone with some text engraved on the side: "To enter, first dot the eyes." It seems like it should be fitted inside something...

Name: Knights of Favonius Handbook - 5th Edition
Description: A code of conduct covering language usage and behavioral norms for Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius, personally edited by Acting Grand Master Jean. All knights are expected to strictly abide by these rules and regulate their words and deeds accordingly.

Name: Tales From the Waves: Rising Tide
Description: The legendary tale of an anonymous seafarer set in a time when Liyue was plagued by sea monsters.

Name: Tales From the Waves: Wild Storm
Description: To the never-ending tune of the ocean, the seafarer fought against the phenomenal foe of fate, fighting to the bitter end...

Name: Tales From the Waves: Receding Torrent
Description: Finally, when the tempest eased and the ocean surface was tranquil once more, the soft wind played a poignant homecoming tune...

Name: Hex & Hound (I)
Description: Sometimes, feelings are like the summer rain, coming out of nowhere and catching you unprepared. A nostalgic summer story set in the age of aristocrats begins right here.

Name: Hex & Hound (II)
Description: Money doesn't solve all your problems, but it can certainly solve a lot of them! A young woman's summer vacation in Mondstadt opens to the melodic tune of a symphonic sum of Mora.

Name: Hex & Hound (III)
Description: Even when you live in a safe city, you should watch out for the wolves that lurk in the night... Something more impossible to master than mass hypnosis is revealed within these pages.

Name: Hex & Hound (IV)
Description: Even a dog can learn basic things like upper-class etiquette — or so insists a certain non-nonsense teacher from afar.

Name: Hex & Hound (V)
Description: "Be a good dog! Yes, there's no reward for getting it right, but there's still a punishment for getting it wrong!" The witch in black makeup smirked.

Name: Moonlit Bamboo Forest (I)
Description: When a small-town boy looking to leave his sleepy hometown behind gets lost in a bamboo forest at sundown, what long-forgotten dreams will he encounter?

Name: Moonlit Bamboo Forest (II)
Description: As the moon slowly rises in the night sky, small-town boy meets bamboo-forest girl — but is he voyaging into the realm of the adepti, or setting foot in some monstrous trap?

Name: Moonlit Bamboo Forest (III)
Description: Deep in the bamboo forest, reality has coincided with a story from the distant past. But the crossover ends as the bright moon reaches its peak in the night sky, and small-town boy disappears into an indescribable dream.

Name: Moonlit Bamboo Forest (IV)
Description: As dawn gently approaches, the fate of the two youngsters diverges, and they go their separate ways. But the echoes of that ancient story still resound within the forest, waiting for the day that they may welcome small-town boy back into their midst once more.

Name: A Drunkard's Tale (I)
Description: One of many popular tales told of Mondstadt's drinkers. This one is the story of a drunkard who stumbled into wolven territory and the lone, starving wolf he encountered there.

Name: A Drunkard's Tale (II)
Description: One of many Mondstadt tales told of popular drinkers. This story is the one of the time a lone, starving wolf met a drunken Mondstadt man.

Name: A Drunkard's Tale (III)
Description: One of the popular, many tales told by the drinkers of Mondstadt. This drunkard is the one who told the lone wolf of an ancient story.

Name: A Drunkard's Tale (IV)
Description: One of many drinking tales popularly told in Mondstadt. This wolf told a tale of wine and wolf to a drunken man of Mondstadt.

Name: "Dwelling in the Clouds" Blueprints
Description: The designs for the Dwelling in the Clouds, built long ago by Cloud Retainer.

Name: Rex Incognito (I)
Description: A Liyue fantasy novel that tells the tales of Rex Lapis' incognito excursions in the mortal realm. Set in an age when the treasures of the world flocked forth, fact merges with fiction and both blend with old dreams in this charming tale set in the commercial port of Liyue.

Name: Rex Incognito (II)
Description: A Liyue fantasy novel that tells the tales of Rex Lapis' incognito excursions in the mortal realm. Between lofty mountain peaks where bounteous jade lies beneath, substantial ideas and empty lies are suddenly shown up side by side.

Name: Rex Incognito (III)
Description: A Liyue fantasy novel that tells the tales of Rex Lapis' incognito excursions in the mortal realm. Iron-clad concepts of rules or equity fade into nothingness in this fantastical tale.

Name: Rex Incognito (IV)
Description: A Liyue fantasy novel that tells the tales of Rex Lapis' incognito excursions in the mortal realm. In an age when scrutiny was laid upon the treasures of the world, one humble witticism was all it took to expose all lies.

Name: Legend of the Lone Sword (I)
Description: A popular martial arts novel in Liyue Harbor. In a world without elemental energy or alchemy, a tale unfolds of love and hate between friends and foes. This volume tells of the origins of Jin the Seventy-Second's revenge.

Name: Legend of the Lone Sword (II)
Description: A popular martial arts novel in Liyue Harbor. In a world without elemental energy or alchemy, a tale unfolds of love and hate between friends and foes. This volume tells of Jin the Seventy-Second's arrival in Tupi Village.

Name: Legend of the Lone Sword (III)
Description: A popular martial arts novel in Liyue Harbor. In a world without elemental energy or alchemy, a tale unfolds of love and hate between friends and foes. This volume tells of Jin the Seventy-Second's duel with the chief of Tupi Village.

Name: Legend of the Lone Sword (IV)
Description: A popular martial arts novel in Liyue Harbor. In a world without elemental energy or alchemy, a tale unfolds of love and hate between friends and foes. This volume tells of Jin the Seventy-Second's treacherous trek into the mountains.

Name: Little Liu's Gifts
Description: A little bag of gifts collected by Little Liu for her father, Jiayi. Perhaps Little Liu would prefer to give it to her father herself?

Name: Chaoxi's Reply to Cui'er
Description: A reply from Chaoxi to Cui'er. Judging from the sender's attitude, it's unlikely to be a particularly heartfelt letter.

Name: Little Yue's Gift
Description: A toy made from Starconches by Little Yue. It might not capture the sound of the sea, but it certainly captures the amount of thought he put into it.

Name: Yinxing's Letter to Bolai
Description: A letter from Yinxing to Bolai. Short, but tightly sealed.

Name: Clerk Zhao's Invoice for Jiangzhou
Description: An invoice from Clerk Zhao to Jiangzhou. There are several sheets, each with reams of text on. It seems that Jiangzhou has been putting off the planning for Lantern Rite for a very long time...

Name: Clerk Zhao's Invoice for Nervous An
Description: An invoice from Clerk Zhao to Nervous An. There are several sheets, each with reams of text on. It seems that Nervous An has been putting off collating the statistics on the ships in the harbor for a very long time...

Name: Cui'er's Letter to Chaoxi
Description: A letter from Cui'er to her lover, Chaoxi. It's a rather long letter — presumably packed with page upon page of poignant prose about how much she longs to see him again.

Name: Thick Notebook
Description: Notes written by Henry Morton. They describe a place seemingly not far from here.

Name: Jack's Map
Description: Jack's map. Huge when unfolded, but currently neatly packed into a box.

Name: Jack's Adventurer Handbook
Description: Jack's Adventurer Handbook. Issued by the Guild to every newly recruited adventurer, Jack has carefully wrapped his in a cloth and packed it into a box.

Name: Cage Key
Description:
A key used to open a wooden cage.
Of course, considering what the cage is meant to do, perhaps one should call it a "key meant to lock a wooden cage" instead?

Name: Sugar-Frosted Slime
Description:
A truly exquisite sweet treat that came to a certain someone in a dream. This dream was made a reality through someone else's hard work and, of course, a healthy dose of boom shaka-laka.
Surely this is a gift fit for someone who belongs to the upper echelons of society.

Name: Wild Glaze Lily
Description:
Wild Glaze Lilies used in the Rite of Parting.
Due to geological changes, Glaze Lilies have lost their natural habitat. They say that these plants understand human hearts, and will grow to be especially beautiful if serenaded with deep and meaningful songs.

Name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (IV)
Description:
After a few days apart, a long-awaited reunion takes place on a midsummer's night amidst a veritable blizzard of dandelion seeds.
At the direction of the fox, an ocean of dandelions opens up before the hunter's very eyes...

Name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (VIII)
Description:
"When he has mastered human language..." The fox's voice is gently carried away by the midnight breeze, drifting further and further away together with the dandelion seeds...
After all, the fox is a different kind of creature from the human, and the two do not share all the same sense of mirth and misery...

Name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (IX)
Description:
When I have taught all that there is to teach, will it be possible to see this sea of dandelions again...?
In the dandelion sea, the hunter starts to contemplate leaving.

Name: The Boar Princess (VI)
Description:
The Boar Princess and her two wise companions brave an icy wasteland and scale a snowy mountain, where they discover a very mysterious inhabitant indeed...
See how this high-altitude, low-temperature adventure unfolds in volume six of The Boar Princess.
There is some childish handwriting on the title page, which reads: "Daddy, when you get home, you have to read me the one about the snowy mountain too!"

Name: Vera's Melancholy (IV)
Description:
There is a saying that goes as follows: Not all that glitters is gold, sometimes it is the outpouring of a broken heart.
Either way, the stars in the sky certainly aren't made of gold, and most people's hearts aren't made of glass.
In any case — here is the next chapter of Vera's adventure!

Name: Vera's Melancholy (VI)
Description:
There was once a great scholar who wished to write a book about all the festive days of the empire.
After looking into it more closely, he discovered that every single day had some sort of a festival associated with it... He persevered with this monumental writing task for six months before giving up on it.
But don't worry — as far as this book is concerned, I am the author, and I won't let my readers down!

Name: Vera's Melancholy (VII)
Description:
In the star clusters at the outer reaches of the universe, habitable planets are few and far between. For this reason, the region is the playground of space captains and pirates alone.
With this being the universe, though, there is no port and starboard in the traditional sense — out here, "starboard" means whichever side of your spacecraft is oriented towards the star you are using for navigation...
Lose yourself, and especially your sense of direction, in this next chapter of Vera's starbound voyage!

Name: Vera's Melancholy (VIII)
Description:
Of course boys aren't invited to the girl's slumber party! Girls are sacrosanct, like the gods of the golden age.
Vera, the Princess, Saint King Lebannin, and Ur, alpha female of the Galactic Swarm, shall talk deep into the night!

Name: Hilichurl Cultural Customs (III)
Description: It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume features mysterious hilichurls who live apart from the others.

Name: "Of Mountains and Seas"
Description: Notes penned by Leonard, an adventurer from antiquity. Most ancient indeed. Mona has used her astrology to interpret its tattered contents and restore them.

Name: Strange Tooth
Description: A Dragontooth you picked up in Dragonspine. Perhaps someone would know something more about it...

Name: Vitalized Dragontooth
Description: A Dragontooth infused with vitality. Just its luster and texture are enough to make one uneasy...

Name: Princess' Box
Description:
A treasure box with a decorative pattern at the bottom. The ornamentation seems to be a part of a three-piece motif. Once the pattern is completed, a certain door may open.
"I'm afraid I can't finish the fresco."
"It's been a while since I last saw the blue sky and green grass. I don't know which hues to use to capture the landscape of thawing ice and snow that my father so longs for."
"By the time he comes back, everything will be back to how it was. But I can't take this cold anymore."
"Forgive me, Father. Ukko, I'm sorry you had to see us like this."
"Imunlaukr, I wish I could see you again..."

Name: Priest's Box
Description:
A treasure box with a decorative pattern at the bottom. The ornamentation seems to be a part of a three-piece motif. Once the pattern is completed, a certain door may open.
"I thought that the young will grow strong and vital like cypresses."
"But these cypresses are about to wither. Their voices won't be carried by the wind anymore. My expectations towards them, as well as the faith they have in me, will all fall through."
"Once again I'll climb this peak looking for guidance. By the time I'm back down, my daughter will have finished the second painting."
"As long as the third one will be of thawing snow and ice, everything will be fine."

Name: Scribe's Box
Description:
A treasure box with a decorative pattern at the bottom. The ornamentation seems to be a part of a three-piece motif. Once the pattern is completed, a certain door may open.
"I yearn for those frosty skies to stand in flames and burn till there's no living soul in the world."
"I yearn for us to turn to dust carried by the wind so that we can find that outsider who abandoned the princess."
"I yearn for the black dragon from the princess' dreams to engulf the land in a cloud of scarlet poison."
"For I am the last one. There's no need to keep watch any longer."
"I've heard of people who are building a new nation without gods. Perhaps they'll have the power to stand against this world."

Name: Very Ordinary-Looking Sweet Flower
Description: A Sweet Flower gathered from beside a meteorite. It doesn't look, feel or smell like anything special. Perhaps only Ivanovich knows its true worth...

Name: Customs of Liyue: Receiving God
Description: A book on the cultures and customs of Liyue originally compiled by Fadhlan, a scholar from Sumeru residing in Liyue. It was then edited by many local scholars and published. It is one of the bestsellers in Liyue.

Name: Mr. Cyclops Action Figure
Description: A "Mr. Cyclops" toy that Childe had specially-made for Teucer. It even has the lad's name on it.

Name: Little Liu's Letter
Description: A letter that Little Liu wrote to Jiayi. The seal isn't all that tight. Best not to open it...

Name: Used Training Dummy
Description: A wooden stake of very common design. It doesn't seem special in any way, other than its slightly smaller bulk. It bears some signs of use, and might have been moved here from elsewhere.

Name: Crude Sack
Description: A cloth bag made of commonly-found materials. It contains some slightly damp objects. It might have fallen from a merchant vessel.

Name: Mysterious Stone Tablet
Description: A stone tablet with mysterious markings on it. Its origin cannot be determined, but there is value in analyzing it.

Name: Treasure Hoarder Scouting Report
Description: A letter obtained from Vile. It has the special mark of the Treasure Hoarders on it.

Name: Viktor's Lost Box
Description: The box that Viktor lost. The wrapping is all crumpled up... but it doesn't look damaged. What important things could it contain?

Name: Notice Paper
Description: A note written in haste. It lists a number of documents required when applying for a new business license.

Name: Old Business Permit
Description: An old business license. The thick stack has an unnatural weight to it...

Name: Business Premises and Safety Certificates
Description: Proof of one's business premises and the safety of said premises. The thick bundle has an unnatural weight to it...

Name: Approved Exit Permit
Description: Approval documentation for going out to sea. Best you don't lose this thin sheet of paper...

Name: Great Snowboar King Meat
Description:
Exquisite flavor, rich in fat. This cut of meat is exceptionally delicious, regardless of preferred cooking technique.
Only the most ancient of creatures, the sturdiest of the boars deserves to be called a king.

Name: Records of Jueyun: Wuwang
Description: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on the origin of Wuwang Hill.

Name: Records of Jueyun: Mountain Spirits
Description: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment features the stories of Seelie living in the mountains.

Name: Meadow of Gems
Description: This scroll, which seems to be a part of a larger series, belongs to the Jade Chamber's invaluable collection of written works. This volume is a dissertation on Liyue Harbor's economic policy.

Name: Customs of Liyue: Silk Flowers
Description: A book on the cultures and customs of Liyue originally compiled by Fadhlan, a scholar from Sumeru residing in Liyue. It was then edited by many local scholars and published. It is one of the bestsellers in Liyue.

Name: Customs of Liyue: Glaze Lilies
Description: A book on the cultures and customs of Liyue originally compiled by Fadhlan, a scholar from Sumeru residing in Liyue. It was then edited by many local scholars and published. It is one of the bestsellers in Liyue.

Name: String of Pearls (I)
Description: Zixin is a poor fisherwoman whose family struggles to make ends meet. One day, she is selling fish on the street when she carelessly loses the string of pearls she usually wears. Though what she does not know is that this lost string of pearls will change her fate for good...

Name: String of Pearls (II)
Description: The young man who had returned Zixin's string of pearls left without revealing his name. Grandma Zhang comes up with a plan that will allow Zixin to find him...

Name: String of Pearls (III)
Description: Our heroine meets the young man again. They fall in love and are ready to live together happily ever after. But a despot who covets Zixin's beauty and virtue is putting the skids under their plans...

Name: Ancient Investigation Journal: Part I
Description:
An investigation journal found in front of the ruins with a circular entrance.
Its author seems to have been a member of the aristocracy that once ruled Mondstadt.

Name: Ancient Investigation Journal: Part II
Description:
An investigation journal found in the basement of the ice-covered ruins.
Its author seems to have been a member of the aristocracy that once ruled Mondstadt.

Name: Ancient Investigation Journal: Part III
Description:
An investigation journal found in the camp on the sunny side of Dragonspine.
Its author seems to have been a member of the aristocracy that once ruled Mondstadt.

Name: Special Mondstadt Hash Brown
Description: A Hash Brown made specifically for Silio. Fresh out of the oven and still warm.

Name: Special Almond Tofu
Description: A newly-made serving of Almond Tofu. It looks very delicious indeed.

Name: Special Jewelry Soup
Description: Warm Jewelry Soup. It's practically spilling out of the bowl.

Name: Special Sweet Madame
Description: A custom-made Sweet Madame. Such a fragile yet tempting dish is not often seen.

Name: Special Matsutake Meat Rolls
Description: Freshly-made Matsutake Meat Rolls. The person who ordered this is in for a real treat.

Name: Special Jade Parcels
Description: A newly-completed set of Jade Parcels. It exudes a transient, fantastical aroma. If you don't send this out soon...

Name: Special Flaming Red Bolognese
Description: A freshly-served plate of Flaming Red Bolognese. It is a thing of fragile beauty.

Name: Special Black-Back Perch Stew
Description: Black-Back Perch Stew, fresh from the oven. It won't maintain its freshness for long.

Name: Special Mora Meat
Description: A serving of Mora Meat. Neither Mora nor Meat will be left if it gets cold.

Name: Special Tea Break Pancake
Description: Tea Break Pancake that has just had syrup drizzled over it. Time to serve it to the customers, and fast.

Name: Special Come and Get It
Description: A Come And Get It that looks delicious. Specially-made or not, Come And Get It always tastes terrible cold.

Name: Special Jueyun Chili Chicken
Description: Especially tender Jueyun Chili Chicken. Eating it cold has some merit, but it's best to serve it hot.

Name: Special Mondstadt Hash Brown
Description: A Hash Brown made specifically for Silio. Fresh out of the oven and still warm.

Name: Special Black-Back Perch Stew
Description: Fresh Black-Back Perch Stew. It will probably be inedible once it gets cold.

Name: Special Come and Get It
Description: A Come And Get It that looks delicious. Specially-made or not, Come And Get It always tastes terrible cold.

Name: Special Mondstadt Grilled Fish
Description: Mondstadt Grilled Fish with crispy skin and tender meat. It'll taste terrible if left out for too long.

Name: Special Stir-Fried Filet
Description: Stir-Fried Filet prepared for Ling'guan. If it was fated to be left to cool, why stir-fry it in the first place?

Name: Special Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
Description: Lotus on the one hand, and eggs on the other. It feels like you'd be insulting the adepti if you sent this over to Jueyun Karst.

Name: Special Fisherman's Toast
Description: This should be finger food, but it also needs to be sent by speed courier. How odd.

Name: Special Almond Tofu
Description: A newly-made serving of Almond Tofu. It looks very delicious indeed.

Name: Special Jewelry Soup
Description: Warm Jewelry Soup. It's practically spilling out of the bowl.

Name: Orders
Description: Orders written by Huffman. It's sealed up very tight. Best not to open it yourself...

Name: Jiayi's Letter
Description: A letter that Jiayi wrote to Little Liu. It is sealed very tightly. Don't open it, now...

Name: Nostalgic Jueyun Chili Chicken
Description: Jueyun Chili Chicken made personally by Little Wu. According to him, it captures the taste of his youth perfectly, and though Big G will not be able to enjoy it, he may yet remember some of the happiness of his youth.

Name: Luxurious Toybox
Description: A luxurious toybox from Mumu. This was once something they all desired in their childhood. May all wishes come true in the future.

Name: Congzi's Plaustrite Shards
Description: Plaustrite Shards of fine quality. A Xiao Lantern made from such material is sure to carry happy hopes high into the sky.

Name: Custom-Made Xiao Lantern
Description: Xiao Lantern obtained from Congzi, and it has the names of the five childhood playmates inscribed upon it. May the fire pass on, and may friendship never die.

Name: Glory's Dandelion Seeds
Description: Dandelion Seeds that contain Glory's thoughts. The wind can probably carry these far, far away.

Name: Letter to Cyrus
Description: A letter to Cyrus. The handwriting on the envelope looks hasty and careless, reflecting the sender's state of mind.

Name: Qingzhou's Signature
Description: A signature personally penned by the Liyue poet, Qingzhou. He mentioned that you can exchange this signature for a copy of his new anthology at Wanwen Bookhouse. Well, no one knows when he will finish writing that anthology, but at least it makes for a nice memento.

Name: Package of Fresh Flowers
Description: The package contains some flowers trimmed by Flora herself. One can almost smell their fragrance through the packaging.

Name: Package of Fresh Flowers
Description: The package contains some flowers trimmed by Flora herself. One can almost smell their fragrance through the packaging.

Name: Rex Incognito (IV)
Description: A Liyue fantasy novel that tells the tales of Rex Lapis' incognito excursions in the mortal realm. In an age when scrutiny was laid upon the treasures of the world, one humble witticism was all it took to expose all lies.

Name: Invoice From Second Life
Description: The invoice for the furniture that Second Life purchased from Fanmu Carpenter's. It features detailed information regarding that transaction.

Name: Package of Fresh Flowers
Description: The package contains some flowers trimmed by Flora herself. One can almost smell their fragrance through the packaging.

Name: Package of Fresh Flowers
Description: The package contains some flowers trimmed by Flora herself. One can almost smell their fragrance through the packaging.

Name: Package of Fresh Flowers
Description: The package contains some flowers trimmed by Flora herself. One can almost smell their fragrance through the packaging.

Name: Thank-You Letter
Description: A crumpled note featuring hastily written characters. One can imagine the state its author was in when they wrote it.

Name: Experimental Potion
Description: A potion that Albedo made using alchemy. Despite its unusual color, Albedo insists that the potion will work just as expected. Drinking it should not cause any adverse side effects.

Name: Chilled Meat
Description:
Rare, fresh meat.
This species of boar is recorded to have gone extinct several hundred years ago and has been preserved by the extreme temperatures on Dragonspine. For the gourmets of Teyvat, this is an ingredient of unspeakable sacrosanctness.

Name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Dragonspine
Description: A journal left behind by a renowned adventurer Roald. Some of its pages are damaged and crumpled, and a few shimmering ice crystals are attached to them.

Name: Kamera Picture
Description: A picture printed out by the Kamera. It's very clear.

Name: Kamera Picture
Description: A picture printed out by the Kamera. It's very clear.

Name: Sigil of Permission
Description: Normally, the people of Liyue only hold rituals to worship the adepti in the peripheral areas of Jueyun Karst; however, he who holds this token may safely enter the residence of the adepti.

Name: Harris' Special Cream Stew
Description: A dish of delicate texture stewed in fresh cream. So warm and comforting that it makes one feel at home.

Name: Treasure Map
Description: A map that records the location of treasure.

Name: Strange Note
Description: A strange note that seems to contain some sort of message...

Name: A Bag of Mora
Description: A bag of Mora. Not the heaviest, but one would not mind finding it on the street.

Name: Water-Logged Box
Description: A water-logged box. It is packed very tightly — its contents seem to be of much importance...

Name: Meadow of Gems
Description: This scroll, which seems to be a part of a larger series, belongs to the Jade Chamber's invaluable collection of written works. This volume is a dissertation on Liyue Harbor's economic policy.

Name: Dummy's Xiao Lantern
Description: A Xiao Lantern made by Dummy. It looks surprisingly intricate...

Name: Unnamed Mingxiao Lantern
Description: "I wish for good fortune..."

Name: Siyu's Xiao Lantern
Description: A Xiao Lantern given to Wrench Wang by Siyu as a gift.

Name: Starsilver Catalyst
Description: Starsilver ore collected along the way. It looks similar to regular Starsilver, but upon closer inspection by Albedo, it can be used as an alchemical catalyst.

Name: Starsilver Catalyst
Description: Starsilver ore collected along the way. It looks similar to regular Starsilver, but upon closer inspection by Albedo, it can be used as an alchemical catalyst.

Name: Starsilver Catalyst
Description: Starsilver ore collected along the way. It looks similar to regular Starsilver, but upon closer inspection by Albedo, it can be used as an alchemical catalyst.

Name: Starsilver Catalyst
Description: Starsilver ore collected along the way. It looks similar to regular Starsilver, but upon closer inspection by Albedo, it can be used as an alchemical catalyst.

Name: Starsilver Catalyst
Description: Starsilver ore collected along the way. It looks similar to regular Starsilver, but upon closer inspection by Albedo, it can be used as an alchemical catalyst.

Name: Starsilver Catalyst
Description: Starsilver ore collected along the way. It looks similar to regular Starsilver, but upon closer inspection by Albedo, it can be used as an alchemical catalyst.

Name: Herbalist Gui's Medicine
Description: Medicine from Herbalist Gui. Best to send it to the one who ordered it.

Name: Dandelion Seed
Description: Dandelion Seeds that contain the wishes of the siblings Freki and Geri. May it go with the wind back to Mondstadt...

Name: Records of Jueyun: Qilin
Description: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on the shared history of qilins and humans.

Name: Records of Jueyun: Hidden Jade
Description: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on the Dunyu Ruins.

Name: Records of the Gallant: Black Raccoons
Description: A compilation of stories and legends of various knights-errant in Liyue. Some of them have been told for a long time but are still popular among the people.

Name: Hex & Hound (VI)
Description: "Message From the Editor: Thank you for your support, everyone! We've managed to snag our erstwhile author from the bowels of The Cat's Tail! Although they look drunker than a sodden dandelion, continued serialization should pose no problem! We hope for your continued support from here on out as well!"

Name: Hex & Hound (VII)
Description: "A good person, one who smiles as she gives out dog biscuits..." What is the true identity of the strange young woman in the familiar forest?

Name: Hex & Hound (VIII)
Description: "Heavens, I spoke ill of a witch to her face!" "Oh, what a bad boy. Still, discipline is a master's duty, so there's nothing for it~" The curtains rise on the witch's cruel secret—

Name: Aunt Qiao's Almond Tofu
Description: This box contains Almond Tofu made at Wangshu Inn. It is well-packaged, and one can feel the care that the chef took in putting this together.

Name: Zhuyu's Golden Shrimp Balls
Description: This box contains Golden Shrimp Balls made at Wangshu Inn. It is well-packaged, and one can feel the care that the chef took in putting this together.

Name: Ominous Dish
Description: This is supposed to be Bennett's specialty dish, but you can sense that this dish emanates a strange feeling of... misfortune?

Name: Lost Adventure Notebook
Description: A set of adventurer's notes that you picked up in the ruins. It seems to contain a clue to unlocking these mechanisms.

Name: Broken Xiao Lantern Lampshade
Description: This was once a Xiao Lantern that carried someone's wishes. No one can say where it has flown since, but now there is naught left but its lampshade...

Name: Hard Iron Chunk
Description: Iron ore. Looks like it could take quite a strong blow to break it apart.

Name: Hard Crystal Chunk
Description: An uncut crystal. Most people could throw everything they have at it and still barely leave a scratch.

Name: Red Wolfhook
Description: A red Wolfhook berry. One wonders if it might have some unique medicinal properties...

Name: Fresh Jueyun Chili
Description: A very fresh Jueyun Chili. It seems to be of very high-quality...

Name: Handpicked Gift
Description: A gift you chose together with Noelle. Hopefully, it will help bring Bea and Quinn together...

Name: Lantern Rite Gift
Description: Lantern Rite Gifts from Wang'ya. Best to pass them on to the Millelith as soon as possible...

Name: Pyro Whopperflower Nectar
Description: You can still feel its heat as you hold it in your hand. Can this really be used to make paint?

Name: Wanmin Restaurant Take-Away
Description: A meal that Chef Mao has made for Atsuko. It looks like it is freshly made — you can feel its warmth even through the tight wrapping.

Name: Strange Box
Description: A box with something in it. One wonders who might have buried it here...

Name: Inscribed Xiao Lantern
Description: At first glance, this looks no different from your average Xiao Lantern. However, closer observation reveals that this lantern has inscriptions upon it. The penmanship is most austere, and seems to have been written in Mr. Bohuan's hand.

Name: Soil Sample
Description: A soil sample from Mt. Tianheng. Who knows what discoveries Soraya's analysis will yield...

Name: Fresh Qingxin
Description: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.

Name: Slime-Swallowed Calla Lily
Description: A Calla Lily that has been swallowed by a Slime. One hopes that this Calla Lily can still be used in making medicine...

Name: Fresh Lotus Head
Description: An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.

Name: Plank
Description: An ordinary wooden plank. It has a great many uses.

Name: Fresh Raw Meat
Description: Fresh meat rendered from a fresh hunt. It is both firm and tender.

Name: High-Quality Chilled Meat
Description: High-quality Chilled Meat from Dragonspine. It has a unique flavor.

Name: Picture of Windblume Festival
Description: A picture recording the scene in Mondstadt during Windblume Festival. With fresh flowers, the Statue of The Seven, and the free people of Mondstadt, "Windblume" could be deemed synonymous with "romantic."

Name: Picture of Windblume Festival
Description: A picture recording the scene in Mondstadt during Windblume Festival. With fresh flowers, the Statue of The Seven, and the free people of Mondstadt, this festival could indeed be deemed synonymous with "romance."

Name: Picture of Windblume Festival
Description: A picture recording the scene in Mondstadt during Windblume Festival. With fresh flowers, the Statue of The Seven, and the free people of Mondstadt, "Windblume" could be deemed synonymous with "romantic."

Name: Wondrous Lovely Flower
Description: A wondrous flower created using alchemy, with Starsilver as its main component. Its petals are large but soft, and it glimmers with a silver light.

Name: Watch Out!
Description: A threatening letter of unknown origin. You can barely make heads or tails out of it, but yet it seems to also conceal some deeper meaning...

Name: Fresh Valberry
Description: A freshly picked Valberry. It would make a fine dye once mashed.

Name: Pyro Slime Condensate
Description: The condensate of a Pyro Slime. It bears slight traces of Pyro energy.

Name: Special Bottle
Description: A bottle you received from Connor. It contains the key to resolving this incident.

Name: Notes of Some Kind
Description: A note filled from margin to margin with text. It seems to have come from a student of the love poem crash course. If you read it carefully, you may yet grasp the gist of how to write a love poem.

Name: Ward
Description: A mysterious object retrieved from within a fox-shaped statue.

Name: Ward
Description:
A ward retrieved from within the kitsune-shaped sculpture within the abandoned shrine north of Konda Village.
According to Hanachirusato, these wards are required to conduct rites of purification.

Name: Ioroi's Ward
Description:
A ward given to you by the bake-danuki Ioroi as a sign of thanks. It is shaped like a lovely comb.
Ioroi once stole this comb to lure "that sneaky kitsune" out. As punishment, Ioroi and his companions were sealed into graven stone by "that dratted fellow."
According to Hanachirusato, these wards are needed to conduct the Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual.

Name: Scroll-Shaped Ward
Description:
An ancient and mysterious item shaped like a tightly-sealed scroll. No matter what you do, it won't open at all.
According to Hanachirusato, these wards are needed to conduct the Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual.

Name: Key-Shaped Ward
Description:
An ancient and mysterious item shaped like an ancient key. Where there's a key, there's a lock — but this key's lock is about to be breached by the defilement absorbed by the tree's roots.
According to Hanachirusato, these wards are needed to conduct the Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual.

Name: Old Key
Description: According to Konda Densuke, this is the key to the well's lid.

Name: Old Stone Slate
Description: The lines carved into this old stone slate speak silently of the secret of the legendary treasure...

Name: Old Stone Slate
Description: The lines carved into this old stone slate speak silently of the secret of the legendary treasure...

Name: Old Stone Slate
Description: The lines carved into this old stone slate speak silently of the secret of the legendary treasure...

Name: Old Stone Slate
Description: The lines carved into this old stone slate speak silently of the secret of the legendary treasure...

Name: Rather Fine Dandelion Seeds
Description: Seeds of a Dandelion plucked from Starsnatch Cliff. Said to be of rather fine quality.

Name: Rather Fine Windwheel Aster
Description: A Windwheel Aster that grows near Windrise. Said to be of fine quality.

Name: Special Beverage
Description: A special beverage that has just been brewed. Who knows how it will taste...

Name: Special Beverage
Description: A special beverage that has just been brewed. Who knows how it will taste...

Name: Hex & Hound (IX)
Description: "What does the death of a warm spring day feel like?" So the young maiden said one morning, in defiance of all common logic. "I suppose it must feel... furry?"

Name: Hex & Hound (X)
Description: After all, none can live and still obtain release.

Name: Hex & Hound (XI)
Description: "I should just stuff that noisy puppy yapper of yours..." "Woof, woof!" That day, the young maiden gave her loyal dog something precious...

Name: String of Pearls (IV)
Description: To rescue the one he loves, the young man charges heedlessly into danger, entering the lair of the enemy with his sword drawn: and on the other side, his beloved hangs on desperately...

Name: String of Pearls (V)
Description: The bandit lair in the dead of night is pitch-dark. The tyrant, the youth, and the lady grope in the dark in search of one another, and there, a perilous misunderstanding is about to play out...

Name: Handy Handbook of Hilichurlian
Description: A handbook of Hilichurlian written by the folklorist Ella Musk, though its practical use has yet to be tested in the field.

Name: Records of the Gallant: Dust
Description: A compilation of stories and legends of various knights-errant in Liyue. Some of them have been told for a long time but are still popular among the people.

Name: Bamboo Slip
Description: A bamboo slip that was used as a marking in some unremarkable spot. Can be exchanged with Gendou Ringo of the Grand Narukami Shrine for fortune-telling Fortune Slips.

Name: Bamboo Slip
Description: A bamboo slip that was used as a marking in some unremarkable spot. Can be exchanged with Gendou Ringo of the Grand Narukami Shrine for fortune-telling Fortune Slips.

Name: Bamboo Slip
Description: A bamboo slip that was used as a marking in some unremarkable spot. Can be exchanged with Gendou Ringo of the Grand Narukami Shrine for fortune-telling Fortune Slips.

Name: Bamboo Slip
Description: A bamboo slip that was used as a marking in some unremarkable spot. Can be exchanged with Gendou Ringo of the Grand Narukami Shrine for fortune-telling Fortune Slips.

Name: Bamboo Slip
Description: A bamboo slip that was used as a marking in some unremarkable spot. Can be exchanged with Gendou Ringo of the Grand Narukami Shrine for fortune-telling Fortune Slips.

Name: Bamboo Slip
Description: A bamboo slip that was used as a marking in some unremarkable spot. Can be exchanged with Gendou Ringo of the Grand Narukami Shrine for fortune-telling Fortune Slips.

Name: Bamboo Slip
Description: A bamboo slip that was used as a marking in some unremarkable spot. Can be exchanged with Gendou Ringo of the Grand Narukami Shrine for fortune-telling Fortune Slips.

Name: Bamboo Slip
Description: A bamboo slip that was used as a marking in some unremarkable spot. Can be exchanged with Gendou Ringo of the Grand Narukami Shrine for fortune-telling Fortune Slips.

Name: Bamboo Slip
Description: A bamboo slip that was used as a marking in some unremarkable spot. Can be exchanged with Gendou Ringo of the Grand Narukami Shrine for fortune-telling Fortune Slips.

Name: Fortune Slip
Description:
A special slip of paper that can illuminate one's fortune. Also known to a certain someone as "strips of paper."
You can only get one of these per day, which will cause the previous day's fortune slip to lose meaning and disappear.
They say that slips that portend ill luck such as "Misfortune" and "Great Misfortune" can be tied to the Fortune Slip Hanger as a prayer for a turnaround.
Regardless, "fate" and "destiny" are things best grasped and forged in one's own hands.

Name: Fortune Slip
Description:

Regardless, "fate" and "destiny" are things best grasped and forged in one's own hands.

Regardless, "fate" and "destiny" are things best grasped and forged in one's own hands.

Name: Strange Fortune Slip
Description: A special slip that can only be obtained if you use a certain secret code while exchanging for a Fortune Slip. Indicates a target and the location where they will emerge.

Name: Strange Fortune Slip
Description: A special slip that can only be obtained if you use a certain secret code while exchanging for a Fortune Slip. Indicates a target and the location where they will emerge.

Name: Strange Fortune Slip
Description: A special slip that can only be obtained if you use a certain secret code while exchanging for a Fortune Slip. Indicates a target and the location where they will emerge.

Name: Strange Fortune Slip
Description: A special slip that can only be obtained if you use a certain secret code while exchanging for a Fortune Slip. Indicates a target and the location where they will emerge.

Name: Picture of Cape Oath
Description: A picture taken for Bea. It shows a scenic view of the beach at Cape Oath.

Name: Picture of Starsnatch Cliff
Description: A picture taken for Bea. It shows the night sky above Starsnatch Cliff.

Name: Picture of Windrise
Description: A picture taken for Bea. It shows the picturesque landscape of trees and water at Windrise.

Name: Cyrus' Letter to Iris
Description: This long letter makes one curious as to what Cyrus has written in it... But it's not very appropriate to peek at the private letters between a brother and sister, now is it?

Name: Picture of Dragonspine
Description: A picture taken for Iris. It depicts the snowy scenery of Dragonspine.

Name: The Crux Clash Champion Medal
Description: A medal awarded by the organizers of The Crux Clash. It is proof that you are the undisputed champion of this tournament. But it is not so much the duels you experienced that you will look back on — rather, it is the story of a Vision and the pursuit of ideals.

Name: Well-Packaged Gebratenes Fleisch mit Sauerkraut
Description:
A serving of Gebratenes Fleisch mit Sauerkraut that has already been packed. A curious smell wafts from within.
You've heard that this is a hidden menu item that only long-time patrons know of and that the hoi polloi cannot appreciate its flavor — fair enough, you think...

Name: Tea Break Pancake Cooked by Lily
Description: The inner layers have not quite been pressed together to perfection, and it does taste a little burnt, but these are the best pancakes that Lily can make.

Name: Mysterious Mechanical Part
Description: A rarely seen device that seems to have some special purpose. Try fitting it into a suitable environment.

Name: Pale Yellow Crystal
Description: A crystal chunk that is pale yellow all over, beauteous as the swaying leaves of fall.

Name: Pale Red Crystal
Description: A crystal chunk that is pale red all over, lovely as spring blossoms.

Name: Pale Blue Crystal
Description: A crystal chunk that is pale blue all over, fair as the purest winter snow.

Name: Pale Yellow Scale
Description: A pale yellow scale obtained from a fish in the sea. Gazing upon it for a long time, you are reminded of autumn.

Name: Pale Blue Scale
Description: A pale blue scale obtained from a fish in the sea. Gazing upon it for a long time, you are reminded of winter.

Name: Pale Red Scale
Description: A pale red scale obtained from a fish in the sea. Gazing upon it for a long time, you are reminded of springtime.

Name: Cat Food
Description: Cat food obtained from Sara. You wonder what it might taste like...

Name: Cat Toy
Description: A cat toy obtained from Marjorie. Hopefully, the kittens will enjoy it.

Name: Fresh Fish Scales
Description: The fresh scales of a fish. One wonders what Diona might do with it...

Name: Some Strange... Drink?
Description: A newly mixed drink. It seems a little... odd?

Name: Purse by the Dried-Up Well
Description:
A purse that you found beside the dry well in Konda Village.
It seems to have been left behind in a hurry, and has a special symbol printed on it.

Name: Archaic Stone
Description:
A rare ore mined from a deserted spot deep in the mountains.
This sort of ore can only be found in veins in the oldest mountains. Perhaps it is due to its extreme rarity, but many merchants haven't even so much as heard of this rock.
The ore itself has incredible clarity and its colors are dazzling, almost seeming to glow with an inner light that brings out its blue-violet beauty, which is like the distant and lovely sunset sky.
The few scholars who understand its value gave it a most straightforward name — "Archaic Stone."
If you intend to give it as a gift, it would be best to give it to one who recognizes what they're receiving.

Name: Slightly Damaged Wooden Plank
Description: A wooden plank that has taken some damage. Some words seem to be carved on it...

Name: Somewhat Rotten Wooden Plank
Description: A wooden plank that has partially rotted away. There seem to be some words carved on it...

Name: Smaragdus Jadeite
Description: A stone known as Smaragdus Jadeite. What will Madame Ping use it for?

Name: Smaragdus Nephrite Fragment
Description: A stone that Yanfei and Zhiqiao have adjudged to be Smaragdus Nephrite.

Name: The Jade Mystery's Affidavit
Description: A written affidavit from The Jade Mystery.

Name: Ministry of Civil Affairs' Affidavit
Description: The Ministry of Civil Affairs' filing documents, obtained from Mingxing Jewelry.

Name: Bubu Pharmacy's Affidavit
Description: A pharmacological certification from Bubu Pharmacy.

Name: Fresh Slime Condensate
Description: Slime condensate that you just obtained. Who knows what Diona might do with it...

Name: Minacious Isle Mural
Description: A mural that you found on a stone wall on Minacious Isle. It seems to depict a shipwreck...

Name: Broken Isle Mural
Description: A mural that you found on a stone wall on Broken Isle. It depicts five strange objects...

Name: Nameless Island Mural
Description: A mural that you found on a stone wall on the Nameless Island. It seems to depict a rescue...

Name: Twinning Isle Mural
Description: A mural that you found on a stone wall on Twinning Isle. The mountain in the mural bears a special mark...

Name: Illegible Notes
Description: These notes are illegible.

Name: Fresh Fish
Description: Fresh fish. What will Diona use it for, you wonder...

Name: Ragged List of Goods
Description:
A list of goods found on a destroyed transport cart.
Both sun and rain have beaten down upon it such that most of its contents are impossible to discern. One thing alone remains clear — that this was once a Shogunate receipt for goods and the payments thereof.

Name: Cargo Bag Fished Out From Water
Description:
A bag of cargo you discovered in the water while following the gully.
It seems to have been washed away.

Name: Nameless Islet Mural
Description: A mural that you found on a stone wall on the Nameless Islet. It seems to depict a group of people preparing to board a ship...

Name: Clear Image
Description: An image showing the state of the storage devices within the Mikage Furnace. Who knows what Xavier can glean from it...

Name: Somewhat Clear Image
Description: An image showing the lowest level of the Mikage Furnace. Who knows what Xavier can glean from it...

Name: Rather Foggy Image
Description: An image showing the area around the Mikage Furnace. Who knows what Xavier can glean from it...

Name: A Discarded Blade
Description: An old blade that has lost its luster due to a long-term lack of maintenance.

Name: A Jug of Wine
Description: An old jug containing wine. A rich scent emanates from it.

Name: A Masterless Blade
Description: A familiar old blade, stabbed into the battlefield in a skewed fashion.

Name: Bag of Flower Seeds
Description: A bag full of flower seeds. Question is, where to plant them?

Name: Mysterious Conch
Description: A conch, but there's something strange about it. What could it be for?

Name: The Sage Aetolia Will Die Tomorrow
Description: A fantasy novel. From the packaging, it seems that this book has used various setting intricacies to attract many readers...

Name: The Honest Cat's Little Lie
Description: A suspense novel. The packaging suggests that many readers were attracted by the unexpected twists and turns of the plot.

Name: Literature Club
Description: A traditional novel. The packaging states that this novel has a "rigorous plot and setting"...

Name: Rust-Worn Key
Description:
An old key found at the bottom of the Konda Village well.
It is said that "where there's a key, there's a lock." Who knows where the lock for this key is...

Name: Mask of Memories
Description:
Hanachirusato the shrine maiden used to wear this mask. It is deeply stained on the inside.
Some memories are contained inside, through which one may learn the art of creating the Catalyst known as "Hakushin Ring."
Now that Hanachirusato has been separated from this mask, Paimon doesn't get to call her the "Masked Maiden" anymore, right?

Name: The Violet Oni's Blade
Description:
The favored sword of Yanagiha Arashi, an expelled member of the Iwakura School.
It is a leftover copy of a certain famous sword, and has been reforged after being broken. It and the weapon of Okazaki Toraemon are a pair.

Name: The Crimson Oni's Blade
Description:
The favored sword of Okazaki Toraemon, an expelled member of the Iwakura School.
It is a leftover copy of a certain famous sword, and has been reforged after being broken. It and the weapon of Yanagiha Arashi are a pair.

Name: Fortune Slip
Description:
A special slip of paper that can illuminate one's fortune. Also known to a certain someone as "strips of paper."
You can only get one of these per day, which will cause the previous day's fortune slip to lose meaning and disappear.
They say that slips that portend ill luck such as "Misfortune" and "Great Misfortune" can be tied to the Fortune Slip Hanger as a prayer for a turnaround.
Regardless, "fate" and "destiny" are things best grasped and forged in one's own hands.

Name: Fortune Slip
Description:
A special slip of paper that can illuminate one's fortune. Also known to a certain someone as "strips of paper."
You can only get one of these per day, which will cause the previous day's fortune slip to lose meaning and disappear.

Regardless, "fate" and "destiny" are things best grasped and forged in one's own hands.

Description:

You can only get one of these per day, which will cause the previous day's fortune slip to lose meaning and disappear.
They say that slips that portend ill luck such as "Misfortune" and "Great Misfortune" can be tied to the Fortune Slip Hanger as a prayer for a turnaround.
Regardless, "fate" and "destiny" are things best grasped and forged in one's own hands.

Description:
A special slip of paper that can illuminate one's fortune. Also known to a certain someone as "strips of paper."
You can only get one of these per day, which will cause the previous day's fortune slip to lose meaning and disappear.
They say that slips that portend ill luck such as "Misfortune" and "Great Misfortune" can be tied to the Fortune Slip Hanger as a prayer for a turnaround.
Regardless, "fate" and "destiny" are things best grasped and forged in one's own hands.

Name: Chang the Ninth's Gift
Description: A gift from the Yae Publishing House to Chang the Ninth. There's even a letter on the inside.

Name: Zhenyu's Gift
Description: A gift from the Yae Publishing House to "Zhenyu." There's even a letter on the inside.

Name: Cage Key
Description: Seems to be the key to some prison cage. Some reckless person seems to have thrown it out here.

Name: Metal Key
Description: A metal key that one can find just about anywhere, and that can unlock a majority of ordinary doors... Well, probably, anyway.

Name: Atsuko's Letter
Description: A letter that Atsuko penned herself. It is filled with her yearning to see her parents again — with any luck, this long letter will bring her parents some peace of mind.

Name: Illegible Fortune Slip
Description: A fortune slip on which the wording has become all but illegible. But considering that it was chucked up to such a high spot, it can't have boded particularly well...

Name: Damaged Note
Description: A paper note that has been crumpled into a ball. A wish has been scribbled on it, but the only legible word now is "peace."

Name: Luxurious Silk Cloth
Description: A bolt of lovely silk. This is normally used to make high-end clothing.

Name: Special Recipe: Mushroom Pizza
Description: A handwritten Mushroom Pizza recipe. Perhaps food prepared using various different methods might result in a unique flavor.

Name: Chef Mao's Special Jueyun Chili Chicken
Description: Jueyun Chili Chicken specially made by Chef Mao. Seagrass and Sea Cucumber were added in the process, and one wonders how the result might taste...

Name: Xiangling's Handwritten Notes
Description: Xiangling's handwritten notes. It records some of her... novel ideas regarding cooking.

Name: Yellowed Letter
Description: A letter unearthed from beneath a tree in Konda Village. It seems to convey a certain person's hopes.

Name: Vahid's Kneaded Onigiri
Description: Onigiri made from rice cultivated personally by Vahid. It tastes as good as it looks.

Name: Naganohara Fireworks Note
Description:
A note that Yoimiya gave you to record firework formulae with. If you give this note to Yoimiya, she will be able to make fireworks just as you remember them.
No matter how time passes, or people and things change, so long as you take care of this note, you will stand guard over a door to the past. Perhaps you too will find happiness that belongs only to you under a firework-filled sky.

Name: Spirit Pearl
Description: An ancient, vibrant pearl, within which lies the secret of the ocean depths.

Name: Key of the Moon-Bathed Deep
Description: A strange treasure with an awkward name. It is said to have been forged from the blood of Watatsumi Omikami.

Name: Strange Bottle
Description: A vessel with an odd appearance. It seems fragile, but is actually quite sturdy.

Name: Water Welling With "Wishes"
Description: This water is filled with hopes and dreams. Please send them to the place where they belong.

Name: Spiritherb Water
Description: Crystal-clear water, the ideal source of hydration for the Spiritherb.

Name: Rinzou's Letter
Description: A letter written by the legendary pirate Rinzou. The paper is all crumpled up. It must have been wet at some point.

Name: Rinzou's Signet
Description: A signet left behind by the great pirate Rinzou as proof of a glorious life of adventure.

Name: Hidden Ledger
Description: A ledger that seems to contain the recent taxation situations of Ritou's merchants. Its owner is Keijirou.

Name: Komore Teahouse Invitation Letter
Description: Whomsoever has this invitation letter may enter Komore Teahouse. It has the seal of the Yashiro Commission on it.

Name: A Love Letter(?)
Description: A letter that Hiiragi Chisato has written for Kujou Kamaji. She would be mad if you opened it up without her permission...

Name: Cooked Meat
Description: Meat that has just been cooked. Maybe it can be used in a dish...

Name: "The Seventh Samurai" Script
Description: A "film script" you obtained from Xavier.

Name: A Note Left by Someone
Description: A special fortune slip that a certain person left behind. A certain location is recorded within. This may have something to do with Gendou Ringo's disappearance.

Name: Bamboo Slip
Description: A bamboo slip that was used as a marking in some unremarkable spot. Can be exchanged with Gendou Ringo of the Grand Narukami Shrine for fortune-telling Fortune Slips.

Name: Bamboo Slip
Description: A bamboo slip that was used as a marking in some unremarkable spot. Can be exchanged with Gendou Ringo of the Grand Narukami Shrine for fortune-telling Fortune Slips.

Name: Bamboo Slip
Description: A bamboo slip that was used as a marking in some unremarkable spot. Can be exchanged with Gendou Ringo of the Grand Narukami Shrine for fortune-telling Fortune Slips.

Name: Bamboo Slip
Description: A bamboo slip that was used as a marking in some unremarkable spot. Can be exchanged with Gendou Ringo of the Grand Narukami Shrine for fortune-telling Fortune Slips.

Name: Bamboo Slip
Description: A bamboo slip that was used as a marking in some unremarkable spot. Can be exchanged with Gendou Ringo of the Grand Narukami Shrine for fortune-telling Fortune Slips.

Name: Bamboo Slip
Description: A bamboo slip that was used as a marking in some unremarkable spot. Can be exchanged with Gendou Ringo of the Grand Narukami Shrine for fortune-telling Fortune Slips.

Name: Bamboo Slip
Description: A bamboo slip that was used as a marking in some unremarkable spot. Can be exchanged with Gendou Ringo of the Grand Narukami Shrine for fortune-telling Fortune Slips.

Name: Lightly-Perfumed Letter
Description: You obtained this from an infantryman at the Kanjou Commission. They say that this was written personally by the young lady of the Hiiragi Clan.

Name: Travel Permit
Description: A special Travel Permit that allows travel throughout Inazuma. With this in hand, you can now freely enter and leave Ritou...

Name: Kujou Kamaji's Letter
Description: Kujou Kamaji asked you to carry this letter that he personally penned to Hiiragi Chisato. According to him, this one was the best-worded of the lot.

Name: Snack Box
Description: A box of snacks that Kujou Kamaji request you bring to Hiiragi Chisato. It seems very full indeed...

Name: Dull Golden Bridle
Description: The hereditary national treasure of Byakuyakoku, but it has lost all of its own power. This was done to prevent thieves who have entered through alternative means from seeing its value.

Name: Golden Bridle
Description: The hereditary national treasure of Byakuyakoku. It represents the highest authority in the land and confers the power to control Evernight and Whitenight upon its wielder.

Name: Reins of Revival Fragment (The Narrows)
Description: A fragment of the Reins of Revival. It is made from a special material.

Name: Reins of Revival Fragment (Temple)
Description: A fragment of the Reins of Revival. It has some special power.

Name: Reins of Revival Fragment (Serpent's Heart)
Description: A fragment of the Reins of Revival. The three fragments, too, follow "The Rule of Three."

Name: Reins of Revival
Description: The hereditary national treasure of Byakuyakoku. Apart from representing the highest authority in the land, it also confers the ability to control souls and this realm.

Name: Offerings of The Narrows
Description: Offerings from The Narrows that contain a fraction of Aberaku's remnant thoughts.

Name: Offerings of the Temple
Description: Offerings from the Evernight Temple that contain a fraction of Aberaku's remnant thoughts.

Name: Offerings of the Serpent's Heart
Description: Offerings from the Serpent's Heart that contain a fraction of Aberaku's remnant thoughts.

Name: The Serpent and Drakes of Tokoyokoku
Description: A novel based on Watatsumi Island's folktales. The original edition of this text was transcribed on Watatsumi Island and brought back to Narukami Island by a merchant while the former's serpent god yet lived. No one reads this ancient tome nowadays, its role supplanted by all the light novels on the market. This book describes the unique cosmological outlook of the Watatsumi people before they came to adopt aspects of Narukami culture, and a recent resurgence in traditional novel publishing has allowed it to see the light of day once more.

Name: Bathysmal Vishap Experimental Records
Description: Experimental Records of the Bathysmal Vishaps. No vishaps were killed in the writing of these records.

Name: Before Sun and Moon
Description: A chronicle that ordinary folk have been forbidden to read. The writing is a mix of fables and histories from the beginning of the world to the creation of the Dainichi Mikoshi.

Name: Hydrological Studies in Byakuyakoku
Description: This text records the geography and hydrology of Byakuyakoku. With the sealing of the depths and the emigration of the people of Watatsumi, as well as the passing of long years, this book is now useless.

Name: In the Light, Beneath the Shadow
Description: A puzzle book for children of ages nine to twelve. As a book from a transitory period, it uses Narukami-style names with Byakuyakoku subscripts.

Name: Key Sigil
Description: A sigil passed down through Watatsumi Island and Enkanomiya. Such pictures are used in unlocking, and are thus named "Key Sigils."

Name: Key Sigil
Description: A Key Sigil passed down through Watatsumi Island and Enkanomiya. It was made by disassembling the emblems of the once-upon-a-time people of Byakuyakoku.

Name: Key Sigil
