Description: A wrinkled note with horrendously slanted handwriting.

Name: Redemption Voucher 1
Description: Used to redeem Mirrorpool Horned Owl: Turning

Name: Redemption Voucher 2
Description: Used to redeem Mirrorpool Horned Owl: Dancing

Name: Redemption Voucher 3
Description: Used to redeem Mirrorpool Horned Owl: Air Time

Name: Redemption Voucher 4
Description: Used to redeem Thundering Horned Owl: Turning

Name: Redemption Voucher 5
Description: Used to redeem Thundering Horned Owl: Dancing

Description: Used to redeem Thundering Horned Owl: Air Time

Description: Used to redeem Flowfire Horned Owl: Turning

Description: Used to redeem Flowfire Horned Owl: Dancing

Description: Used to redeem Flowfire Horned Owl: Air Time

Description: Used to redeem Traveling Horned Owl

Description: Used to redeem Mirrorpool Triped: Tipping

Description: Used to redeem Mirrorpool Triped: Jiggy

Description: Used to redeem Thundering Triped: Tipping

Description: Used to redeem Thundering Triped: Jiggy

Description: Used to redeem Thundering Triped: Sitting

Description: Used to redeem Flowfire Triped: Tipping

Name: Redemption Voucher 18
Description: Used to redeem Flowfire Triped: Jiggy

Name: Redemption Voucher 19
Description: Used to redeem Flowfire Triped: Sitting

Name: Redemption Voucher 20
Description: Used to redeem Traveling Triped

Name: Part: Breeze
Description: A part of the "Evermotion Mechanical Painting" that Félix Yogue is trying to restore.

Name: Part: Sky
Description: A part of the "Evermotion Mechanical Painting" that Félix Yogue is trying to restore.

Name: Part: Clouds
Description: A part of the "Evermotion Mechanical Painting" that Félix Yogue is trying to restore.

Name: Part: Company
Description: A part of the "Evermotion Mechanical Painting" that Félix Yogue is trying to restore.

Name: Part: Lonely
Description: A part of the "Evermotion Mechanical Painting" that Félix Yogue is trying to restore.

Name: Part: Meadow
Description: A part of the "Evermotion Mechanical Painting" that Félix Yogue is trying to restore.

Name: Forensic Office Research Log Excerpt
Description: A research log excerpt with plenty of crinkles. The handwriting is still very much legible.

Name: Note of Unknown Origin
Description: You found this note in the mysterious space. Its content seems similar to that of a journal.

Name: Crystalline Core
Description: The crystalline core component that was missing from the curious Fatui machine. According to Persikov's manuscript, the machine can be restarted if three such cores are found and inserted into the device.

Name: Crystalline Core
Description: The crystalline core component that was missing from the curious Fatui machine. According to Persikov's manuscript, the machine can be restarted if three such cores are found and inserted into the device.

Name: Crystalline Core
Description: The crystalline core component that was missing from the curious Fatui machine. According to Persikov's manuscript, the machine can be restarted if three such cores are found and inserted into the device.

Name: Old Yellowed Notes
Description: Old Yellowed Notes

Name: Mysterious Letter
Description: Mysterious Letter

Name: A Seemingly Waterproof Note
Description: A Seemingly Waterproof Note

Name: Reverberating Key
Description: A key related to a certain mysterious plant. It seems to be able to open some door somewhere...

Name: A New Letter
Description:
A letter the head housemaid, Adelinde, just received. It needs to be sent to Dawn Winery for archiving.
The paper is slightly wrinkled. Maybe the person who wrote the letter was in a hurry and couldn't find a desk.

Name: Dawn Winery's Top-Quality Grape Juice
Description:
A gift from Diluc. A bottle of grape juice with luxury packaging. It is something Paimon has long been looking forward to, but more so a memento of the time when you and your friends handled the crisis together.
It is also Diluc's personal favorite, produced using only Dawn Winery's best quality grapes.
Being "Master Diluc's favorite grape juice" seems to have inestimable commercial value...

Name: Slime Condensate-Soaked Soil
Description: Soil soaked with Slime Condensate. What will Akim use this sticky stuff for?

Name: Whopperflower Root Soil
Description: Soil collected from Whopperflower roots. What will Akim use it for?

Name: Moist Soil
Description: Moist soil collected from the bottom of rocks. What will Akim use it for?

Name: Starlight Coalescence
Description: A translucent crystal that seems to hold coalescent starlight within it. This item seems to be key to solving a certain mechanism puzzle somewhere.

Name: Dragonspine Supplies: Ham
Description: Ham meant to be used for resupply. It will keep longer in low-temperature conditions.

Name: Nightwatch Contract
Description: A contract penned and signed personally by the Prinzessin der Verurteilung herself. It may be used to authorize the opening of navigational sites. Those who should produce this letter of warrant shall be authorized forthwith to spread their black feathers where dawn meets dusk, and envelop the skies in night's own embrace.

Name: Special "Concresoil" for Toys
Description: Special "Concresoil" Akim made for Nima. What kind of pot warriors will Nima make with it?

Name: Whopperflower Root Soil
Description: Soil collected from Whopperflower roots. What will Akim use it for?

Name: Fertile Soil (Reportedly)
Description:
You can't tell whether this soil is fertile or not.
What will Akim use this for?

Name: Discarded "Concresoil"
Description: "Concresoil" of poor quality. It looks to be in terrible condition...

Name: Tenryou Commission's Missing Person Poster
Description: An official missing person poster with the Tenryou Commission's symbol on it.

Name: Sea Salt-Crusted Key
Description: A key found in the Golden Apple Archipelago, seemingly able to open a lock somewhere...

Name: Special Bird Egg
Description: A bird egg needed for making Angler Kayvan's special bait. This special egg was collected from a specific tree, but it does not look particularly special.

Name: Special Mushroom
Description: A mushroom needed for making Angler Kayvan's special bait. For some reason, mushrooms of this kind hold some appeal for monsters such that they would willingly collect them...

Name: Special Mint
Description: Mint needed for making Angler Kayvan's special bait. For some reason, mints of this kind hold some appeal for monsters such that they would willingly collect them...

Name: Special Harra Fruit
Description: Harra Fruit needed for making Angler Kayvan's special bait. For some reason, Harra Fruits of this kind hold some appeal for monsters such that they would willingly collect them...

Name: Special Sweet Flower
Description: Sweet Flower needed for making Angler Kayvan's special bait. For some reason, Sweet Flowers of this kind hold some appeal for monsters such that they would willingly collect them...

Name: Box Lunch from Tighnari
Description: Emergency food that Tighnari prepared for Haypasia. Paimon took a peek into the lunchbox, finding some traditional Sumeru delicacies that looked very tasty inside.

Name: Letter to Haypasia
Description: A letter from Tighnari to Haypasia. In the letter, Tighnari explains your identity and situation after coming to Sumeru and requests that Haypasia help clear up your doubts.

Name: Box Lunch from the Traveler
Description: Food that you have specifically prepared for Haypasia. The box contains Sweet Madame and Radish Veggie Soup. You hope Haypasia will like it.

Name: Tighnari's Introduction Letter
Description:
A letter from Tighnari to Rohawi, a researcher from Amurta. In the letter, Tighnari requests that Rohawi use his prowess in collecting information to help you.
Rohawi's address in Sumeru City is also attached therein.

Name: Bag of Transaction Funds
Description: A bag of Mora given by Alhaitham for purchasing Canned Knowledge. You can feel the heavy weight of the bag.

Name: Package of Canned Knowledge
Description: Canned Knowledge purchased at Dori's booth with the Mora given to you by Alhaitham. Packaged as common commodities to keep it low-key.

Name: Canned Knowledge "Swordfighting Techniques VIII"
Description: Canned Knowledge labeled "Swordfighting Techniques VIII." It was bought from Dori's booth at the price of 100,000 Mora at Paimon's instigation. You have no idea where the first seven in the series are, but things like "Combat Techniques" will always be useful. Well, probably.

Name: Bag of Intel Transaction Funds
Description: A bag of Mora provided by Alhaitham for buying the intel on the whereabouts of the Divine Knowledge Capsule.

Name: Picture of the Transaction
Description:
A picture of a scene where the "Divine Knowledge Capsule" is being traded.
In the picture, there is Mizri, the leader of Ayn Al-Ahmar, and the Divine Knowledge Capsule giving off a red glow in his hand.

Name: Informant Code Chart
Description:
A code chart given to you by Alhaitham. Seems like whoever seeks to purchase "special commodities" from Dori has to provide the right code first.
Check this code chart before visiting Dori's contact, just in case.

Name: Misplaced Conch 1
Description: This Imaging Conch should have been placed somewhere else but was abandoned here by someone, causing it to project images out of their proper order. Return it to its rightful place, and who knows what you might find...

Name: Misplaced Conch 2
Description: This Imaging Conch should have been placed somewhere else but was abandoned here by someone, causing it to project images out of their proper order. Return it to its rightful place, and who knows what you might find...

Name: Misplaced Conch 3
Description: This Imaging Conch should have been placed somewhere else but was abandoned here by someone, causing it to project images out of their proper order. Return it to its rightful place, and who knows what you might find...

Name: Prescription Medication from Bimarstan for Gurgen
Description: Medication prescribed for Gurgen. It should be taken along with abundant rest.

Name: Prescription Medication from Bimarstan for Azra
Description: Medication prescribed for Azra. It smells incredibly bitter.

Name: Prescription Medication from Bimarstan for Aftab
Description: Medication prescribed for Aftab. Taker of this medication needs to practice a bland diet.

Name: Fresh Harra Fruit
Description: Harra Fruit needed for making Angler Kayvan's special bait. For some reason, Harra Fruits of this kind have an appeal to monsters. They would often linger around areas where these Harra Fruits are...

Name: Fresh Zaytun Peach
Description: A special Zaytun Peach needed for making Angler Kayvan's special bait. It seems nothing different than a regular Zaytun Peach.

Name: "The Best Water"
Description: Water collected in Vanarana, clear, cold, and refreshing — a leaf falling on top of it would look as if floating in the air. This is transparent water of extraordinary quality.

Name: Silver Pocket Watch
Description: This is certainly not a new pocket watch. But you can tell that it has been carefully polished, evidence of how much the owner really cares about it. Inside is a photograph centering on a young girl from Snezhnaya.

Name: Old Insignia
Description: This looks like a Fatui insignia, but it's all scratched up somehow.

Name: Fresh Slime Condensate
Description: Slime Condensate that looks really fresh. Who knows what Garcia needs it for...

Name: Sareh's Note
Description: This time, we are looking for a kitten named Lale with black and white fur. If you wish to call for Lale's attention in cat language, you need to say "Meow, meow meow meow, meeeeow!" with the tone going downward then upward, before ending on an even higher note.

Name: Sareh's Note
Description: This time, we are looking for a kitten named Nargis with dark-gray fur. To call for Nargis's attention in cat language, you need to say "Meow! Meow meow, meow." Stress the first meow, and be quick while saying the following meows.

Name: Sareh's Note
Description: This time, we are looking for a kitten named Rozan with gray and black stripes. To call for its attention in cat language, you should say "Meow meow meow, meow meow meow." Say it quickly with no elongation.

Name: Fresh Nilotpala Lotus
Description: Flowers that grow in wetlands in the forest and bloom at night. Their fresh petals are important ingredients for the treatment of Eleazar.

Name: Rose Sprout
Description: A flower sprouting in the faded Withering Zone, tender yet tough.

Name: Eagle Feather of The Brave
Description: The brave young ones known as Javans are said to have this tough eagle feather as their symbol.

Name: Florescent Talisman
Description: A talisman woven with childish skills. Its meaning remains unknown. The Dendro energy in it keeps the flower fresh for a long time. But apart from that, there is nothing special about this talisman.

Name: Freshly-Picked Mushroom
Description: Mushrooms collected at the location designated by Hanbei. Although these mushrooms grow on tree trunks, they don't look special at all. They aren't going to cause any trouble, are they?

Name: Strange Sumeru Rose
Description: A Sumeru Rose affected by the Ley Lines. It seems a little different from normal...

Name: Riddle Note
Description:
"A mirror not made of glass reflects every drama."
Another riddle you got from the chest indicated by the previous riddle.
Who wrote these riddles...
Maybe the answer is hidden somewhere associated with dramas?

Name: Riddle Note
Description:
"The sole path to knowledge."
A riddle that is surprisingly straightforward to read.
But what does "the sole path" mean in this case?

Name: Riddle Note
Description:
"The flowers in the pond are blooming, with watery pearls there lingering."
The third riddle found from a chest.
Perhaps this might be some kind of plant?

Name: Riddle Note
Description:
"Please go to the front door of the Temple of Knowledge at noon."
This riddle is like some kind of "invitation"...

Name: Rafiq's Shipbuilding Materials
Description: Shipbuilding materials Rafiq bought. You've heard that these have cost him a fortune...

Name: Little Dried Flower
Description: It looks like an ordinary little dried flower, but it was once a precious gift. It deserves to be cherished, just like the forgotten friendship of the past.

Name: Activated·Canned Knowledge
Description: Canned Knowledge labeled "Swordfighting Techniques VIII." It was bought from Dori's booth at the price of 100,000 Mora at Paimon's instigation. You have no idea where the first seven in the series are, but things like "Combat Techniques" will always be useful. Well, probably.

Name: Persikov's Manuscript
Description: Notes penned by the Fatui researcher Persikov. These notes contain a map, and if you follow its instructions, you should be able to find the crystalline cores that the Cognitive Mimicry device is missing...

Name: Normal Wood
Description: Viktor bought this. He claims that he'll use it to do wood carving.

Name: Fatui Meal
Description: A meal box containing two Panipuri. Viktor and Vsevolod should be a little hungry by now...

Name: Treasure Map in a Box
Description: A treasure map placed at the bottom of a box. It indicates the location of the "good stuff" with simple markings.

Name: Glinting Component
Description: A piece of the Primal Construct that barred your path. This component seems to be reacting with nearby devices, constantly gleaming and glinting as it does.

Name: Sacred Seal: Valley
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? Either way, researchers believe this symbol to have initially stood for "valley."

Name: Sacred Seal: Bird Head
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? Most believe the etchings here symbolize a bird's head.

Name: Sacred Seal: Raised Arm
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? Either way, researchers believe this symbol to have been a phonetic symbol, and that its extended meanings may have included respect or submission.

Name: Sacred Seal: Sandstorm
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The shape of this symbol should be derived from the storms that ravage the desert.

Name: Sacred Seal: Auricle
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The symbol on this plate looks like an auricle, but a consensus has not been reached on this matter.

Name: Sacred Seal: Forest
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? A majority of researchers believe this to represent the forest, and that this suggests that the modern-day desert was not always a desolate wasteland.

Name: Sacred Seal: Thunderstrike
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The shape of this symbol should be derived from the lightning that is ever so rare a sight in the desert.

Name: Sacred Seal: Danger
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The symbol seems to indicate the hazardous circumstance of hanging a chisel hammer on a cliff, and is thought to have emerged at a later date.

Name: Sacred Seal: Chisel Hammer
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The symbol for a chisel hammer is one of the earliest words to emerge.

Name: Sacred Seal: Sunrise
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The origin of this symbol is the rising sun.

Name: Sacred Seal: Right to Rule
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? This symbol is the spitting image of a ruler seated upon a throne.

Name: Sacred Seal: Sheep Head
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building, though the origin of this writing seems unclear. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? Most believe that the etchings here symbolize a sheep's head.

Name: Sacred Seal: Crocodile Head
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The source of this symbol is probably the Spinocrocodile's frighteningly huge maw.

Name: Sacred Seal: Giant Serpent
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? Though Haravatat researchers believe this to be a symbol for a giant serpent, Amurta researchers have proposed a different view, arguing that the Great Red Sand is not home to any snakes. As such, the meaning of and inspiration for this word is still being contested.

Name: Sacred Seal: Ceremony
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The original meaning of this symbol was most likely "sacrifice," with an extended meaning of "rites" or "ceremonies" emerging later.

Name: Sacred Seal: Labor
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The symbol here appeared at the same time as the chisel hammer, and is one of the earliest words to emerge.

Name: Sacred Seal: Dune
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The civilization from the era of King Deshret had different words for dunes of different shapes, something that has brought researchers no lack of headaches.

Name: Golden Rose Seeds
Description: Compared to Sumeru Roses, Golden Roses are a unique species more suited to the deserts. To survive, it has had to protect itself with a shield of mud and stone, but in the right environment, it may yet recoup its original beauty.

Name: Transparent Ruins Record (I)
Description: A stone slate that you found in the transparent ruins near the Mausoleum of King Deshret. This seems to be a record left by a lost civilization.

Name: Record of Lamb-Devourer Rock
Description: A stone slate that you found in the secret Eremite base within Lamb-Devourer Rock. This seems to be a record left by a lost civilization.

Name: Record of the Tomb of Carouses
Description: A stone slate that you found in the Tomb of Carouses. This seems to be a record left by a lost civilization.

Name: Soheil's Old Notes
Description: These are the notes left by Soheil, an Akademiya researcher, who entered the desert to study when he was young. They look very old, but they are not crinkled.

Name: Record of Aaru's Shut
Description: A stone slate that you found at the highest point of the Mausoleum of King Deshret. This seems to be a record left by a lost civilization.

Name: Twilight Theater Head's Notes
Description: The script for "Drama Phantasmagoria: Tale of the Sword-Wielding Princess!" The meandering scribbles appended to the script seem to be annotations from the theater troupe head, some of which contain such radical instructions as to render their adoption unlikely in the extreme.

Name: Freshly-Picked Harra Fruit
Description: A freshly picked Harra Fruit. Perfect for cooking.

Name: Unsigned Note
Description: An unsigned note. No one knows who left it...

Name: Remelting Device
Description: This device, developed by alchemist Hajanad, is cleverly designed with an internal chamber capable of withstanding high pressure and high temperature to withstand the explosion from the "remelting effect". The special valve can be opened automatically at the right time to release the fully mixed medicament smoke and provide the user with assistance in combat. However, judging from some of its details, this experiment seems to be suffering from a shortage of funds. Hajanad's research doesn't seem to be all that well-funded...

Name: Remelting Tablet
Description:
A masterpiece of the alchemist Hajanad, a truly special solid potion. Theoretically, this alchemy tablet can be stored for a long time and is quite safe and easy to carry and transport. However, when in use, the tablet needs to be put into the "remelting device," where the two solid agents will be mixed via micro-explosion to obtain complete efficacy.
And it is always a little disturbing to think that the device in hand may explode...

EffectDescription: Gives 50 Pyro Energy to all party members
Name: Pyro Shard
Description: A shard that broke off a larger Pyro Crystal. Gives 50 Pyro Energy when absorbed.

EffectDescription: Gives 50 Hydro Energy to all party members
Name: Hydro Shard
Description: A shard that broke off a larger Hydro Crystal. Gives 50 Hydro Energy when absorbed.

EffectDescription: Gives 50 Dendro Energy to all party members
Name: Dendro Shard
Description: A shard that broke off a larger Dendro Crystal. Gives 50 Dendro Energy when absorbed.

EffectDescription: Gives 50 Electro Energy to all party members
Name: Electro Shard
Description: A shard that broke off a larger Electro Crystal. Gives 50 Electro Energy when absorbed.

EffectDescription: Gives 50 Anemo Energy to all party members
Name: Anemo Shard
Description: A shard that broke off a larger Anemo Crystal. Gives 50 Anemo Energy when absorbed.

EffectDescription: Gives 50 Cryo Energy to all party members
Name: Cryo Shard
Description: A shard that broke off a larger Cryo Crystal. Gives 50 Cryo Energy when absorbed.

EffectDescription: Gives 50 Geo Energy to all party members
Name: Geo Shard
Description: A shard that broke off a larger Geo Crystal. Gives 50 Geo Energy when absorbed.

EffectDescription: Gives 50 Elemental Energy to all party members
Name: Primordial Elemental Shard
Description: A shard that broke off a larger Elemental Crystal. Gives 50 Elemental Energy when absorbed.

EffectDescription: Gives 30 Pyro Energy to all party members
Name: Pyro Jikaka
Description: A fruit taken from a Pyro Jikaka tree. Gives 30 Pyro Energy when eaten.

EffectDescription: Gives 30 Hydro Energy to all party members
Name: Hydro Jikaka
Description: A fruit taken from the Hydro Jikaka tree. Gives 30 Hydro Energy when eaten.

EffectDescription: Gives 30 Dendro Energy to all party members
Name: Dendro Jikaka
Description: A fruit taken from the Dendro Jikaka tree. Gives 30 Dendro Energy when eaten.

EffectDescription: Gives 30 Electro Energy to all party members
Name: Electro Jikaka
Description: A fruit taken from the Electro Jikaka tree. Gives 30 Electro Energy when eaten.

EffectDescription: Gives 30 Anemo Energy to all party members
Name: Anemo Jikaka
Description: A fruit taken from the Anemo Jikaka tree. Gives 30 Anemo Energy when eaten.

EffectDescription: Gives 30 Cryo Energy to all party members
Name: Cryo Jikaka
Description: A fruit taken from the Cryo Jikaka tree. Gives 30 Cryo Energy when eaten.

EffectDescription: Gives 30 Geo Energy to all party members
Name: Geo Jikaka
Description: A fruit taken from the Geo Jikaka tree. Gives 30 Geo Energy when eaten.

EffectDescription: Gives 30 Elemental Energy to all party members
Name: Standard Jikaka
Description: A fruit taken from a Standard Jikaka tree. Gives 30 Elemental Energy when eaten.

Name: Wanderer's Advice
Description:
Character EXP material. Gives 1000 EXP.
These experiences are still beneficial even if one does not live in Teyvat.

Name: Adventurer's Experience
Description:
Character EXP material. Gives 5000 EXP.
These experiences are very beneficial for journeys into the unknown.

Name: Hero's Wit
Description:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

Name: Enhancement Ore
Description:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 400 EXP.
A refined ingot with endless possibilities that can be used to enhance weapons.

Name: Fine Enhancement Ore
Description:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 2,000 EXP.
For reasons unknown, this special and refined ore can be absorbed by weapons to greatly increase their strengths.

Name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
Description:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

Name: Brilliant Diamond Sliver
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"Welcome to this world."

Name: Brilliant Diamond Fragment
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"Welcome to this world."

Name: Brilliant Diamond Chunk
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"Welcome to this world."

Name: Brilliant Diamond Gemstone
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"Welcome to this world."

Name: Agnidus Agate Sliver
Description: Character Ascension material.

Name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."

Name: Agnidus Agate Chunk
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream."

Name: Agnidus Agate Gemstone
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream.
If the intention yet remains, achieved ██'s truth he has."

Name: Varunada Lazurite Sliver
Description: Character Ascension material.

Name: Varunada Lazurite Fragment
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains."

Name: Varunada Lazurite Chunk
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods..."

Name: Varunada Lazurite Gemstone
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

Name: Nagadus Emerald Sliver
Description: Character Ascension material.

Name: Nagadus Emerald Fragment
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"I had a very, very long dream..."

Name: Nagadus Emerald Chunk
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"I had a very, very long dream..."
"In it, people were holding hands, dancing in a circle, be they sages or fools, dancers or warriors, puppets or statues of gods..."

Name: Nagadus Emerald Gemstone
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"I had a very, very long dream..."
"In it, people were holding hands, dancing in a circle, be they sages or fools, dancers or warriors, puppets or statues of gods..."
"That dancing circle embodied everything about the universe. Life has always been the end, while it is wisdom that shall be the means."

Name: Vajrada Amethyst Sliver
Description: Character Ascension material.

Name: Vajrada Amethyst Fragment
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

Name: Vajrada Amethyst Chunk
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
It should hold absolute control over this world."

Name: Vajrada Amethyst Gemstone
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
"It should hold absolute control over this world.
"It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

Name: Vayuda Turquoise Sliver
Description: Character Ascension material.

Name: Vayuda Turquoise Fragment
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction."

Name: Vayuda Turquoise Chunk
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future..."

Name: Vayuda Turquoise Gemstone
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
"Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future...
"Take my blessings and live leisurely from this day onward."

Name: Shivada Jade Sliver
Description: Character Ascension material.

Name: Shivada Jade Fragment
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."

Name: Shivada Jade Chunk
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."
"...to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."

Name: Shivada Jade Gemstone
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry... to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world.
"Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?
"Then, burn away the old world for me."

Name: Prithiva Topaz Sliver
Description: Character Ascension material.

Name: Prithiva Topaz Fragment
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."

Name: Prithiva Topaz Chunk
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future."

Name: Prithiva Topaz Gemstone
Description:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future.
This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

Name: Dust of Azoth
Description:
A device that can transmute elemental Ascension Materials and change their Elemental Type.
Its practical uses notwithstanding, alchemy is the study of the nature of matter and the rules that underpin its transformations, and ultimately it seeks to comprehend the working principles of the world and the flow of the ley lines.
It is not known who would share alchemical achievements of this magnitude with the civilizations of the world and why. But although the power to fundamentally transmute elemental energy in its crystallized and inert form is a highly useful one, this device also conceals the grave danger of disrupting the elemental balance...

Name: Teachings of Freedom
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom to live is one of such. It is the freedom to live freely and healthily without concerns of one's own safety.

Name: Guide to Freedom
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom of travel is one of such. It is the freedom to traverse the land freely without being obstructed.

Name: Philosophies of Freedom
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
To sing is one such freedom. To sing on the land created by the Anemo Archon is to send your heart away with the song on the wind.

Name: Teachings of Resistance
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Resistance is the backbone of the land of the wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to prevent past conflicts from ever being forgotten, like sprouts breaking through the soil, like the eternal wind eroding through stone walls.

Name: Guide to Resistance
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Resistance is the backbone of the city of Wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to grant the citizens of Mondstadt the freedom they now enjoy, like the Anemo Archon blowing away the snow, or like Vennessa rising up to fight.

Name: Philosophies of Resistance
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Resistance is the backbone of the land of the wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to allow the future Mondstadt's poetry to freely be that of the wind and be spread across the land.

Name: Teachings of Ballad
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of beautiful feelings. On a beautiful day, the breezes carry with them poetry that touches the heart of people like the wind caressing the leaves.

Name: Guide to Ballad
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the will to encourage. In the dark days, the gales in the streets and alleyways whisper words of fury, like the battle drums, like the low rumbling before the storm.

Name: Philosophies of Ballad
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the desire to spread the word. Though nothing is eternal, though nothing will be the same, the wind's poetry will still spread beyond the skies, the land, the seas to every corner of the world.

Name: Teachings of Prosperity
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is the blessing of Liyue, it is the foundation of the great city built by the gods and the people of Liyue, and it is the source of the peace and safety of the land.

Name: Guide to Prosperity
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is the promise made by Liyue to its children: To repay the hard-working laborers with enough gold to brighten up this land.

Name: Philosophies of Prosperity
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is Liyue's past, present, and future. This prosperity is unmatched and unobtainable by any other nations — it all belongs to Liyue and its inhabitants.

Name: Teachings of Diligence
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Diligence is having the bravery and the strength to conquer mountains and seas and to pursue gold and prosperity through honest, hard work.

Name: Guide to Diligence
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is the catalyst that flows in the blood of the people of Liyue, able to turn rocks into gold. It is what lies behind the greatness of its great commercial port.

Name: Philosophies of Diligence
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is believing in one's own ability to earn a place in the land of the gods through sweat, wisdom, and power.

Name: Teachings of Gold
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Gold is the symbol of the land of Geo.
Gold is the blood that flows deep within Liyue's veins, the muscle that makes up Liyue's beating heart, and the bones that make Liyue stand proud.

Name: Guide to Gold
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Gold is the symbol of the land of Geo.
Gold symbolizes conversion. This is the unspoken understanding between Liyue's mountains, land, city, and people. In Liyue, industriousness is converted into gold, and gold into prosperity.

Name: Philosophies of Gold
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Gold is the symbol of the land of Geo.
Gold is the wealth of Liyue, but Liyue's true wealth is the hearts of its people that shine like gold.

Name: Crown of Insight
Description:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

Name: Teachings of Transience
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
Fleeting glories are the highest expression of mortal beauty, for are we mortals not like the flashing lightning itself? Like a lovely dream or blossoming spark, we shall leave a gorgeous mark on the eternal night sky.

Name: Guide to Transience
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
We find the greatest joys in mortal life in transient dreams, for is life itself not like the shadow of the thunder? Pursue your dreams into the clouds if you wish, and enjoy the unexpected silence of the dim lamp-lit nights.

Name: Philosophies of Transience
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
The fleeting nature of this mortal world is the essence of beauty, for are our lives in this world not akin to the levin flash? Yet the might of the divine comes suddenly, and before the roar of eternity, who can stand?

Name: Teachings of Elegance
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Elegance is the form of the nation of thunder.
Elegance brooks no flattery, and the elegant are ever noble. They are like the sea eagles who soar on high to contend with the resounding storms. They will not cater to philistine vulgarity, as one would not cast a flower crown into the mud, staining its dignity.

Name: Guide to Elegance
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Elegance is the form of the nation of thunder.
Elegance shuns arrogance. The elegant are ever humble, and only by discarding vanity and sloth may one see clearly — and is there not beauty and loveliness even in the basest of appearances?

Name: Philosophies of Elegance
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Elegance is the form of the nation of thunder.
Elegance abhors vulgarity, and the elegant ever walk alone. Resisting base evils, unmoved by base loves, never taking refuge in base ignorance — that is how one perceives the chasm between the elegant and the contemptuous.

Name: Teachings of Light
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Light is the yearning of the land of thunder.
The ruler who claims to have perceived all forever aims to hoard celestial glory. But this vision that cannot be shared only leads people to long for it more fiercely, like moths diving into the flame.

Name: Guide to Light
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Light is the yearning of the land of thunder.
Though the sun rays themselves should be blocked by layers upon layers of clouds, there are still those in the thunder god's land who dream of piercing that wrathful sea of lightning to pursue the glory of the divine, fearing not that they shall be cruelly struck down.

Name: Philosophies of Light
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Light is the yearning of the land of thunder.
Though they must live forever on the earth, humanity will always reach for the light. Mortals will pursue and surpass, and they will never stop. A sealed eternity may, perhaps, look magnificent, but its essence is death.

Name: Teachings of Admonition
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Admonition is the branches of the nation of wisdom.
Admonition comes from a pure heart. Only sensible words of goodwill can express profound wisdom and free the sprout of knowledge from the shackles of arrogance.

Name: Guide to Admonition
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Admonition is the branches of the nation of wisdom.
Admonition is paired with wise thinking. Careful deliberation affords humble words a clarity that convinces the wise and enlightens the foolish. Such words allow wisdom to flow like an unobstructed river.

Name: Philosophies of Admonition
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Admonition is the branches of the nation of wisdom.
Admonition is completed by good deeds. What is done confers real meaning upon what is said. When one's mind, words, and deeds are aligned, their nourishment shall guarantee the fruition of wisdom's tree.

Name: Teachings of Ingenuity
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Ingenuity is the leaf-veins of the nation of wisdom.
Ingenuity springs forth from benevolent consideration. They say that "a poisonous tree bears no kind fruit." Similarly, ingenious nascent ideas are always born from determined and benign minds, for only they are worthy bearers of wisdom.

Name: Guide to Ingenuity
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Ingenuity is the leaf-veins of the nation of wisdom. Ingenuity sets words of integrity on the right path. One who thinks out of goodwill and in a clever and careful fashion never deviates from the path of boons. Yet one who thinks with contempt and malice shall taint their words with despicable colors.

Name: Philosophies of Ingenuity
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Ingenuity is the leaf-veins of the nation of wisdom.
Ingenuity is completed by harmonious conduct. What is done completes what is thought. Wisdom blooms where the mind, words, and practice converge.

Name: Teachings of Praxis
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Praxes are the roots of the nation of wisdom.
Praxes stem from an unwavering will. All wisdom is manifested through the unyielding pursuit of goodness. Where goodness is not practiced, ingenuity and eloquence wither.

Name: Guide to Praxis
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Praxes are the roots of the nation of wisdom.
Praxes validate words of honesty. Though one speaks and acts out of goodwill, one has not yet obtained wisdom. Wisdom, born from action, is a signet pressed upon honest words.

Name: Philosophies of Praxis
Description:
Talent Level-Up material.
Praxes are the roots of the nation of wisdom.
Praxes bring forth the fruit of wisdom. Practice grants itself meaning, and it is only by treading a path that unites action, speech, and thought that the wise may reach perfection.

Name: Teachings of Equity
Description:
Talent Level-Up Material.
The shore of the Nation of Water is equity.
Equity sets boundaries on rights. Without equity, the rights granted by law will be abused, and become a tool to damage our virtuous customs.

Name: Guide to Equity
Description:
Talent Level-Up Material.
The shore of the Nation of Water is equity.
Equity is the foundation upon which Fontaine was founded. Equity forms the standard of the law. If law loses the essence of equity, it will become a chessboard played for profit.

Name: Philosophies of Equity
Description:
Talent Level-Up Material.
The shore of the Nation of Water is equity.
Equity is the foundation upon which Fontaine was founded. Equity requires the continuous and steady support of morality and law, and morality and law constantly change based upon the invariant principle of equity.

Name: Teachings of Justice
Description:
Talent Level-Up Material.
The sword of the Nation of Water is justice.
The law of Fontaine walks with the sword of justice in hand. Without the guidance of justice, all law is reduced to meaningless words, to be tampered with and slaughtered at a whim.

Name: Guide to Justice
Description:
Talent Level-Up Material.
The sword of the Nation of Water is justice.
The law of Fontaine walks with the sword of justice in hand. Justice must be blind, and those who wield the sword of justice must not be led astray by their own interests or affairs.

Name: Philosophies of Justice
Description:
Talent Level-Up Material.
The sword of the Nation of Water is justice.
The law of Fontaine walks with the sword of justice in hand. Justice means judgment and reconciliation, the blade of judgment arrests the actions of evil, while reconciliation maintains order.

Name: Teachings of Order
Description:
Talent Level-Up Material.
The shield of the Nation of Water is order.
All law in Fontaine ultimately serves to maintain a stable order. Without order, there is chaos, and there can be no fairness in chaos.

Name: Guide to Order
Description:
Talent Level-Up Material.
The shield of the Nation of Water is order.
All law in Fontaine ultimately serves to maintain a stable order. Without the guarantee provided by order, justice will be reduced to unlimited violence, a weapon used by all against all.

Name: Philosophies of Order
Description:
Talent Level-Up Material.
The shield of the Nation of Water is order.
All law in Fontaine ultimately serves to maintain a stable order. Equity and justice come from order, and serve order. Like the still, ripple-less surface of the waters of Fontaine, order is the cornerstone of Fontaine's existence.

Name: Sanctifying Unction
Description:
Artifact EXP material. Gives 2,500 EXP.
Material that contains the distilled essence of great power. It can contribute to the enhancement of artifacts.

Name: Sanctifying Essence
Description:
Artifact EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Artifacts are themselves the physical manifestation of ideals and memories. Materials such as this, which contain the distilled essence of the power thereof, can make these memories and ideals clearer and stronger still.

Name: Test Stamina Growth Item
Description: Test item for increasing stamina

Name: Test Temporary stamina Growth Item
Description: Test item for increasing max stamina temporarily

Name: Anemoculus
Description: A substance that has accumulated intense Anemo energy. Offer it to the Statue and help reinstate the power it has lost over the years.

Name: Elemental Dust
Description: Shattered fragments of the Oculus Crystal. Shows hidden treasure nearby.

Name: Geoculus
Description: A substance that has accumulated intense Geo energy. Offer it to the Statue and help reinstate the power it has lost over the years.

Name: Adventure Treasure Pack
Description: Daily highscore reward. Grants 1 random T1 Character Ascension material.

Name: Skyrider Greatsword Chest
Description: This chest opens automatically, granting a Skyrider Greatsword.

Name: Mondstadt Shrine of Depths Key
Description:
A key that can break the seal on the ancient Shrines of Depths scattered around Mondstadt.
These Shrines of Depths sealed themselves off when the civilization that built them was lost. Keys lost deep within domains are able to break the seals. Or perhaps that, for a moment, these keys help the seals to forget all that they have lost.

Name: Liyue Shrine of Depths Key
Description:
A key that can break the seal on the ancient Shrines of Depths scattered around Liyue.
These Shrines of Depths sealed themselves off when the civilization that built them was lost. Keys lost deep within domains are able to break the seals. Or perhaps that, for a moment, these keys help the seals to forget all that they have lost.

Name: Inazuma Shrine of Depths Key
Description:
A key that can break the seal on the ancient Shrines of Depths scattered around Inazuma.
These Shrines of Depths sealed themselves off when the civilization that built them was lost. Keys lost deep within domains are able to break the seals. Or perhaps that, for a moment, these keys help the seals to forget all that they have lost.

Name: Fragile Resin
Description:
An item used to restore Original Resin by 60 points.
This crystalline substance pulsates with a little energy that can be absorbed by Original Resin.
The flow of energies of all sorts is the source of many wonders and challenges in this world. Those same energies are also contained within this crystal.

Name: Crimson Agate
Description: A type of crystal formed from the combination of concentrated life force with an energy unique to Dragonspine. Makes for an ideal nutrient for growing Frostbearing Trees.

Name: Crimson Agate (Display)
Description: A type of crystal formed from the combination of concentrated life force with an energy unique to Dragonspine. Makes for an ideal nutrient for growing Frostbearing Trees.

Name: Transient Resin
Description:
An item that can be used to replenish Original Resin. Once used, it will replenish 60 Original Resin.
Once obtained, it will <color=#FF5E41CC>automatically dissipate</color> after a period of time.
·The expiration time will be calculated from the Monday after this item is obtained, and it will disappear seven days from then.
·Multiple Transient Resins obtained on different weeks will have their expiration dates counted independently.

Pure energy that will dissipate with time. In this, it is similar to all else that is lovely in this world. But seize this opportunity and go make the world a slightly better place, as is fitting for one who dwells within the bounds of "time."

Name: Vial of Adeptal Speed
Description: A small bottle that seals some adeptal energy within. Will immediately complete a furnishing when used.

Name: Electroculus
Description: A substance that has accumulated intense Electro energy. Offer it to the Statue and help reinstate the power it has lost over the years.

Name: Moonchase Charm
Description: These jade talismans have been placed in various areas by the Adventurers' Guild. They are made from crystal-clear and gently lustrous Plaustrite Shards. It is said that these talismans contain the essence of the bright white moon and store the reminiscences that people have of festivals past.

Name: Lumenspar
Description:
A sky-blue crystal that glitters so brightly that it brings forth echoes of the heavens above, which cannot be seen from underground...
If you hold it up to your ear, you can almost hear a soft sigh coming from within.
This might sound strange, but this crystal also gives off a faint warmth.

Name: Dendroculus
Description: A substance that has accumulated intense Dendro energy. Offer it to the Statue and help reinstate the power it has lost over the years.

Name: Sumeru Shrine of Depths Key
Description:
A key that can break the seal on the ancient Shrines of Depths scattered around Sumeru.
These Shrines of Depths sealed themselves off when the civilization that built them was lost. Keys lost deep within domains are able to break the seals. Or perhaps that, for a moment, these keys help the seals to forget all that they have lost.

Name: Plume of Purifying Light
Description: Fragment left by Khvarena. Carrier of past memories.

Name: Hydroculus
Description: A substance that has accumulated intense Hydro energy. Offer it to the Statue and help reinstate the power it has lost over the years.

Name: Voucher Box
Description: Box that contains Joyeux Vouchers. They have a unique flower-like shape and can only be found in the Veluriyam Mirage. They are also important collectibles for guests who wish to win rewards. Using the Flowing Joyspar and Felicitous Joyspar seems to allow one to more effectively find them...

Name: Fontaine Shrine of Depths Key
Description:
A key that can break the seal on the ancient Shrines of Depths scattered around Fontaine.
These Shrines of Depths sealed themselves off when the civilization that built them was lost. Keys lost deep within domains are able to break the seals. Or perhaps that, for a moment, these keys help the seals to forget all that they have lost.

EffectDescription: Increases all party members' DEF by 88 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
Name: Suspicious Fisherman's Toast
Description: Onion-covered toast. Not quite cooked right. You'll notice its imperfection, even if you eat it while fishing.

EffectDescription: Increases all party members' DEF by 107 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
Name: Fisherman's Toast
Description: Onion-covered toast. A favorite amongst fishermen, they will stuff a bag with it and sit by the river all day.

EffectDescription: Increases all party members' DEF by 126 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
Name: Delicious Fisherman's Toast
Description: Onion-covered toast. Exudes a wonderful aroma. Are the fish biting for the bait, or is it the toast they're after?

EffectDescription: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.
Name: Suspicious Teyvat Fried Egg
Description: An egg fried on one side. A bit hard in the middle. One can only hope it still has its nutrients.

EffectDescription: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.
Name: Teyvat Fried Egg
Description: An egg fried on one side. The yolk flows out nicely when broken. So satisfying.

EffectDescription: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.
Name: Delicious Teyvat Fried Egg
Description: An egg fried on one side. With a taste of the summer sun, it invigorates you from the first bite.

EffectDescription: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.
Name: Suspicious Steak
Description: A grilled steak. Its color is a little bleak, almost as if it feels sorry for itself for being a sorry excuse for a steak.

EffectDescription: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.
Name: Steak
Description: A grilled steak. High heat has locked the juices in, giving one high expectations for when the meat is cut open.

EffectDescription: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.
Name: Delicious Steak
Description: A grilled steak. Juicy, flavorsome, fragrant steak. One bite and you feel yourself come alive.

EffectDescription: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.
Name: Outrider's Champion Steak!
Description: Amber's specialty. One side is obviously uncooked. The other side gives off a subtle scent of something burnt. Close your eyes and have a big mouthful, just to keep Amber happy if nothing else.

EffectDescription: Restores 8% of Max HP and an additional 800 HP to the selected character.
Name: Suspicious Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
Description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. At first glance it's hard to tell which is which.

EffectDescription: Restores 9% of Max HP and an additional 1,000 HP to the selected character.
Name: Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
Description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. Fresh poultry is complimented by fragrant mushrooms. Don't be picky, chow down!

EffectDescription: Restores 10% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.
Name: Delicious Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
Description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. All the best the wild has to offer are pierced on just one stick.

EffectDescription: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1,350 HP to the selected character.
Name: Fruity Skewers
Description: Kaeya's specialty. A chewy skewer with a rich sweet aftertaste. Wait... Is this really the smell of fruit?

EffectDescription: Restores 18% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.
Name: Suspicious Flaming Red Bolognese
Description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. A bit chewy and annoyingly sticks to your teeth.

EffectDescription: Restores 20% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 390 HP every 5s for 30s.
Name: Flaming Red Bolognese
Description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The meaty, herby aroma really gets your appetite going.

EffectDescription: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.
Name: Delicious Flaming Red Bolognese
Description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The beautiful, authentic flavors take you on a culinary adventure from the first bite to the last.

EffectDescription: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.
Name: Mysterious Bolognese
Description: Lisa's specialty. With an inexplicable aura, this bolognese is so exotic that you can never have enough. Did she actually enchant it with some kind of magic?

EffectDescription: Restores 8% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 210 HP every 5s for 30s.
Name: Suspicious Radish Veggie Soup
Description: Radish-based vegetable soup. The vegetables within appear to have been victims of a frost.

EffectDescription: Restores 9% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 260 HP every 5s for 30s.
Name: Radish Veggie Soup
Description: Radish-based vegetable soup. Its flavor is delicately between tart and sweet. With luscious radish, it's a well-balanced dish.

EffectDescription: Restores 10% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.
Name: Delicious Radish Veggie Soup
Description: Radish-based vegetable soup. The clear aromas are perfectly accompanied by a sunny summer afternoon.

EffectDescription: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.
Name: Suspicious Tea Break Pancake
Description: A stack of round pancakes. A burnt scent masks what you can only assume should be a sweet taste. The berries are the only thing saving this dish.

EffectDescription: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.
Name: Tea Break Pancake
Description: A stack of round pancakes. A staple originating from afternoon tea in manors. Only the best berries should be picked for this dish.

EffectDescription: Revives a character and restores 550 HP.
Name: Delicious Tea Break Pancake
Description: A stack of round pancakes. Tender and fluffy, the sweet-smelling pancakes taste like clouds. A heavenly delicacy, no doubt.

EffectDescription: Increases all party members' ATK by 66 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
Name: Suspicious Fried Radish Balls
Description: Fried Radish Balls. Way too oily, and leaves you looking for something to drink to cut through the grease.

EffectDescription: Increases all party members' ATK by 81 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
Name: Fried Radish Balls
Description: Fried Radish Balls. Fragrant and crispy. Make sure to eat them while they're hot! Said to be a recipe from Liyue.

EffectDescription: Increases all party members' ATK by 95 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
Name: Delicious Fried Radish Balls
Description: Fried Radish Balls. It's insane that something so delicious comes from plain old radishes! All who eat them will truly understand Liyue's culinary reputation.

EffectDescription: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
Name: Suspicious Satisfying Salad
Description: A vegetable salad. Regrettably, it seems the best time to plate the potatoes and boiled eggs was missed.
