This flimsy page has seemingly dropped from the spine of a storybook of storied age.
Perhaps you might be able to reconstruct the complete text, should you find other torn pages elsewhere.

Name: A Thousand Nights (I)
Description: A wandering researcher once walked through rainforest, desert, and city during a time of great catastrophe, collecting these stories along the way. It is said that the original work truly did contain countless tales and that naught but a fragment of that is still extant today.

Name: A Thousand Nights (II)
Description: A wandering researcher once walked through rainforest, desert, and city during a time of great catastrophe, collecting these stories along the way. It is said that the original work truly did contain countless tales and that naught but a fragment of that is still extant today.

Name: A Thousand Nights (III)
Description: A wandering researcher once walked through rainforest, desert, and city during a time of great catastrophe, collecting these stories along the way. It is said that the original work truly did contain countless tales and that naught but a fragment of that is still extant today.

Name: A Thousand Nights (IV)
Description: A wandering researcher once walked through rainforest, desert, and city during a time of great catastrophe, collecting these stories along the way. It is said that the original work truly did contain countless tales and that naught but a fragment of that is still extant today.

Name: A Thousand Nights (V)
Description: A wandering researcher once walked through rainforest, desert, and city during a time of great catastrophe, collecting these stories along the way. It is said that the original work truly did contain countless tales and that naught but a fragment of that is still extant today.

Name: A Thousand Nights (VI)
Description: A wandering researcher once walked through rainforest, desert, and city during a time of great catastrophe, collecting these stories along the way. It is said that the original work truly did contain countless tales and that naught but a fragment of that is still extant today.

Name: Shevirme's Invoice
Description: An invoice that Georg wrote for Shevirme. It records the price for the 50 boxes of Fruits of the Festival, the details of various fees, the transaction time, and the estimated time when the goods will arrive. This will surely put the client at ease.

Name: Quqing's Invoice
Description: An invoice that Diane wrote for Quqing. It records the price for the 65 boxes of Mintberries, the details of various fees, the transaction time, and the estimated time when the goods will arrive. This will surely put the client at ease.

Name: Guanchui's Invoice
Description: An invoice that Georg wrote for Guanchui. It records the price for the 100 boxes of Fruits of the Festival, the details of various fees, the transaction time, and the estimated time when the goods will arrive. This will surely put the client at ease.

Name: Soulferry
Description: A chess piece placed in the temple of Gurabad. It is supposed to resemble a ferry meant to carry off the dead.

Name: Khaj-Nisut
Description: A chess piece placed in the temple of Gurabad. This piece is built to be a miniature Khaj-Nisut, which once belonged to King Deshret.

Name: Border Fort
Description: A chess piece placed in the temple of Gurabad. This piece has been carved to look like a fortress on the border.

Name: King Deshret's Pillar
Description: A chess piece placed in the temple of Gurabad. This piece resembles the grand monument dedicated to King Deshret's ancient civilization.

Name: Temple of Gurabad
Description: A chess piece placed in the temple of Gurabad. This piece resembles the grand temple to King Deshret in Gurabad.

Name: Activation Device: The Mausoleum of King Deshret
Description: An activatable device for a chess piece. Only the Jinn that served King Deshret can understand the complexities of its mechanisms.

Name: Activation Device: Deshret's Glass Goblet
Description: An activatable device for a chess piece. Only the Jinn that served King Deshret can understand the complexities of its mechanisms.

Name: Activation Device: Soulferry
Description: An activatable device for a chess piece. Only the Jinn that served King Deshret can understand the complexities of its mechanisms.

Name: Activation Device: Khaj-Nisut
Description: An activatable device for a chess piece. Only the Jinn that served King Deshret can understand the complexities of its mechanisms.

Name: Activation Device: Border Fort
Description: An activatable device for a chess piece. Only the Jinn that served King Deshret can understand the complexities of its mechanisms.

Name: Activation Device: King Deshret's Pillar
Description: An activatable device for a chess piece. Only the Jinn that served King Deshret can understand the complexities of its mechanisms.

Name: Activation Device: Temple of Gurabad
Description: An activatable device for a chess piece. Only the Jinn that served King Deshret can understand the complexities of its mechanisms.

Name: Memories of the Eternal Oasis (I)
Description: The oldest memories connected to the Eternal Oasis, resembling runes adrift upon the air.

Name: Memories of the Eternal Oasis (II)
Description: The oldest memories connected to the Eternal Oasis, resembling runes adrift upon the air.

Name: Memories of the Eternal Oasis (III)
Description: The oldest memories connected to the Eternal Oasis, resembling runes adrift upon the air.

Name: Tadhla's Feather
Description: The feathers needed for a falcon to take flight. If they are plucked, then flight will become all but impossible...

Name: Fatui Stronghold Key
Description: A key to the front gates of the Fatui stronghold in the desert. It should open their massive doors without any issues. Here's hoping...

Name: Sacred Seal: Precipice
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? Some claimed that it bears the form of a zither from a bygone and ancient nation, yet the symbol seemed to be related to descriptions of dangerous situations. Ultimately, it was confirmed to be the shape of a promontory, symbolic of ill omens on the horizon.

Name: Sacred Seal: Grand Door
Description: A stone plate with ancient text on it that seems to have once been part of a certain building. The desert sands play host to many an unknown wish. Who made them, and who carries them now? The symbol is the silhouetted shape of a stone door from an ancient palace.

Name: Mysterious Stone Slate (I)
Description: An ancient stone slate carved with inscriptions. Its texture is solid while its design is fascinating to behold.

Name: Mysterious Stone Slate (II)
Description: An ancient stone slate carved with inscriptions. Its texture is solid while its design is fascinating to behold.

Name: Mysterious Stone Slate (III)
Description: An ancient stone slate carved with inscriptions. Its texture is solid while its design is fascinating to behold.

Name: Mysterious Stone Slate (IV)
Description: An ancient stone slate carved with inscriptions. Its texture is solid while its design is fascinating to behold.

Name: Mysterious Stone Slate (V)
Description: An ancient stone slate carved with inscriptions. Its texture is solid while its design is fascinating to behold.

Name: Mysterious Stone Slate (VI)
Description: An ancient stone slate carved with inscriptions. Its texture is solid while its design is fascinating to behold.

Name: Cyno's Introduction Letter
Description: A recommendation that Cyno wrote for you. It represents the trust the General Mahamatra places in you.

Name: Ancient Map
Description: A map that you found in Taj's room. It shows the location of the Court of Desolation.

Name: Auction Information
Description: Information regarding an auction that Dori collected and compiled. You can find details concerning the Canned Knowledge auction being held in the desert here.

Name: Keystone (II)
Description: A stone slate with some kind of power remaining within it. It can be used to open nearby paths. Well, one might suppose that this is some ancient key, right?

Name: Azalai's Payment
Description: Azalai's payment. It feels quite substantial...

Name: Rama's Receipt
Description: A receipt you got from Rama. It can be used to collect goods purchased from Rama.

Name: Butrus' Receipt
Description: A receipt you got from Butrus. It can be used to collect goods purchased from Butrus.

Name: Jut's Receipt
Description: A receipt you got from Jut. It can be used to collect goods purchased from Jut.

Name: Jahangir's Receipt
Description: A receipt you got from Jahangir. It can be used to collect goods purchased from Jahangir.

Name: Limited Edition Desert Special Travel Pack
Description: A travel bag you purchased from Dori. All manner of curiosities are contained within. You can't quite make sense of its contents, but on further examination, they all seem quite useful...

Name: Nascent Bamboo Shoots
Description: During certain seasons, the Bamboo Shoots grown in Qingce Village will release a most delectable fragrance, the scent betraying its status as a most vaunted ingredient for certain recipes.

Name: A Short Letter
Description: A short letter that was written in code. You do not know who wrote it or why, but it has ended up here all the same.

Name: Internal Withdrawal Document
Description: An official order cast aside within the barracks.

Name: Preliminary Test on Experimental Subject
Description: A thick stack of letters and research papers, detailing the conditions of "The Human Specimen."

Name: Transfer Notification
Description: An official Fatui notification that seems related to the destination of a troop transfer.

Name: Pathfinders' Log: I
Description: Pathfinders' Log: I

Name: Pathfinders' Log: II
Description: Pathfinders' Log: II

Name: Pathfinders' Log: III
Description: Pathfinders' Log: III

Name: Pathfinders' Log: IV
Description: Pathfinders' Log: IV

Name: Pathfinders' Log: V
Description: Pathfinders' Log: V

Name: Pathfinders' Log: VI
Description: Pathfinders' Log: VI

Name: Note Regarding an Exchange of Goods
Description: A letter, presumably from the Fatui, on which appears to contain certain details of Aderfi's deal with them.

Name: Haniyyah's Notes - First Part
Description: Old notes left by Haniyyah that seem to be about her family.

Name: Haniyyah's Notes - Second Part
Description: Old notes left by Haniyyah that seem to be about her family.

Name: Clues For Yae Miko
Description: After taking careful pictures of Dori's gift, you combine those pictures with the clues you got from your previous analysis together — the result being this set of notes, which shall be sent to Yae Miko for further analysis. Yae Miko is no researcher, but her vast knowledge and experience should allow her to glean some key information from these clues nonetheless.

Name: Cyno's Missive
Description: A letter that Cyno sent to you through Sido. It seems to have things to say about the ongoing affairs...

Name: Layla's List of Orders
Description:
This is a list containing the items Layla ordered from the Almighty Merchant. The cooking ingredients that Layla was looking to purchase are written down here.
The list mentions the address where she first met up with the Almighty Merchant and the names of the items that Layla was sold. Special mention is made of Layla's purchase of an item "that has never been found anywhere in the Grand Bazaar," as if to prevent the other party from forgetting Layla's identity. But for some reason, the meeting address was not in Sumeru City, but instead on a road outside the city. This Almighty Merchant character seems most adept at scheduling, to have accepted Layla's order while still transporting their goods.

Name: Initial Investigation Clues
Description:
Clues that you gathered from the Nilotpala Cup Beast Tamers Tournament's Floral Jelly booth while no one was around — you took some photos of Floral Jelly and the Floral Jelly recipe.
However, these two objects will require professional analysis before they yield any meaningful information.

Name: Haniyyah's Notes
Description: Old notes left by Haniyyah that seem to be about her family.

Name: Special Wisdom Orb
Description: This Wisdom Orb looks quite familiar, though its back and base appear to have a few scratches and dings, almost as if it has been fought over at some point. If you look closely, you can even find the following words: "Backdoor command application sample" and "Confirmed to have no value, may be discarded," as well as some blood. It seems that not only did someone snatch this, but that they might have met with some misfortune afterward...

Name: Mysterious Fatui Letter
Description: A letter you found after defeating a Fatui Agent you came across. Why would he carry this with him, though?

Name: Hilt-Like Object
Description: Something that looks like a hilt. Perhaps this might be the Unseen Razor that Lan is looking for...

Name: "A Brief Analysis of Possible Events of Historical Importance in the Tatarasuna Area"
Description: "A Brief Analysis of Possible Events of Historical Importance in the Tatarasuna Area"

Name: Boxful of Homeland Soil
Description:
Soil you obtained for Sun Yu from his homeland.
Long is his journey, and uncertain is his return.

Name: Derived Contents
Description: Contents compiled after combining the clues.

Name: Xudong's Letter
Description: A letter left by Xudong. There seems to be something else clipped in there as well...

Description: Conscription Slate

Name: Red Vulture's Feather
Description: The feathers that abet a red vulture's ability of flight. It can be used to create vibrant pigments... Or even lethal poisons.

Name: Scorpion's Sting
Description: A scorpion's stinger and the connected poison glands. A certifiable classic instrument for assassinations in the desert.

Name: Flying Serpent's Horn
Description: This, as the name implies, is the horn of a flying serpent. The tribes of the desert will grind it down to powder to make ineffective potions and tout these creations as potent tonics to swindle researchers in the city. It sells quite well.

Name: Captain Zoya Snezhevna's Report (I)
Description: Captain Zoya Snezhevna's Report (I)

Name: Captain Zoya Snezhevna's Report (II)
Description: Captain Zoya Snezhevna's Report (II)

Name: Captain Zoya Snezhevna's Report (III)
Description: Captain Zoya Snezhevna's Report (III)

Name: Damaged Records: I
Description: Damaged Records: I

Name: Damaged Records: II
Description: Damaged Records: II

Name: Tanit Emblem-Marked Records
Description: Tanit Emblem-Marked Records

Name: Fatui Letter
Description: Internal Withdrawal Document

Name: An Abandoned Letter
Description: An Abandoned Letter

Name: Zandik's Note
Description: Zandik's Note

Name: Akademiya Emblem-Marked Contract
Description: Akademiya Emblem-Marked Contract

Name: Restored Blueprints of a Mechanical Behemoth's Power System
Description: Restored Blueprints of a Mechanical Behemoth's Power System

Name: Secret Letter to Aderfi
Description: Secret Letter to Aderfi

Name: Random Weapon Shards
Description: The shards of some random weapon. It is unknown how they ended up so broken...

Name: Unattributed Ramen Voucher
Description:
A thank-you gift for assisting "Bona-Fide Beetle Battle King" Arataki Itto in competing against Grandmaster Hanakado in the Almighty Arataki Extraordinary and Exhilarating Extreme Beetle Brawl. And it also serves as proof of the rapid rising of two beetle-fighting stars, "Oni King's Right Hand" and "Skycleaving White-Iron Lavender Melon."
The "Bona-Fide Beetle Battle King" claims that as long as you show this voucher to the stall, you can "enjoy a free bowl of ramen for two months straight!" But... which stall is "the stall" exactly?

Name: Neat Note
Description: Neat Note

Name: Jeht's Letter
Description: Jeht's Letter

Name: Ufairah's Notes
Description: Ufairah's Notes

Name: Ancient Stone Key
Description: A mysterious key held by the Matriarch of the Tanit tribe. It should be able to open a certain door somewhere...

Name: Plump Harra Fruit
Description: Commonly grown in the hot and humid rainforest, this fruit has with a special spicy aroma. When paired with other fruits, a greater layering of flavors can be achieved.

Name: Juicy Zaytun Peach
Description: The fruit of a forest shrub. Its flesh is firm and sweet. It is said to have a calming effect on the mind, which presently makes it very suited for Layla.

Name: Fresh Apple
Description: Crisp and fragrant. Aside from being eaten raw or used to ferment a beverage, roasting apples also brings forth a distinctive flavor.

Name: Dry Firewood
Description: Firewood collected at one's leisure. The wood is of appropriate size and dryness for campfire. Food cooked using this will have the natural scent of charcoal. Hopefully, they will grant Layla a bit more vigor.

Name: Crumpled Namelist
Description: Crumpled Namelist

Name: Warehouse Inventory Records
Description: Warehouse Inventory Records

Name: Records of the Ancient Oases: Part VII
Description: Records of the Ancient Oases: Part VII

Name: Records of the Ancient Oases: Part VIII
Description: Records of the Ancient Oases: Part VIII

Name: Records of the Ancient Oases: Part IX
Description: Records of the Ancient Oases: Part IX

Name: Records of the Ancient Oases: Part X
Description: Records of the Ancient Oases: Part X

Name: Employment Code of Conduct Tablet
Description: Employment Code of Conduct Tablet

Name: Akademiya Emblem-Marked Contract
Description: Akademiya Emblem-Marked Contract

Name: Akademiya Emblem-Marked Contract
Description: Akademiya Emblem-Marked Contract

Name: Wine-Scented Letter
Description: This letter has a faint whiff of alcohol. One can speculate as to the circumstances under which it was written. The sender seemed to have had little hope that it could be delivered.

Name: Strange Mushroom
Description: Can mushrooms... really grow in a field like this?

Name: Nameless Taboo Medicine of the Royal Court
Description: The smell of this stings your nose and will not easily fade. According to the records, this medicine requires the power of the God of Wisdom to awaken the addled mind. Perhaps it might be able to resist the "curse."

Name: Strange Mushroom-Watering Water
Description: You drew this water at two in the afternoon from a waterfall beside a Statue of The Seven, just as Eide instructed.

Name: Tribe Merchant's Letter
Description: Tribe Merchant's Letter

Name: Jeht's Note
Description: Jeht's Note

Name: Piping-Hot Bamboo Shoot Soup
Description: Bamboo Shoot Soup created using the Supreme Cuisine Machine. Zhongli rated this dish as such: "The appearance is exquisite, and the aroma rich and intense." Among its key ingredients are Nascent Bamboo Shoots. They're hard to come by... And due to a multiplicity of reasons, their commemorative value far exceeds their worth as cooking ingredients. Since this meal was created by an adeptus, it shouldn't spoil even if you just leave it in your bag.

Name: Warrior's Spirit Swordfighting Arena Ticket
Description: Beyond nation, beyond identity, united only by mettle and might.

Name: Venti's Note
Description: A paper with a simple map and something like an incantation on it. According to Venti, it contains the secrets to revealing the prophecy.

Name: Collei's Windblume
Description:
To Collei, the only flower that can serve as her Windblume and convey her gratitude and well-wishes is the Padisarah. She now offers their seeds to you.
In visiting Mondstadt again, Collei has taken a tentative step toward the future. May her coming days be as a small seed held within her palm, filled deep with the potential for light and hope.

Name: Great Song of Khvarena
Description: The Great Songs of Khvarena contain immense power, but only the Pari can obtain the Khvarena's approval and unleash its potential through a special ritual...

Name: Schematic Clipped Inside Notes
Description: The sketches taken from the mysterious investigative notes seem to list the structural layout of the ruined underground proving grounds and the location of the Great Song of Khvarena...

Name: Rene's Investigation Notes
Description: Supposedly, these notes were left by a great researcher who yearned to "surpass mortality," and its contents detail his experiences exploring ruins, along with the knowledge he gained in the process...

Name: Notes Left by Someone
Description: This appears to be notes left by a member of the Order of Skeptics. It has information on the lost Kory Drums and their traditional usage.

Name: Ancient Volume
Description: An ancient document passed down from prior generations of Skeptics. The arcane language makes the contents hard to decipher.

Name: Udumbara Pistil
Description: A pistil taken from a blooming Udumbara. It seems to bear some special significance to the Pari...

Name: Khvarena Inscription Fragment
Description: A fragment of a lost monument inscription. It is not known why this piece was lost.

Name: Khvarena Inscription Fragment
Description: A fragment of a lost monument inscription. Its faint light may only be captured by the divine bird's descendants.

Name: Khvarena Inscription Fragment
Description: A fragment of a lost monument inscription. Returning all the fragments to their original positions may restore the inscription's original form.

Name: Khvarena Inscription Fragment
Description: A fragment of a lost monument inscription. It is said to have a profound bond with the Pari.

Name: Korybantes: Vedana
Description: A mysterious drum. This one has a Cryo marking on it.

Name: Korybantes: Rupa
Description: One of the missing Kory Drums. This one has a Dendro marking on it.

Name: Korybantes: Samjna
Description: One of the missing Kory Drums. This one has a Hydro marking on it.

Name: Korybantes: Sankhara
Description: One of the missing Kory Drums. This one has an Electro marking on it.

Name: Korybantes: Vijnana
Description: One of the missing Kory Drums. This one has a Pyro marking on it.

Name: Mysterious Energy Block
Description: An energy block of refined Azosite formed via the condensation of pure elemental energy. It seems that they can be used as an energy source for large-scale power systems.

Name: Julien's Luggage
Description: Waterlogged luggage. Supposedly packed with care. It is uncertain if the contents inside have suffered water damage from being soaked.

Name: Julien's Sketch
Description: A sketch bearing a strange mix of colors.

Name: "Adventurer's Experience"
Description:
A copy of an Adventurer's Experience made by Julien. It seems no different from the original.
After reading through it, however, only emptiness pervades the mind, with a sense that time was wasted without the requisite experience gained.

Name: Picture Left by the Wisdom Seelie
Description: Hints left by the Wisdom Seelie. Hopefully this venture isn't as futile as before...

Name: Caravan Accounts
Description: Accounts obtained from your target caravan. The information on it mostly relates to Dakan Al-Ahmar. Apart from the large amount of data and information on the movement of loot, the fact that Dunyarzad's father was named is quite concerning.

Name: Missive From Sumeru
Description: A letter.

Name: Inazuman Mail From Afar
Description: A letter.

Name: Relic Replica Container (I)
Description: A container holding a relic replica. It has been deliberately painted purple.

Name: Relic Replica Container (II)
Description: A container holding a relic replica. It has been deliberately painted blue.

Name: Relic Replica Container (III)
Description: A container holding a relic replica. It has been deliberately painted red.

Name: Korybantes Score: Vijnana
Description: A drum score corresponding to Korybantes: Vijnana.

Name: Korybantes Score: Samjna
Description: A drum score corresponding to Korybantes: Samjna.

Name: Korybantes Score: Rupa
Description: A drum score corresponding to Korybantes: Rupa.

Name: Korybantes Score: Sankhara
Description: A drum score corresponding to Korybantes: Sankhara.

Name: Korybantes Score: Vedana
Description: A drum score corresponding to Korybantes: Vedana.

Name: "Returning Curios" Memento (I)
Description: A memento discovered at a treasure site in the Veluriyam Mirage event, "Returning Curios." The treasure chest that contains it corresponds to the first code — "A sweet mist permeates all, gazing toward the dancing lamplight, I almost forget to breathe. In the end, memories of childhood guide me, and I take my seat beside the table in peace..."

Name: "Returning Curios" Memento (II)
Description: A memento discovered at a treasure site in the Veluriyam Mirage event, "Returning Curios." The treasure chest that contains it corresponds to the second code — "A shooting star of vines carries me, traversing a forest so quiet and peaceful, to finally arrive in secluded dreamland so pure."

Name: "Returning Curios" Memento (III)
Description: A memento discovered at a treasure site in the Veluriyam Mirage event, "Returning Curios." The treasure chest that contains it corresponds to the third code — "A blue, spotless ceiling, a floor of white candy, soft companions surround me, I too have wings!"

Name: Memento Collection Box
Description: A special box you got from Idyia that is used to contain "Returning Curios" mementos. It is said that it can protect the items within for a long time. With this box, you can pick a special memento and treasure site to leave your very own mark on the Veluriyam Mirage...

Name: Mysterious Mora Pocketwatch
Description:
A Mora-shaped (and Mora-shiny) pocketwatch you accidentally found in the Veluriyam Mirage. This one bears a strong resemblance to a Mora pocketwatch left behind by a seasoned adventurer in the earliest days of "Returning Curios." One wonders how much it is worth.
However, Idyia also says that "it's not about the value of the treasure or the watch, but the stories hidden inside the treasures!" Perhaps using monetary value as the measure of this memento is not the most fitting...

Name: Mural Fragment: Swirling Clouds
Description: A Preprint fragment found within a mysterious cave that depicts the clouds floating in the Veluriyam Mirage. It seems that a projection at the correct angle from the Streaming Projector can restore a missing part of the mural...

Name: Mural Fragment: Central Hub
Description: A Preprint fragment found within a mysterious cave that depicts the huge structure at the center of the Veluriyam Mirage. It seems that a projection at the correct angle from the Streaming Projector can restore a missing part of the mural...

Name: Mural Fragment: Sky Keep
Description: A Preprint fragment found within a mysterious cave that depicts a city floating in the sky. It seems that a projection at the correct angle from the Streaming Projector can restore a missing part of the mural...

Name: Mural Fragment: Flower of the Valley
Description: A Preprint fragment found within a mysterious cave that depicts the huge flowers visible from a Choo-Choo Cart entering the valley. It seems that a projection at the correct angle from the Streaming Projector can restore a missing part of the mural...

Name: Julien's Drawing Board
Description: A drawing board that shows signs of use but is presently devoid of any brushstrokes.

Name: In Pursuit of the Lost Inscription
Description: A note obtained from Sosi. It might contain clues about the lost monument fragments.

Name: Haniyyah's Gift of Marvelous Jellies
Description:
An exquisite gift offered by Haniyyah. It contains Marvelous Jellies much loved by the Fungi, and the Jellies themselves come in many unique flavors that can be fed to the Fungi based on their individual preferences.
The Marvelous Jellies are a refined version of the Floral Jellies that preceded them and retain their crystalline translucence and springy texture, sans the dangerous ingredients, thus making them the ideal feed for Fungi. That said, one should probably take care that the children don't eat it by mistake when storing it at home...

Name: Old Gear
Description: It seems to be a part of a huge machine, but this lone gear that fell out may not be of any use. However, if the way to make it turn again is found, then perhaps the answers to some questions may in turn be discovered.

Name: Mountaineering Rope
Description: Mountaineering rope favored by adventurers. It's a bit old but well-maintained, so it can still be used as per normal. This rope was left here as a gift. Perhaps it is not just ropes that a person relies on when scaling great heights, but friendly hands that reach out to you.

Name: Familiar-Looking Candy Box
Description: A candy box that is often used in various celebrations in Sumeru. When the girl who would become a researcher was still young, she used to take one candy a day from the box. Back in those days, her biggest worry was that the candy would run out. After becoming a researcher, this empty candy box has become a nostalgic reminder of other possibilities in life. This candy box was left here as a gift. To the researcher, this is also a symbol of freedom from misery.

Name: Travel Lamp
Description: A lamp that the boy often used when studying at night. The flame can be adjusted via a mechanism in the lamp, and this was perhaps quite magical to a child who had never seen such a lamp before. Every time he saw the light from this lamp, he will think of the old days when he played various hand shadow characters and animals. This lamp was left here as a gift. Maybe this is a way for him to let go of his burden and move on.

Name: Box of Special Potions
Description: A box obtained from Bahador. Within it are some special potions. According to what he said, these potions might be of aid to exploring a certain Domain...

Name: Gear Drivetrain
Description: A removable part that belongs to the central drive valve in the abandoned production zone.

Name: Someone's Journal
Description: Someone's Journal

Name: Someone's Memo
Description: Someone's Memo

Name: Locator
Description: A Kshahrewar invention. When contestants carry these tracking devices, the locator can display their general locations. Additionally, should the contestants successfully complete their tasks, the locator will also sound.

Name: King of Invokations
Description: A light novel centered around the most popular card game in Teyvat — Genius Invokation TCG. The characters are unique and the story is exciting and full of twists, making it one of the hottest new works around.

Name: Strange Part
Description:
A strange mechanical part obtained near Merusea Village. It looks subtly different from common mechanical parts.
You have no idea why it ended up here, but beautiful metal products like this are loved by Melusines...

Name: Key to the Castle's Secret Chamber
Description: An item that is key to the "Petrifying Gaze" scenario in Daiya's Three-Day Reverie, which can be used to open a secret chamber that conceals an ancient medicine. Its outer appearance is not much different from that of ordinary keys.

Name: Ancient Hex-Cleansing Remedy
Description:
An item that is key to the "Petrifying Gaze" scenario in Daiya's Three-Day Reverie.
According to the Lone Hydro Eidolon, such remedies have the power to cleanse Wraith-cast hexes and restore petrified Hydro Eidolons to their original states.
However, the outward appearance of the remedy indicates the use of a very common alchemy vessel. Is this narrative setting related to alchemy, or is the theater troupe just cutting costs...?

Name: "The Great Escape" Prop Book
Description: A prop book that has been hollowed out and had digging tools put into it. Of course, as a stage prop, its other pages have long been stuck together. But then again, the "content" of a book is sometimes more important than its... content.

Name: Enigmatic Page (I)
Description:
An ancient paper whose contents are completely unintelligible.
Perhaps there's some way to decipher the contents.

Name: Enigmatic Page (II)
Description:
An ancient paper whose contents are completely unintelligible.
Perhaps there's some way to decipher the contents.

Name: Enigmatic Page (III)
Description:
An ancient paper whose contents are completely unintelligible.
Perhaps there's some way to decipher the contents.

Name: Nameless Adventurer's Notes
Description: Lost notes left in the desert. They seem to have been left by some adventurer.

Name: Ancient Engineering Notes
Description: Ancient Engineering Notes

Name: Ragged Engineering Notes
Description: Ragged Engineering Notes

Name: Someone's Abandoned Letter
Description: Someone's Abandoned Letter

Name: Akademiya Investigation Team's Logs (III)
Description: Akademiya Investigation Team's Logs (III)

Name: Akademiya Investigation Team's Logs (IV)
Description: Akademiya Investigation Team's Logs (IV)

Name: Barely-Legible Bulletin
Description: Barely-Legible Bulletin

Name: Ancient Journal
Description: Ancient Journal

Name: Records of Unknown Attribution (II)
Description: Records of Unknown Attribution (II)

Name: Emberglow Leaf
Description: A leaf that you got from Nahida. It can be used to contact the Aranara. If you use it like a whistle, an Aranara will answer the call. The Aranara will only come because they trust Nahida. In other words, you can't just blow on any leaf you find and expect an answer.

Name: Sadife's Marked Map
Description: A map marked by Sadife. Perhaps the case is somewhere close by...

Name: Sadife's Case
Description: Sadife's case. It's stuffed to the brim and quite heavy.

Name: Akademiya Investigation Team's Logs (I)
Description: Akademiya Investigation Team's Logs (I)

Name: Akademiya Investigation Team's Logs (II)
Description: Akademiya Investigation Team's Logs (II)

Name: Soiled Orders
Description: Soiled Orders

Name: Records of Unknown Attribution (I)
Description: Records of Unknown Attribution (I)

Name: Pages From Some Lost Notes (I)
Description: Pages From Some Lost Notes (I)

Name: Pages From Some Lost Notes (II)
Description: Pages From Some Lost Notes (II)

Name: Bizarre Transcript
Description: Bizarre Transcript

Name: Teachings of the Skeptics
Description: Teachings of the Skeptics

Name: Nameless Researcher's Notes (I)
Description: Nameless Researcher's Notes (I)

Name: Nameless Researcher's Notes (II)
Description: Nameless Researcher's Notes (II)

Name: Nameless Researcher's Notes (III)
Description: Nameless Researcher's Notes (III)

Name: Nameless Researcher's Notes (IV)
Description: Nameless Researcher's Notes (IV)

Name: Mercenary's Aged Notes (I)
Description: Mercenary's Aged Notes (I)

Name: Mercenary's Aged Notes (II)
Description: Mercenary's Aged Notes (II)

Name: Mercenary's Aged Notes (III)
Description: Mercenary's Aged Notes (III)

Name: Mercenary's Aged Notes (IV)
Description: Mercenary's Aged Notes (IV)

Name: Khvarena Monument Inscription
Description: Khvarena Monument Inscription

Name: "Active Odor Imitating Bait"
Description: A new fishing aid developed by Delaroche that applies the principles of odor analysis and advanced bait mimicry. It is said that its effect is "very powerful." You can tell by the appearance that Delaroche thinks the world of this bait, with protective wrapping and a special bag. However, it is unknown whether such meticulous measures will affect the basic function of the bait — even if it attracts fish, the fish themselves may be unable to even find a way to bite down upon it.

Name: Submerged Box
Description: A sunken box. Details of the contents within are unknown...

Name: Submerged Box
Description: A sunken box. It seems... a bit different from other boxes...?

Name: Ancient Key
Description:
A key that can unlock the path leading into the ruins of the Liliacruces Forum.
It has been submerged in water for a long time, but it hasn't decayed beyond recognition.

Name: Key to Some Place in the Institute
Description: It should be able to open a certain door in the Institute of Natural Philosophy.

Name: Beautifully-Wrapped Gift Box
Description: A gift in a beautiful gift box. According to Kaeya, it contains an exquisite lamp. It might be best to wait till you come back from vacation with Kaeya to open up his gift and admire it.

Name: Ripe Grapes
Description: Grapes you picked with utmost care under Tunner's guidance. In time, they can be turned into rich wine.

Name: Heavy Pack
Description: An overwhelmingly heavy pack, containing large quantities of paint. How will Depierris put these paints to use...

Name: A Can of Fry
Description: Fry that you obtained from Linorea. It is said that these fish have been hand-picked by her, and are perfectly suited to surviving in these waters...

Name: Prince Qubad's Intaglio
Description:
An Intaglio that symbolizes the noble origins of Prince Qubad in the play. It should have been strung on a beaded chain and worn on the prince's chest, but a fated tragedy made the prince abandon it.
The blood-red jewel is a crystallization of the question Kaeya asked you — that age-old question about destiny.
There is no need to rush to answer. In the future, use what you see, touch, and feel to prove the answer within your soul.

Name: Vigneire's Notebook
Description: Vigneire's Notebook

Name: Credit Coupons
Description: A type of currency only used in the Fortress of Meropide.

Name: "The Art of Negotiation"
Description:
"A milestone in the science of success, this masterpiece written by a true genius is an absolute must-read!"
An exceptional book emphatically recommended by the editor of La Gouttiere, titans of the business world, and researchers at the Fontaine Research Institute!
It will impart deep insights and understanding into the abyss of human nature, a truly incomparable contribution to the science and art of success!

Name: Welfare Meal
Description:
A Welfare Meal from the Coupon Cafeteria. As it's free, there's an element of surprise and risk.

Use to obtain a meal and a Fortune Slip.

Name: Tainted Blood
Description:
Substance acquired from defeating Dvalin.
A crystal imbued with the winds of antiquity as well as another occult power from within the great dragon's body.

The mighty dragon was once a captive of a cage of toxicity, woven of three poisons:
The foul blood he once ingested, the lies whispered from the Abyss, and the anguish of abandonment.
Through tears shed and songs sung, the unholy spikes that had grown on Dvalin's body were smashed to pieces, and the web that had ensnared him was torn away...
Perhaps these feats were achievable only by a free-spirited traveler from a far-away land.

Name: Monolith Fragment
Description:
Some kind of fragment recovered after defeating the Overlord of the Vortex in battle.
In the ancient past, it was used to pin the great beast down.

There once was a time when the inhabitants of this land were terrorized by waves as tall as mountains, torn from their dreams in the dead of night by the deafening roar of tidal waves that would shake the world to its core. Fear of such horrors gradually subsided over the years as peace became the norm.
But no matter: though That Which Lies In The Deep awakens once more, it is powerless to prevent the dawning of a new era.
Perhaps this is just what the one who suppressed the Overlord of the Vortex has been hoping to witness in the millennia since.

Name: Funerary Mask
Description:
A trophy obtained from defeating Signora, Eighth of the Fatui Harbingers.
The Fatui often face the world from behind their masks, and it is said that this is because all they once were mean nothing once they become Fatui, and thus must they forsake their true names and faces alike.

—Yet the act of giving up all that makes up an "I" — one's past and the bonds that come with it — is no mean feat.
Perhaps it is fair to say that only those who possess an obsession close to or even exceeding the level of delusion might be willing to join this group that so rebels against the Heavenly Principles, binding their remaining days to their Delusions and burning as brightly as stars.
...Of course, many within the Fatui are simply consumed by power and are simple sadists — nor are these states necessarily in conflict.

The woman whose real name was Rosalyne-Kruzchka Lohefalter may have once led a more innocent, naive existence.
But that was before her eyes were filled with a raging fire, and her innocent days were burned away. Before the icy Delusion extinguished the flaming tongues that ever gnawed her. Before the frozen might that protected her was shattered by the eternal outlander, unbound yet no less determined than she was, causing the flames to burst forth once more...

Name: Silver Twig
Description:
A new branch taken from the center of the world.
There was once a giant tree that ran across the world, and this twig was part of it. Though it has been removed from the tree, their connection remains strong as ever. Therefore, as long as the giant white tree that symbolizes the center of the world does not die, it will never wither.

"Trees" symbolize life. In one of the stories from a certain place, there was a person who had entrusted her consciousness to the white tree's branches before she passed away. In that way, neither her life nor hope would be lost, since the branches would grow and sprout where there was sunshine and rain, and would one day blossom and bear fruits.
"Trees" also symbolize wisdom. In one of the legends, a sage hanging upside down on a tree had acquired the knowledge of how to inscribe runes and control sacred words, and thus followed the kingdom established along the tree's roots, eventually gaining a glimpse of the secret of the cosmos.
All knowledge, memory, and experience flow through this giant tree, just like a stream flows into a river, the river joins a sea, the sea turns into clouds, and the clouds rain onto the ground — just like life itself.

Name: Food Seeds
Description: The elemental life form known as the Floating Anemo Fungus gave you these seeds. Plant them in a field to grow food that the Fungi enjoy eating. But will there be any Fungi who remember how to till the fields in the future?

Name: The History of the Decline and Fall of Remuria (I)
Description: It is said that the great scholar Pulteney wrote this epic historical work concerning the ancient Remurian civilization in the early years of the founding of Fontaine.

Name: The History of the Decline and Fall of Remuria (II)
Description: It is said that the great scholar Pulteney wrote this epic historical work concerning the ancient Remurian civilization in the early years of the founding of Fontaine.

Name: The History of the Decline and Fall of Remuria (III)
Description: It is said that the great scholar Pulteney wrote this epic historical work concerning the ancient Remurian civilization in the early years of the founding of Fontaine.

Name: Fables de Fontaine (I)
Description: A storybook containing various lore and tales authored by Marie Hericart de La Fontaine, most of which were not written by the author but are compiled from ancient poems which have since been lost.

Name: Fables de Fontaine (II)
Description: A storybook containing various lore and tales authored by Marie Hericart de La Fontaine, most of which were not written by the author but are compiled from ancient poems which have since been lost.

Name: Fables de Fontaine (III)
Description: A storybook containing various lore and tales authored by Marie Hericart de La Fontaine, most of which were not written by the author but are compiled from ancient poems which have since been lost.

Name: Robben versus Chesterton: Iridescent Brooch (I)
Description: An entertaining novel quite popular in Fontaine. It tells a story about the thief "Phantom Gentleman" Fantomas Robben and the famous detective Chesterton's first confrontation. Disclaimer: This is a work of fiction. Any similarities to persons living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.

Name: Robben versus Chesterton: Iridescent Brooch (II)
Description: An entertaining novel quite popular in Fontaine. It tells a story about the thief "Phantom Gentleman" Fantomas Robben and the famous detective Chesterton's first confrontation. Disclaimer: This is a work of fiction. Any similarities to persons living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.

Name: Robben versus Chesterton: Iridescent Brooch (III)
Description: An entertaining novel quite popular in Fontaine. It tells a story about the thief "Phantom Gentleman" Fantomas Robben and the famous detective Chesterton's first confrontation. Disclaimer: This is a work of fiction. Any similarities to persons living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.

Name: Gift of "Parting"
Description: A flowery accessory given away by Lyney at his magic shows. It is an arrangement of Lumidouce Bells, which symbolize parting.

Name: "Delightful Encounter"
Description: A flowery accessory given away by Lyney at his magic shows. It is an arrangement of Lumidouce Bells, which symbolize parting, and Rainbow Roses that represent passion. Parting and passion are two separate perspectives sharing the same nature. What really matters is the present that we are living in.

Name: Red Stone
Description:
Red ore that you collected together with Mamere. It is said that the ore can be used to make paint.
For some reason, even though it's just an ore, it almost feels warm... Is your hand too cold?

Name: Treasure
Description:
An old pocket watch.
It has ceased to tick and tock, and its cover cannot be opened.

Name: Holy Blade of Narzissenkreuz
Description:
A holy sword that bears a special meaning in a certain story.
It belongs to no one.

Name: Green Feather Accessory
Description:
Sometimes, this feather has the power to advance a story forward and bring it to an end.
Its appearance itself represents a power that transcends the story.

Old yet well-preserved, it must have been cherished by many people.

Name: Typewriter Keycap
Description: A newly purchased keycap. Though it does not quite fit in with its counterparts already on the typewriter... Well, let's just make do for now.

Name: "Beautifully-Written Letter"
Description: A letter obtained from Decembre. According to him, this is a letter written to celebrate his child's birthday.

Name: "Marcotte"
Description: A perfume named Marcotte. The primary ingredient is also Marcotte. Linorea often purchases this perfume.

Name: "Lakelight"
Description: A perfume named Lakelight favored by Semaine. Does he wear this at work...?

Name: "Tidalga"
Description: A perfume named Tidalga. It has the unique scent of algae. Come to think of it, what exactly is the "scent of algae"...?

Name: Fry
Description: Fry that you obtained from Batasso. It is said that these fish have been hand-picked by him, and are perfectly suited to surviving in those waters...

Name: Heavy Box
Description: A heavy box that contains many films.

Name: "Opera House Switcheroo" Case Record
Description: A detailed case record of the murder and the disappearance that occurred during Lyney and Lynette's switcheroo magic show in the Opera Epiclese. If any difficulties are encountered during the investigation, please examine the clues and evidence collected so far to gather and organize your thoughts.

Name: "Water and Missing Person" Case Record
Description: A detailed case record of the murder related to Navia's father, Callas, and the serial disappearances of young women case that is thought to be closely linked to the murder. If any difficulties are encountered during the investigation, please examine the clues and evidence collected so far to gather and organize your thoughts.

Name: Pure Pinecone
Description: Much larger than an ordinary Pinecone. It must be because it is purer than an ordinary Pinecone.

Name: Empty Bottle
Description: The meaning of an empty bottle is one full of air, which means other things can also be stored in it.

Name: "Key"
Description: Said to be the key to the World of Intense Purity. In reality, it is a fluid, and thus can easily change shape to fit into any keyhole.

Name: Paimon's "Food Fund"
Description: Paimon used part of her personal "Food Fund" to pay for your commission fee. Hmm, now that you think about it, she probably has more squirreled away, doesn't she?

Name: Experimental Crystal Light Path Component
Description:
A component found in a mysterious underwater space, it seems to be a core component in some kind of optical device. If placed in the correct position, it should be able to activate some kind of special device...
After the experiment, please store critical components separately from the main devices. This is in accordance with standard security procedures.

Name: Punched Tape
Description: Well-preserved punched tape. The data recorded within can only be deciphered using specialized machinery.

Name: Punched Tape
Description: Punched tape with a bit of wear and tear. The data recorded within can only be deciphered using specialized machinery.

Name: Punched Tape
Description: Punched tape collected in accordance with Sevigne's request. The data recorded within can only be deciphered using specialized machinery.

Name: Mysterious Ore
Description:
A mysterious green-yellow crystalline ore.
Ore of the same type seems to mutually attract.

Name: Arkhium Stock
Description:
The raw form of Arkhium, which can come together naturally under special circumstances.
It may be able to unleash limitless potential after being forged...

Name: Arkhium Lumenite
Description: The result of forging Arkhium. It emits an unusual energy and light. They say that such things can be used to open a gate somewhere...

Name: Jabberwock's Holy Sword
Description: A holy sword that bears a special meaning in a certain story.

Name: Absolution-Seeker's Testament
Description: A letter you found in the Veluriyam Mirage. It is neatly folded and yellowed. It seems to be an object that someone left in the Domain long ago.

Name: Enigmatic Page (IV)
Description:
An ancient paper whose contents are completely unintelligible.
Perhaps there's some way to decipher the contents.

Name: Enigmatic Page (V)
Description:
An ancient paper whose contents are completely unintelligible.
Perhaps there's some way to decipher the contents.

Name: Enigmatic Page (VI)
Description:
An ancient paper whose contents are completely unintelligible.
Perhaps there's some way to decipher the contents.

Name: Enigmatic Page (VII)
Description:
An ancient paper whose contents are completely unintelligible.
Perhaps there's some way to decipher the contents.

Name: Enigmatic Page (VIII)
Description:
An ancient paper whose contents are completely unintelligible.
Perhaps there's some way to decipher the contents.

Name: Enigmatic Page (IX)
Description:
An ancient paper whose contents are completely unintelligible.
Perhaps there's some way to decipher the contents.

Name: Enigmatic Page (X)
Description:
An ancient paper whose contents are completely unintelligible.
Perhaps there's some way to decipher the contents.

Name: Enigmatic Page (XI)
Description:
An ancient paper whose contents are completely unintelligible.
Perhaps there's some way to decipher the contents.

Name: Enigmatic Page (XII)
Description:
An ancient paper whose contents are completely unintelligible.
Perhaps there's some way to decipher the contents.

Name: Enigmatic Page (XIII)
Description:
An ancient paper whose contents are completely unintelligible.
Perhaps there's some way to decipher the contents.

Name: Melody of Vesta
Description: A bronze plate said to be a musical score recording an ancient melody, but it is difficult to understand due to the strange notations.

Name: Topyas's Token
Description: The token of the self-proclaimed musician Topyas. She says it's used to play the Conch Harp.

Name: Strange Ore
Description: An ore that gives off a strange glow. It has a compact and tough texture.

Name: Special Clock
Description: A prototype timepiece made using special materials, reducing abrasion and wear on the internal gears. Due to its clamshell-inspired design, it can also be used underwater.

Name: Coffee Brewing Ingredients
Description: Ingredients made by Arouet. Can be directly used to brew coffee.

Name: Specially Cooked Fish
Description: Fish meat that Iaune has processed with a special method. Violetgold Angler Gulls seem to like it very much...

Name: Enhanced "Truesight Potion"
Description: The improved version of the "Truesight Potion." If you drink it, who knows what kind of strange effects you'll feel...

Name: Credit Coupons (For Use During Investigation)
Description: Special Credit Coupons you obtained when Neuvillette tasked you with investigating the Fortress of Meropide. Remember to use them for their designated purpose.

Name: Bait
Description: Bait obtained from Boucicaut. Hopefully it will help Roialte with fishing...

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Luck only brings fleeting pleasure, lifelong happiness requires hard work."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Things happen. Don't take it personally!"

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Misfortune is an illness, and caring friends are the cure."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Hard work begets success!"

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "The one who laughs loudest may not laugh to the last, but they certainly are the happiest when laughing."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "After using your left cheek to strike the other person's hand, you must be sure to press the advantage, and continue attacking their hand with your right cheek."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Don't be depressed when you fail. Sometimes, a ship sinking to the bottom is also a kind of arrival."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "You won't win a prize just because you bought a ticket, but you'll never win a prize if you never buy a ticket!"

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Don't look for shortcuts, after all, the shortcut might already be clogged with hordes of people who've already found it."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Don't regret, or regret regretting, and definitely don't ever regret regretting regret."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "The meaning of life is thinking, and the meaning of working is in giving up on life."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Luck that is easily obtained will not bring long-term happiness."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Just when you think it can't get any worse, you must be alert, for things can always get worse."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Believe in the power of skepticism."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Misfortune will always come to an end. Once you are used to it, it ceases to be misfortune."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Don't retreat if you encounter obstacles. First, have a Welfare Meal. The obstacle won't disappear, but at least you've got a full stomach now."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Those with no freedom cannot be sad."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "You shouldn't feel like you've got nothing. After all, you've got this delicious meal!"

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Even if Whopperflowers disguise themselves as Sweet Flowers, the smart fox will not be fooled."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "The secret to staying healthy: Don't get sick."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Even the sweetest Sunsettias fall from high branches. This is the result of maturity."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Don't believe maxims written on slips of paper."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Sometimes, happiness is like a Lumitoile. It can only be seen clearly when it is darkest."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Life is not a game."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Often, two small steps is better than one big step."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Don't worry, everything will get better! At least, that's what they asked me to write!"

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Luck is not here, but elsewhere."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "I'm just a Fortune Slip, and cannot provide the answers to the difficulties you encounter. You must rely on yourself to overcome."

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Setbacks may give you experience, but they won't give you Credit Coupons!"

Name: Fortune Slip
Description: "Okay, have another! (Just kidding)"

Name: Mysterious Core
Description:
A mysterious core taken from a mysterious machine.
Although it appears to be a gear, it is in fact a gear-shaped core — very mysterious indeed.

Name: Drained Conch Cup
Description: An ancient conch container, and it can perhaps be traced back to an even older civilization.

Name: Unprocessed Widget
Description: A widget that has neither been processed nor forged.

Name: Processed Widget
Description: A widget that has been processed within the production zone.

Name: Pankration Fonta Cup
Description:
A trophy awarded for taking part in the Pankration recreational tournament as a coach, and guiding Genevieve and Poiret to victory in the championship. Made from classy-looking metal, under the right lighting, it gleams like shining Mora.
With this special trophy, you can get unlimited refills of refreshing Fonta at designated machines, drinking to your heart's content, and become the most satisfied enjoyer of fine drinks in the world...

Name: Soaked Punched Tape
Description:
Punched tape retrieved from the water. The data recorded within can only be deciphered using specialized machinery.
Although it was made from a special waterproof material and has thus not yet been destroyed, it has been in there long enough to still feel rather wet even after being hauled out...

Name: Spur Gear C
Description: A seemingly ordinary spur gear. It originally belonged to "Initial Skill Sample No. 2," but it seems to have been split from the main body by an immense external force...

Name: Spur Gear C
Description: A seemingly ordinary spur gear. It originally belonged to "Initial Skill Sample No. 2," but it seems to have been split from the main body by an immense external force...

Name: Spur Gear T
Description: A seemingly ordinary spur gear. It originally belonged to "Initial Skill Sample No. 2," but it seems to have been split from the main body by an immense external force...

Name: Navigation Log Fragment
Description: Navigation Log Fragment

Name: Damaged Diary
Description: Damaged Diary

Name: Mora Candy
Description: Candy that looks like Mora. The candy itself is bittersweet, an adult flavor that kids have a hard time appreciating. But the golden wrapping paper is incredibly popular with children.

Name: Quality Wooden Board
Description: A high-quality wooden plank with numerous uses. Place it under your clothes to block a potentially fatal attack, or use it for practicing martial arts.

Name: The Boar Princess (VIII)
Description: The eighth part of this timeless classic.

Name: Casket of Tomes (Secondhand)
Description: A cherished Casket of Tomes that its owner has been forced to part with for reasons unknown. For a limited time, comes with a copy of "Genius Invokation TCG: From Novice to the Summoners' Summit."

Name: Idol Poster
Description: An extremely popular Inazuman idol poster, it is one of the best options of decorating a room. Discounts available if purchased together with Cute Dolls.

Name: Cute Doll
Description: Certified by Roussimoff! Even the manliest man can't bear to part with such an adorable doll! Discounts available if purchased together with Idol Posters.

Name: Beast Trap
Description: A mysterious trap for beasts. Place Credit Coupons on it, and it can lure in the greedy.

Name: Marvelous Bird Egg
Description: A delectable taste that could revive the dead! If you eat it, it can counteract an entire day's worth of misfortunes.

Name: Delicious Tea Leaves
Description: They have the mysterious effect of awakening the latent wisdom sleeping within. A unique flavor for a unique you!

Name: "Pure Water" (Case)
Description: "Pure Water" sold by the case. Once, someone drank half a case and became the champion of the next Pankration tournament. To drink an entire case, you must have bravery surpassing that of a champion, and an even stronger digestive system.

Name: Fonta: Sweet Sakura
Description: Specially flavored Fonta, said to use Inazuman Sakura Blooms as an ingredient. During its manufacture, the amount of sugar was reduced in order to avoid overwhelming the sakura flavor, but consumer feedback indicates that the so-called "sakura flavor" is more like the smell of a freshly-mown lawn.

Name: Fonta: Red Berry Blast
Description: Specially flavored Fonta, said to use many different "red-colored fruits" as ingredients. It has a very enticing crimson color and layered flavor profile. But for reasons unknown, this flavor of Fonta is severely irritating to the bowels, and until the underlying reason is discovered, large-scale promotion of this type of Fonta has been suspended...

Name: Haggis
Description: A dish with strong and distinctive flavors. Chop up the sheep offal, mix it with oatmeal, and stuff the mixture into a sheep stomach along with various seasonings and spices. When the dish is served, the stomach-bag is usually removed while the fillings are served with radish paste and mashed potatoes. This is a local specialty that Fontainians often cook as a treat for important guests.

Name: Coffee Bavarois
Description: A refreshing dessert. Though it is one of Fontaine's trademark desserts, its recipe is very simple and straightforward. As long as the proportion of ingredients is right, hardly anyone could fail at making this dessert. It has an exquisite texture with a touch of refreshing cold taste, and can instantly lift your spirits.

Name: Barbeque Ribs
Description: A crispy meat dish. Lightly fry the surface of the ribs until they exude a faint aroma, then wrap the crispy exterior with sauce, and finally, grill them slowly on low heat. The meticulous temperature control ensures that the exterior is perfectly crisp, while the meat within is kept juicy and tender.

Name: Trout Amandine
Description: Fish fillets of a satisfying size, fried with butter before serving with a side of crispy fried almonds. According to the traditional recipe for this dish, a whole readied trout would be placed into the frying pan, but a new, fillet-featuring recipe for this dish has been gaining popularity recently as well.

Name: Suspicious Fowl
Description: Fowl found by the side of the road. It might be from some birds who were victims of foul play.

Name: Fibery Romaritime Flowers
Description: Romaritime Flowers plucked to help Lyney make magic pockets. It is said the Romaritime Flowers growing in this area are rich in fiber, and thus are great for making quality magic pockets.

Name: Childe's Vision
Description: It appears as if Childe lost control of the Elemental Power within it before. The Vision has lost its glow now that its owner has left it behind.

Name: Magic Pocket Materials
Description: In order to cope with the "prophecy crisis," it can't hurt to make more magic pockets. This bag full of materials is a sincere gesture of goodwill from you, Lyney, Freminet, and everybody else.

Name: Magic Pocket
Description: A Lyney-style magic item that can not only be extremely useful for magic shows, but also has powerful storage capabilities to help the people of Fontaine cope with the "prophecy crisis."

Name: Puca's Token
Description: Puca's token, which she lost in the depths of the mine. Hurry up and return it to her!

Name: Scattered Page
Description: An old page obtained in the mysterious space. It should be able to prove that what transpired wasn't a dream...

Name: Handwheel
Description: A common handwheel, used to adjust regulating valves on the pipes around the Fortress of Meropide.

Name: Handwheel
Description: A common handwheel, used to adjust regulating valves on the pipes in Kuisel's Clockwork Workshop.

Name: Handwheel
Description: A common handwheel, used to adjust regulating valves on the pipes in Bravais' Press Works.

Name: Punched Tape
Description: Punched tape made out of a special waterproof material. The data recorded within can only be deciphered using specialized machinery.

Name: Punched Tape
Description: Punched tape retrieved from the tower near the Fontaine Research Institute. The data recorded within can only be deciphered using specialized machinery.

Name: Energy Concentrating Component
Description:
It was once an ordinary moving clockwork component but someone added an energy storage ring made from high-density materials.
Perhaps just this single component is capable of powering the entire machine...

Name: Poem on Fallen Leaf
Description: Poem on Fallen Leaf

Name: Response Poem on a Leaf
Description: Response Poem on a Leaf

Name: Poem on a Fallen Leaf
Description: Poem on a Fallen Leaf

Name: Poetry Riddle on a Lantern
Description: Poetry Riddle on a Lantern

Name: Poetry Riddle on a Lantern
Description: Poetry Riddle on a Lantern

Name: Poem Placed by Unknown Person
Description: Poem Placed by Unknown Person

Name: Arkhium Inhibitor Condenser Component
Description: A condenser component once installed on the Arkhium Inhibitor. According to Raimondo, after they are all reinstalled, the inhibitor can be restarted.

Name: "Special Report"
Description: A special report privately printed by Chronie. It is said that the contents record the "truth" that the Fontaine Research Institute wishes to hide...

Name: Special Report
Description: A special report privately printed by Chronie. It is said that the contents record the "truth" that the Fontaine Research Institute wishes to hide...

Name: Clue Book (Fortress of Meropide)
Description: Records the various clues you found during your investigation in the Fortress of Meropide.

Name: Left-Side Table File Box
Description: A file box that ruthlessly attacked Ms. Chalmet's back. It was placed on the table on the left-hand side of the entrance. It would probably be easier to move if it was placed inside a bag...

Name: Right-Side Table File Box
Description: A file box that ruthlessly attacked Ms. Chalmet's back. It was placed on the table on the right-hand side of the entrance. It would probably be easier to move if it was placed inside a bag...

Name: Mutual Aid Network Advertisement
Description: A pamphlet given out by a very enthusiastic member of the Mutual Aid Network. It contains the basic principles of the Network. The logo on the cover looks a bit familiar...

Name: Fresh Jueyun Chili
Description: A freshly-picked Jueyun Chili with a brilliant red coloration. This is what Diona wishes to use in her latest cocktail concoction.

Name: Fresh Berries
Description: Brightly colored fruit with a sweet texture. An exceptionally fine picnic can be prepared by pairing it with other foods.

EffectDescription: Refreshing Fonta, a Font of Refreshment!
Name: Full Pankration Fonta Cup
Description:
The trophy for the Pankration recreational tournament, filled completely with Fonta.
Even after being set down, a bubbling sound can be heard, a bit like the sound of "hot oil and juices in a pot of meat," making anyone who hears it hanker for food.
However, the size of the trophy is in a category all its own, and few could swallow the contents in a single swig. Even if you forced yourself to manage the feat, you'd probably bloat up like a Blubberbeast and might even end up hospitalized...

Name: Experimental Drink No. 1
Description:
An "experimental drink" created by Heinry. It is filled with fizzy bubbles, and has a slightly salty flavor...
But overall, it still maintains a bit of the orginal Fonta flavor... at least you know what you are drinking is still Fonta.

Name: Experimental Drink No. 2
Description:
An "experimental drink" created by Heinry. It is filled with fizzy bubbles, and you can even taste a bit of a slightly salty tea flavor?
This drink feels more like a bottle of "Salty Carbonated Tea," and not Fonta.

Name: Experimental Drink No. 3
Description:
An "experimental drink" created by Heinry. This Fonta has no bubbles whatsoever, and the saltiness is quite prominent.
At the very least, it still counts as Fonta.

Name: Experimental Drink No. 4
Description:
An "experimental drink" created by Heinry. It has no bubbles whatsoever, and is a bit like slightly salty tea.
Okay, it's basically like a plain old bottle of tea.

Name: Experimental Drink No. 5
Description:
An "experimental drink" created by Heinry. Refreshing Fonta, a font of refreshment! Classic Fonta, aha!
Uh... but just making a bottle of classic Fonta is pretty meaningless.

Name: Experimental Drink No. 6
Description: An "experimental drink" created by Heinry. A "sweet bubbly tea" bursting with bubbles. It tastes... not all that bad?

Name: Experimental Drink No. 7
Description: An "experimental drink" created by Heinry. Refreshing Fonta, a font of— what!? This bottle's gone flat, who took off the cap and didn't finish drinking it!?

Name: Experimental Drink No. 8
Description: An "experimental drink" created by Heinry. A "sweet bubbly tea" completely bereft of bubbles. Can... Can I just have a cup of tea instead?

Name: "Academic Assembly Hall" Picture
Description: A photo taken in the Academic Assembly Hall. Who knows how Iaune will use it...

Name: Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure
Description: A fairy tale that Lisa wrote based on the special game "Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure," featuring the Spark Knight, Dodoco, special Jumpy Dumpties, the Honorary Knight, and their white-colored helper in their victory over the fishies...

Name: Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure
Description: A fairy tale that Lisa wrote based on the special game "Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure," featuring the Spark Knight, Dodoco, special Jumpy Dumpties, the Honorary Knight, and their white-colored helper in their victory over the fishies...

Name: Hat
Description: A hat obtained from the Rag and Bone Shop. Though it isn't the same hat that was lost, it should be sufficient to handle the situation at hand.

Name: Dry Firewood
Description: Dry firewood of moderate thickness, excellent for firemaking.

Name: Blanche's Letter
Description: A letter, placed betwixt two Bulle Fruit.

Name: Location No. 1 Materials
Description: Heinry's lost materials. Who knows what kind of inspiration he'll get from them..

Name: Location No. 2 Materials
Description: Heinry's lost materials. Who knows what kind of inspiration he'll get from them..

Name: Location No. 3 Materials
Description: Heinry's lost materials. Who knows what kind of inspiration he'll get from them..

Name: Silk Flower Seed
Description: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into Silk Flowers.

Name: Sweet Flower Seed
Description: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Sweet Flower.

Name: Cecilia Seed
Description: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Cecilia.

Name: Valberry Seed
